column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658405#658416#TD4069E.TXT.r_5039;TD4069E.TXT.r_5040;TD4069E.TXT.r_5041# rnam  par shes par gtogs pa'i bar gang yin pa la dmigs pa yin zhes de ltar rgyas par gsungs nas / / +de chos de dag la nad nyid dang zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs so // /

column3: theg pa rnam pa gnyis kyi chu rnyog pa can las byung ste / / +cig car chud pa'i byang chub  sems dpa' nyid padmo dang 'dra bar rnyog pa dang bral zhing chos nyid brtan pa'i tshul theg pa gcig pu'i gzhung rtogs zhes pa'i don ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658417#658441#TD4069E.TXT.r_5041;TD4069E.TXT.r_5042;TD4069E.TXT.r_5043# 'dir ni rnam par bshad pa 'di ji ltar na ste rnam pa gang gis na 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings la sems nye bar sbyor ba zhes gang  gsungs pa zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa yid la byed pa las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658480#658488#TD4069E.TXT.r_5047;TD4069E.TXT.r_5048;TD4069E.TXT.r_5049;TD4069E.TXT.r_5050# de lta na ni thob pa yod bzhin du ji ltar na 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur la / / +ji ltar na phyis rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bsam pa brjod dgos so // /
column6: 0.013#TD4061E.TXT.r#1531233#1531238#TD4061E.TXT.r_2534;TD4061E.TXT.r_2535# 'dir ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yid la byed pa las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur la / /
column7: 0.019#TD4061E.TXT.r#1531197#1531198#TD4061E.TXT.r_2531# phung po kun spangs pa dang  sred pa zad pa dang  'dod chags dang bral ba dang  'gog pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings la sems nye bar sbyor ba zhes gang gsungs pa 'di  ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'o // /

column3: yang na theg pa rnam pa gnyis chu rnyog pa can gyi nang nas byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor chen por zhugs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' padmo'i  gdan la bzhugs shing mtha' yas gdon mi za ba'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdzod rtogs pa bzhin nyan thos pa rnams kyis kyang rim gyis lung yang dag pa dang  gzhung dang spyod pa dang 'bras bu la zhugs zhes pa'i don to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658442#658457#TD4069E.TXT.r_5042;TD4069E.TXT.r_5043;TD4069E.TXT.r_5044;TD4069E.TXT.r_5045# phyis rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bsam pa brjod dgos so // / +gal te mya ngan las 'das pa yid la byed pa las 'dod chags kyi thob pa chad pa yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658458#658473#TD4069E.TXT.r_5045;TD4069E.TXT.r_5046;TD4069E.TXT.r_5047# de dang mi ldan par gnas gyur pa ni phyis rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba de lta na ni snga ma dang 'dra ba nyid kyi phyir khyad par 'ga' yang med do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658473#658481#TD4069E.TXT.r_5046;TD4069E.TXT.r_5047;TD4069E.TXT.r_5048# 'on te mya ngan las 'das pa yid la byed pa kho nas 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro zhe na /// / +de lta na ni thob pa yod bzhin du ji ltar na 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur la / /
column7: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#156575#156577#TD4035E.TXT.r_5484;TD4035E.TXT.r_5485# dbus kyi mtha' nas phyi ma'i mthar 'du byed rnams kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji ltar na 'byung bar 'gyur / / +ji ltar na 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / /

column3: yang 'di  bla na med pa'i chos kyi sgo ste / / +phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sdud pa'i phyir ro // / +sdud pa ni mtha' yas pa'i ming dang tshig dang 'bru'i tshogs thams cad sdud pa'i phyir bla na med pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#683908#683910#TD4060E.TXT.r_439;TD4060E.TXT.r_440;TD4060E.TXT.r_441# yid ces bya ba'am / / +rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba yang rung ste / / +gang 'di skad ces bya ba 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pas yun ring po nas byi dor byas shing sbas la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658489#658497#TD4069E.TXT.r_5048;TD4069E.TXT.r_5049;TD4069E.TXT.r_5050;TD4069E.TXT.r_5051;TD4069E.TXT.r_5052;TD4069E.TXT.r_5053# ji ltar na phyis rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bsam pa brjod dgos so // / +rgyas par gsungs nas / / +sems zhes bya ba'am / /

column3: bshad pa dang bshad par bya ba'i chos thams cad 'dir 'dus pa'i phyir ro // / +rnam grangs bcu bdun po  'di las 'di ni spyi'i tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#683912#683921#TD4060E.TXT.r_440;TD4060E.TXT.r_441# rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba yang rung ste / / +gang 'di skad ces bya ba 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pas yun ring po nas byi dor byas shing sbas la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4061E.TXT.r#1531245#1531247#TD4061E.TXT.r_2535;TD4061E.TXT.r_2536# phyis rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bsam pas brjod dgos so // / +byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pas yun ring po nas byi dor byas shing zhes bya ba nas     // /
column6: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658498#658510#TD4069E.TXT.r_5052;TD4069E.TXT.r_5053# rnam par shes pa  zhes bya ba yang rung ste / / +gang 'di skad ces bya ba de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pas yun ring po nas byi dor byas shing sbas la bdag gir byas pa dang  'di ni bdag gi yin / /

column3: gzhan ni dbye ba'i tshig go // / +mdo sde 'di nyid kyi rnam grangs gsum zhig 'byung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#683928#683933#TD4060E.TXT.r_442;TD4060E.TXT.r_443;TD4060E.TXT.r_444# bdag gis byas pa dang  'di ni bdag gi yin / / +'di ni nga bdag yin / /
column5: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658511#658519#TD4069E.TXT.r_5053;TD4069E.TXT.r_5054;TD4069E.TXT.r_5055# gang 'di skad ces bya ba de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pas yun ring po nas byi dor byas shing sbas la bdag gir byas pa dang  'di ni bdag gi yin / /
column6: 1.788#TD4061E.TXT.r#1531303#1531309#TD4061E.TXT.r_2550;TD4061E.TXT.r_2551# 'di ni bdag gi yin zhes bya ba bdag gi ba'i rnam pa dang  'di ni nga bdag yin / /
column7: 0.021#TD4039E.TXT.r#1875920#1875920#TD4039E.TXT.r_7099;TD4039E.TXT.r_7100;TD4039E.TXT.r_7101# de la thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos ni  dmigs pa gang las lta bar gyur ba de dag skye bar 'gyur ba dang  rang gi gnas la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa dang  ngan song du 'gro bar byed pa'i gnas sdig pa 'dod pa la sogs pa chos ma yin pa dang  mi mthun par spyod pa yan chad gang la gnas na mi sdug pa dang  ngan  song gi rnam par smin pa de dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag gi yang ma yin no // / +'di ni bdag kyang ma yin te / / +'di ni bdag gi bdag kyang ma yin no zhes / /

column3: mtha' yas gdon mi za zhes pa ni byin gyi rlabs kyi khyad par bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658520#658527#TD4069E.TXT.r_5054;TD4069E.TXT.r_5055;TD4069E.TXT.r_5056# 'di ni nga bdag yin / / +'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no zhes bya ba khas blangs la gzung ba yin no zhes  bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu yin no // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa ni dbang po smin pa rnams kyi ched du gsungs     // / +pa'i don to // / +sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su zin pa ni sangs rgyas nyid la brten zhes pa'i don te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658528#658540#TD4069E.TXT.r_5055;TD4069E.TXT.r_5056;TD4069E.TXT.r_5057;TD4069E.TXT.r_5058;TD4069E.TXT.r_5059# 'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no zhes bya ba khas blangs la gzung ba yin no zhes  bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu yin no // / +ci'i phyir byi dor byas shing sbas pa yin zhe na / /

column3: 'di gsum gtso bo yin pa'i phyir smos so // / +mtha' yas pa ni rnam pa gnyis te / / +don mtha' yas pa dang tshig mtha' yas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658537#658551#TD4069E.TXT.r_5056;TD4069E.TXT.r_5058;TD4069E.TXT.r_5059;TD4069E.TXT.r_5057;TD4069E.TXT.r_5060;TD4069E.TXT.r_5061# ci'i phyir byi dor byas shing sbas pa yin zhe na / / +'di ltar de bdag gir byas pas so // / +ji ltar de bdag gir byas pa yin zhe na / /

column3: tshig mtha'  yas pa ni ston pa'i chos so // / +don ni bstan par bya ba'i chos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658550#658563#TD4069E.TXT.r_5061;TD4069E.TXT.r_5062;TD4069E.TXT.r_5063;TD4069E.TXT.r_5064# de'i rjes su 'brang bas zhes bya ba ni bdag gi ba dang   bdag gir rnam par lta ba gnyis kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: mdo las bcom ldan 'das chos kyi gdan de nyid la skyil mo krung bcas nas mtha' yas gdon mi za ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658564#658577#TD4069E.TXT.r_5064;TD4069E.TXT.r_5065# rnam pa gnyis kyis khas blangs pa'i phyir ro zhes gang bstan pa'i rnam pa gnyis po de ni 'di ni bdag gi yin zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung  ba'i tshig gsum po dag gis sbyor bar byed do // /

column3: sku mi gyo bar bzhugs shing sems mi gyo bar gyur  pa ni spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa'i chos dam pa ston pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658578#658590#TD4069E.TXT.r_5064;TD4069E.TXT.r_5065;TD4069E.TXT.r_5066;TD4069E.TXT.r_5067# rnam pa gnyis kyis khas blangs pa'i phyir ro zhes gang bstan pa'i rnam pa gnyis po de ni 'di ni bdag gi yin zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung  ba'i tshig gsum po dag gis sbyor bar byed do // / +rnam pa gnyis po zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni bdag tu lta ba rnam pa gnyis po lhan cig skyes pa dang  kun du brtags pa dang  go rims bzhin no // /

column3: chos zab mo 'di ston pa la spyod lam dam pa la zhugs te chos ston par 'os pa'i phyir skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658589#658603#TD4069E.TXT.r_5065;TD4069E.TXT.r_5066;TD4069E.TXT.r_5067;TD4069E.TXT.r_5068;TD4069E.TXT.r_5069;TD4069E.TXT.r_5070# rnam pa gnyis po zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni bdag tu lta ba rnam pa gnyis po lhan cig skyes pa dang  kun du brtags pa dang  go rims bzhin no // / +ji lta zhe na / / +bdag tu lta ba lhan cig skyes pa dang ni 'di ni nga bdag yin zhes bya ba ste / /

column3: bzhugs pa'ang rnam pa gnyis te / / +bdud 'dul ba'i bzhugs pa dang  bkra shis pa'i  tshul du bzhugs pa las 'di ni dang po'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658601#658615#TD4069E.TXT.r_5068;TD4069E.TXT.r_5069;TD4069E.TXT.r_5070;TD4069E.TXT.r_5071;TD4069E.TXT.r_5072;TD4069E.TXT.r_5073# ri dags  dang bya la sogs pa yang yod pa'o // / +kun du brtags ba dang ni 'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no zhes bya ba ste / /

column3: spyod lam dam pa yang rnam pa gsum ste / / +ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa la bzhugs pas sku dang thugs mi gyo bar gyur pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658616#658634#TD4069E.TXT.r_5073;TD4069E.TXT.r_5074# rnam grangs gzhan yang bdag tu lta ba rnam pa gnyis po zhes bya ba ni  gzhi tha mi dad pa dang  gzhi tha dad pa dang  go rims bzhin no // /

column3: yang na snod kyi 'jig rten na lha'i me tog 'bul ba dang  zhing rnam par gyo ba  la bzhugs pa'o // /

yang na bcud kyi 'jig rten na bzhugs pa ste / / +'khor bzhi dang brgyad kyis bskor cing ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa dang  chos zab mo rtogs par mdzad pas 'khor dga' zhing zhal du lta ba dang bzhugs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658635#658644#TD4069E.TXT.r_5074;TD4069E.TXT.r_5075# de la bdag tu lta ba gzhi tha mi dad pa ni gzhi nye bar len pa'i phung po'i mtshan nyid la tha mi dad par bzung nas 'di ni bdag yin no snyam pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658645#658652#TD4069E.TXT.r_5075;TD4069E.TXT.r_5076# 'jig tshogs la lta ba gzhi tha dad pa dang ni gzugs la sogs pa de rnams las gang    yang rung ba zhig bzung nas / /

column3: snyoms par zhugs zhes pa ni mtha' yas pa'i don  zab mo la sems mnyam par gzhag ces pa'i don to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658653#658666#TD4069E.TXT.r_5076;TD4069E.TXT.r_5077# 'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no snyam pa'o // / +de'i rjes la mthun pa'i sred pa gnyis po zhes bya ba ni bdag gi ba'i rnam pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i sred pa dang  bdag tu lta ba rnam pa gnyis kyi rnam pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i sred pa ste gzung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig  go // /

column3: 'grel pa las ting nge 'dzin la rnam pa gnyis te / / +thugs dang sku la mnga' brnyes shing phun sum tshogs pas zab mo 'di bshad pa la ting nge 'dzin la ma zhugs na gyo ba dang rtog pa 'byung ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa dang sgrib  pa thams cad dang bral ba ni mnga' brnyes pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658666#658687#TD4069E.TXT.r_5077;TD4069E.TXT.r_5078;TD4069E.TXT.r_5079# de'i rjes la mthun pa'i sred pa gnyis po zhes bya ba ni bdag gi ba'i rnam pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i sred pa dang  bdag tu lta BA RNAM PA GNYIS KYI rnam pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i sred pa ste gzung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig  go // /
column5: 0.026#TD4018E.TXT.r#3052284#3052284#TD4018E.TXT.r_6256# ji ltar skyes bu zhes te thag pa mdud pa por bas bum pa la sogs pa'i  don kha cig 'ching bas bcings pa mdud pa 'grol bas bkrol ba de bzhin du mnyam par mi 'jog pa'i ma rig pas bdag dang bdag gir chags pa dang  las kyi zhags pas bcings pa las bdag med pa gnyis rtogs na grol bar 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.028#TD4009E.TXT.r#344732#344732#TD4009E.TXT.r_3264;TD4009E.TXT.r_3265# de ltar las kyis rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims phun  sum tshogs par rig par bya'o // / +tshigs su bcad pa'i don bstan pas rnam grangs gzhan du'o // /
column7: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#633617#633617#TD4069E.TXT.r_1535# lta ba mi mthun pa rnams yin na ni rang gi lta bar mngon par dga' bar byed pas yongs su zhen pa ni 'di dag ji ltar na bdag gi lta bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa'o // /

column3: ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pas ting nge 'dzin gyis sgrib pa thams cad bsal bas chos ston pa la mnga' brnyes zhes pa'i don to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658685#658697#TD4069E.TXT.r_5078;TD4069E.TXT.r_5079;TD4069E.TXT.r_5080# de'i rjes su mthun pa'i sred pa yang bdag dang  bdag gi ba'i rnam par lta ba'i mjug thogs su der lta ba'i rjes su 'brang bas chags pa gang yin pa'o // / +rnam grangs gzhan yang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang  bdag tu lta ba gnyis kyis dang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni nga'o snyam pa'i  nga rgyal gyis ni 'di ni bdag yin zhes bya ba'o // /

column3: 'grel pa las mnga' brnyes pa yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +sems can so so'i dbang po dang mthun par bstan    pas byang chub kyi phyogs la 'dzud cing so so'i thabs dang gnyen po la sbyor bas zag pa med pa'i lam ston pa dang  gnyis su sems can rnams thog ma med pa'i dus nas nyon mongs pas dam du bcings pa rnams de'i gnyen por rnam par rtog pa dang gyo ba dang  khro sems la sogs pa'i  las zhi bar bya ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658698#658713#TD4069E.TXT.r_5079;TD4069E.TXT.r_5080;TD4069E.TXT.r_5081# rnam grangs gzhan yang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang  bdag tu lta ba gnyis kyis dang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni nga'o snyam pa'i  nga rgyal gyis ni 'di ni bdag yin zhes bya ba'o // / +bdag tu lta bas ni 'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no zhes bya ba dang  'di ni bdag gi yin zhes bya ba bdag gi ba'i rnam pa'i rnam grangs dang por gsungs pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658714#658723#TD4069E.TXT.r_5080;TD4069E.TXT.r_5081;TD4069E.TXT.r_5082# bdag tu lta bas ni 'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no zhes bya ba dang  'di ni bdag gi yin zhes bya ba bdag gi ba'i rnam pa'i rnam grangs dang por gsungs pa ste / / +de mngon par khas blangs pa'i phyir khas blangs pa yin no // / +de'i rjes su mthun  pa'i sred pa gnyis kyi ni nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi rjes su mthun pa dang  bdag tu lta ba'i rjes su mthun pa dang  rnam grangs dang po bdag gi ba'i rjes su mthun pa ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658724#658734#TD4069E.TXT.r_5082;TD4069E.TXT.r_5083;TD4069E.TXT.r_5084# de'i rjes su mthun  pa'i sred pa gnyis kyi ni nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi rjes su mthun pa dang  bdag tu lta ba'i rjes su mthun pa dang  rnam grangs dang po bdag gi ba'i rjes su mthun pa ste / /

column3: ting nge 'dzin de la zhugs shing mthus dbang sgyur ba'o // / +'grel pa las ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa'i phyir sa gyo ba dang  sngon bskal pa grangs med pa 'das pa'i don rnams zhes pa'ang ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa las 'byung gi gzhan gyis ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658735#658743#TD4069E.TXT.r_5083;TD4069E.TXT.r_5084;TD4069E.TXT.r_5085# de la chags pa'i phyir gzung ba yin no // / +'di thams cad ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni 'di ni bdag gi yin zhes bya ba  nas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658744#658758#TD4069E.TXT.r_5084;TD4069E.TXT.r_5085;TD4069E.TXT.r_5086;TD4069E.TXT.r_5087;TD4069E.TXT.r_5088# 'di thams cad ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni 'di ni bdag gi yin zhes bya ba  nas / / +khas blang sa la bzung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ni bdag gir byas pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: bcom ldan  'das ting nge 'dzin du ma zhugs pa'i thugs dang spyod pa mi mnga' ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658757#658766#TD4069E.TXT.r_5087;TD4069E.TXT.r_5088;TD4069E.TXT.r_5089;TD4069E.TXT.r_5090;TD4069E.TXT.r_5091# de'i rnam pa dang  de'i rgyu nyid kyis so // / +de'i rnam pa ni bdag gi ba'i rnam pa ste / /

column3: dus thams cad du ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes 'byung na / / +ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs zhes smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658767#658778#TD4069E.TXT.r_5089;TD4069E.TXT.r_5090;TD4069E.TXT.r_5091;TD4069E.TXT.r_5092;TD4069E.TXT.r_5093;TD4069E.TXT.r_5094;TD4069E.TXT.r_5095# 'di ni bdag gi yin zhes bya ba 'dis so // / +de'i rgyu nyid kyis kyang yin te / / +bdag gi ba'i rnam  pa'i rgyus te / /
column5: 0.023#TD4061E.TXT.r#1531280#1531280#TD4061E.TXT.r_2543;TD4061E.TXT.r_2544# bshad pa 'di ni bdag gir yin / / +'di ni nga bdag yin / /
column6: 0.026#TD4069E.TXT.r#658895#658895#TD4069E.TXT.r_5109# re zhig bdag tu lta ba log par bsgrub pa las dang bcas par yongs su bstan pa ni snga ma bzhin du bzung ba dang  'di ni nga bdag yin zhes bya ba'i tshig  'di gnyis bor te'o // /

column3: don rnam pa bcu'i phyir te / / +ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa dang  ting nge 'dzin  las bzhengs pas 'gro ba la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir dang  bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas 'od gtong ba la sogs pa mdzad pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin du ma zhugs na ltas de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ma yin par dogs pa bsal ba dang  yang na chos ston pa ting  nge 'dzin gyi dbang po bsdu bar bstan pa dang  chos zab mo ni ting nge 'dzin du ma zhugs pas chud dka' ste gus pa skye bar bstan pa dang  shes rab ni ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pas gdod skye'i gzhan gyis ma yin zhes ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa la gzung ba'i phyir dang  ting nge 'dzin dang shes  rab rdzogs pas chos ston gyi ma rdzogs pas ni ma yin par bstan pa dang  ma 'ongs pa na chos ston pa rnams tshul de dang 'dra ba'i sems kyis chos ston cig par bstan pa dang  tshul 'di bstan pas gzhan dag kyang sems shin tu nges par byas pa ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid pas gzhan  dag kyang sems nges par bstan pa dang  ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te ltas mang po bstan pas 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa chos gsol ba'i rtog pa skye'i gzhan gyis ma yin pa dang  yang gsang ba gsum bstan pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658777#658787#TD4069E.TXT.r_5093;TD4069E.TXT.r_5094;TD4069E.TXT.r_5095;TD4069E.TXT.r_5096;TD4069E.TXT.r_5097# 'di ni bdag yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di gnyis kyis so // / +smras pa / /
column5: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658787#658796#TD4069E.TXT.r_5096;TD4069E.TXT.r_5097;TD4069E.TXT.r_5098# 'di gnyis kyis de bdag gir byas pa yin zhe na / / +bdag gi rnam pa yod na bdag gi ba'i rnam pa yang gdon mi za bar 'byung bas so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658797#658807#TD4069E.TXT.r_5097;TD4069E.TXT.r_5098# bdag gi rnam pa yod na bdag gi ba'i rnam pa yang gdon mi za bar 'byung bas so // / +mdor na  zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni mdor na mdo sde'i dum bu 'dis ni byis pa rnams kyi so so rnam par shes pa la bdag tu lta ba log par bsgrub pa dang  sred pa log par bsgrub pa las dang bcas pa yin par yongs su bstan pa yin no // /
column7: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658808#658818#TD4069E.TXT.r_5098;TD4069E.TXT.r_5099# mdor na  zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni mdor na mdo sde'i dum bu 'dis ni byis pa rnams kyi so so rnam par shes pa la bdag tu lta ba log par bsgrub pa dang  sred pa log par bsgrub pa las dang bcas pa yin par yongs su bstan pa yin no // /
column8: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658819#658839#TD4069E.TXT.r_5099;TD4069E.TXT.r_5100;TD4069E.TXT.r_5101;TD4069E.TXT.r_5102# de la las ni byi dor byas shing sbas pa zhes bya ba'i tshig     // /
column9: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658840#658856#TD4069E.TXT.r_5102;TD4069E.TXT.r_5103;TD4069E.TXT.r_5104;TD4069E.TXT.r_5105# bdag gir byas pa dang  'di ni bdag gi yin zhes BYA BA LA SOGS PA tshig lnga dag gis rig par bya'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658856#658865#TD4069E.TXT.r_5104;TD4069E.TXT.r_5105;TD4069E.TXT.r_5106# bdag tu lta ba nyid log par bsgrub pa yin pas bdag tu lta ba log par bsgrub pa yin no // / +de bzhin du sred pa nyid log par bsgrub pa yin pas sred pa log par bsgrub pa'o // /
column11: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658865#658879#TD4069E.TXT.r_5105;TD4069E.TXT.r_5106;TD4069E.TXT.r_5107;TD4069E.TXT.r_5108# de bzhin du sred pa nyid log par bsgrub pa yin pas sred pa log par bsgrub pa'o // / +re zhig rnam grangs dang po'i bsdus pa'i don ni de lta bu yin no // /
column12: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658880#658892#TD4069E.TXT.r_5107;TD4069E.TXT.r_5108;TD4069E.TXT.r_5109# gnyis pa'i ni  bdag tu lta ba dang  nga rgyal dang  sred pa log par bsgrub pa yin par yongs su bstan pa yin no // / +ji ltar byas pas she na / /
column13: 0.021#TD4069E.TXT.r#631380#631382#TD4069E.TXT.r_1227;TD4069E.TXT.r_1228# bcings pa nyid kyi rgyus 'khor ba las skyo bar bya ba'i phyir ro // / +mdor na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni mdor na mdo sde'i dum bu 'dir nyon mongs pa'i rten gyi dbye ba dang  dmigs pa'i dbye ba dang  rang bzhin gyi dbye ba dang  gnas skabs kyi dbye ba las nyes  dmigs bstan pa ni dge slong dag dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang la la mig ro myong bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di dag gis so // /

column3: ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pas thugs gsang ba dang  'od     // / +la sogs pa'i ltas kyis sku gsang ba dang  chos ston pas gsung gi gsang ba bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658890#658909#TD4069E.TXT.r_5109;TD4069E.TXT.r_5110;TD4069E.TXT.r_5111# re zhig bdag tu lta ba log par bsgrub pa las dang bcas par yongs su bstan pa ni snga ma bzhin du bzung ba dang  'di ni nga bdag yin zhes bya ba'i tshig  'di gnyis bor te'o // /
column5: 0.026#TD4069E.TXT.r#658774#658774#TD4069E.TXT.r_5092;TD4069E.TXT.r_5093# 'di ni nga bdag yin / / +'di ni bdag yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di gnyis kyis so // /

column3: yang rtog pa na re dam pa'i chos punda r'i ka 'chad par dgongs na dam chos padma dkar po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'os kyi don mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin  la 'jug par mi 'os so zhes pa la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#683940#683950#TD4060E.TXT.r_444;TD4060E.TXT.r_445# 'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no zhes khas blangs la bzung ba yin no zhes bya ba dang  bcom ldan 'das kyis dper na grong ngam grong rdal dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658910#658929#TD4069E.TXT.r_5110;TD4069E.TXT.r_5111;TD4069E.TXT.r_5112;TD4069E.TXT.r_5113# nga rgyal log par bsgrub pa las dang bcas pa yang 'di ni nga bdag yin zhes bya ba'i tshig 'dis so // / +sred pa log par bsgrub pa las dang bcas pa yang snga ma bzhin no // /

column3: de ni ji ltar rdo rje gcod pa las kyang / / +lus bsrang dran pa mngon du bzhag ste chos ston to zhes 'byung ba bzhin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#683942#683953#TD4060E.TXT.r_444;TD4060E.TXT.r_445# 'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no zhes khas blangs la bzung ba yin no zhes bya ba dang  bcom ldan 'das kyis dper na grong ngam grong rdal dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658921#658942#TD4069E.TXT.r_5112;TD4069E.TXT.r_5113;TD4069E.TXT.r_5114;TD4069E.TXT.r_5115;TD4069E.TXT.r_5116# bcom ldan 'das kyis dper na grong ngam grong rdal dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na / /
column6: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658957#658964#TD4069E.TXT.r_5119# 'chi  ba la mi dga' ba zhig 'ongs pa dang  de 'di snyam du mdag ma me lce med pa du ba med pa'i mdag mas gang ba'i klung 'dir bdag lhung na bdag 'chi ba'am / /

column3: sngar mtha' yas gdon mi za ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te phyis dam pa'i chos punda r'i ka ston pa yang snga ma ni byang  chub sems dpa'i ched du bstan / /
column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#683962#683979#TD4060E.TXT.r_446;TD4060E.TXT.r_447;TD4060E.TXT.r_448;TD4060E.TXT.r_449;TD4060E.TXT.r_450;TD4060E.TXT.r_451;TD4060E.TXT.r_452;TD4060E.TXT.r_453# de nas mi byis pa'i rang  bzhin can ma yin pa / / +rmongs pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa / / +shes rab kyi rang bzhin can / /
column5: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658942#658954#TD4069E.TXT.r_5114;TD4069E.TXT.r_5115;TD4069E.TXT.r_5116;TD4069E.TXT.r_5117;TD4069E.TXT.r_5118;TD4069E.TXT.r_5119# rmongs pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa / / +shes rab kyi rang bzhin can bde ba 'dod pa / / +sdug bsngal la mi dga' ba / /
column6: 0.014#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3106770#3106771#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2119;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2120;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2121# de la sems can gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa / / +rmongs pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa / / +shes rab  dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can / /

column3: phyi ma ni nyan thos rnams kyi ched du bstan / / +yang snga ma ni rang bzhin / / +phyi ma ni byed pa'i las bstan te / /
column4: 1.788#TD4060E.TXT.r#683987#683987#TD4060E.TXT.r_453# 'chi ba la mi dga' ba zhig 'ongs pa dang  de 'di snyam du mdag  ma me lce med pa du ba med pa'i mdag mes gang ba'i klung 'dir bdag lhung na bdag 'chi ba'am / /

column3: so so'i dbang po'i rim pa dang sbyar te ming du btags pas 'gal ba med do // / +mdo las bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu zhes pa  nas ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#683988#683998#TD4060E.TXT.r_453;TD4060E.TXT.r_454;TD4060E.TXT.r_455# 'chi ba la mi dga' ba zhig 'ongs pa dang  de 'di snyam du mdag  ma me lce med pa du ba med pa'i mdag mes gang ba'i klung 'dir bdag lhung na bdag 'chi ba'am / /
column5: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658965#658979#TD4069E.TXT.r_5119;TD4069E.TXT.r_5120;TD4069E.TXT.r_5121# 'chi  ba la mi dga' ba zhig 'ongs pa dang  de 'di snyam du mdag ma me lce med pa du ba med pa'i mdag mas gang ba'i klung 'dir bdag lhung na bdag 'chi ba'am / /

column3: me tog gi char mngon par bab cing 'brul lo zhes pa'i bar du ni snod kyi 'jig rten rnam pa gnyis la me tog brul ba dang sa gyo ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658978#658990#TD4069E.TXT.r_5120;TD4069E.TXT.r_5121;TD4069E.TXT.r_5122;TD4069E.TXT.r_5123# 'chi ba la thug pa tsam gyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas / / +de de las bsring bar sems pa dang  sring ba sngon du  gnyer bar byed cing / /

column3: da 'dir me tog 'brul ba ni me tog yid du 'ong ba dang  dga' bar byed pa dag yin pas chos 'di nyan pa rnams sems zhi zhing dga' ba  bskyed pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#658989#659005#TD4069E.TXT.r_5122;TD4069E.TXT.r_5123;TD4069E.TXT.r_5124# bsring ba la so sor brtags nas sems 'jog par byed do // / +mdag ma'i klung dang 'dra bar 'dod pa rnams kyang de bzhin du gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu yin no // /

column3: me tog de dag gi yon tan yang rnam pa lnga ste / / +kha bye zhing zum pa yang chos 'di thos pas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma bsal bar bstan pa dang  'jig rten gyi rgyan du byed pa ni chos 'di thos pas yon tan mang pos lus rgyan du byed pa dang  kha 'bye bas ni theg pa rnam  gcig don 'byed par ston pa dang  me tog gi rjes la 'bras bu 'byung ba bzhin chos 'di thos pas byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa dang  dri zhim po yid du 'ong ba ni chos 'di thos pas nang gi yon tan phun sum tshogs pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan yid du 'ong bas  khyab par gyur pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#13163#13177#TD4036E.TXT.r_1931;TD4036E.TXT.r_1932# mdo'i sde dang  dbyangs kyis bsnyad ba'i sde dang  lung du bstan pa'i sde dang  tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang  ched du brjod pa'i sde dang  gleng gzhi'i sde dang  rtogs pa brjod pa'i  sde dang ; /
column5: 0.0#TD4049E.TXT.r#2304936#2304941#TD4049E.TXT.r_3032# sde dang  lung du bstan pa'i sde dang  tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang  ched du brjod pa'i sde dang  gleng gzhi'i sde dang  rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang  de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang  skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang  shin tu rgyas pa'i sde  dang  rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang  gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#659006#659020#TD4069E.TXT.r_5124;TD4069E.TXT.r_5125;TD4069E.TXT.r_5126# so sor brtags nas sems 'jog pa zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyis dpyad nas    sems gtod pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column7: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#659020#659029#TD4069E.TXT.r_5125;TD4069E.TXT.r_5126;TD4069E.TXT.r_5127# ji ltar don du gnyer ba dang yid la byed pa skye ba de ni yon tan nyid du zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung bas ston to // / +dper na sman ro zhim pa'am tsha ba la byed pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni sman ro zhim pa la ni rang gi ngang gis don du gnyer bar byed la / /
column8: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#659029#659042#TD4069E.TXT.r_5126;TD4069E.TXT.r_5127;TD4069E.TXT.r_5128;TD4069E.TXT.r_5129;TD4069E.TXT.r_5130# dper na sman ro zhim pa'am tsha ba la byed pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni sman ro zhim pa la ni rang gi ngang gis don du gnyer bar byed la / / +tsha ba la ni so sor  brtags nas de la sems 'jog par byed / /
column9: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#659043#659052#TD4069E.TXT.r_5129;TD4069E.TXT.r_5130;TD4069E.TXT.r_5131;TD4069E.TXT.r_5132# dge slong dag dge slong chos shes pa yang yin no // / +ji lta bu yin zhe na / /
column10: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#659053#659067#TD4069E.TXT.r_5131;TD4069E.TXT.r_5132# 'di la dge slong gis chos shes pa ni 'di lta ste / / +mdo'i sde dang  dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang  lung du bstan pa'i sde dang  tshigs su bcad  pa'i sde dang  ched du brjod pa'i sde dang  gleng gzhi'i sde dang  rtogs pa rjod pa'i sde dang  de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang  skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang  shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang  rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang  gtan la bab par bstan pa'i sde'o zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu yin no // /
column11: 1.192#TD4060E.TXT.r#684025#684029#TD4060E.TXT.r_456;TD4060E.TXT.r_457;TD4060E.TXT.r_458;TD4060E.TXT.r_459# mdag me'i klung dang 'dra bar 'dod pa rnams kyang de bzhin no zhes gsungs pa zhes bya ba dang  dge slong dag dge slong tshes shes pa'ang yin no // / +ji lta bu yin zhe na / / +'di la dge slong gis chos shes pa ni 'di lta ste / /
column12: 0.007#TD4061E.TXT.r#1544475#1544478#TD4061E.TXT.r_4331;TD4061E.TXT.r_4332# ji ltar na dge slong chos shes pa yang yin zhe na / / +'di la dge slong chos shes pa ni 'di lta ste mdo sde dang  dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column13: 0.008#TD4061E.TXT.r#1531424#1531425#TD4061E.TXT.r_2564;TD4061E.TXT.r_2565# dper na sman ro zhi ma pa'am tsha ba la byed pa bzhin no // / +dge slong dag dge slong chos shes pa yang yin no // /
column14: 0.014#TD4036E.TXT.r#2095#2096#TD4036E.TXT.r_144# mdo'i sde dang  dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang  lung bstan pa'i sde dang  tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang  ched du brjod pa'i sde dang  gleng gzhi'i sde dang  rtog pa brjod pa'i sde dang  de lta bu'i byung  ba'i sde dang  skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang  shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang  rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang  gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde'i chos ston par mdzad pa yin te / /
column15: 0.019#TD4061E.TXT.r#1531433#1531433#TD4061E.TXT.r_2567;TD4061E.TXT.r_2568# 'di la dge slong gis chos shes pa ni 'di lta ste / / +mdo'i sde dang  dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column16: 0.022#TD4061E.TXT.r#1516596#1516597#TD4061E.TXT.r_402;TD4061E.TXT.r_403# gsung rab la ni 'di la dge slong chos shes pa ni 'di lta ste / /
column17: 0.026#TD4054E.TXT.r#1048380#1048380#TD4054E.TXT.r_9041;TD4054E.TXT.r_9042# ji ltar na dge slong thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na / / +'di la dge slong ni 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rgya cher sbyar te / /
column18: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2343590#2343590#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3805# mdo'i sde dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang lung bstan pa'i sde dang tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang  ched du    brjod pa'i sde dang  gleng gzhi'i sde dang  rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang  de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang  skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang  shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang  rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang  gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs  pas lan du gsungs pa yang dag par ston to // /
column19: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#18333#18333#TD4036E.TXT.r_2666# mdo'i sde dang  dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang  lung bstan pa'i sde dang  tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang  ched du brjod pa'i sde dang  gleng gzhi'i sde dang  rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang  de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang  skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang   shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang  rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang  gtan la phab bar bstan pa'i chos kyi sde dag ste / /
column20: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3113925#3113925#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3191# gling gzhi'i sde dang  rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang  de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang  skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang  shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang  rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang  gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde gang dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bshad pa de dag byang  chub sems dpas legs par thos // /
column21: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#207498#207498#TD4035E.TXT.r_14342# mdo'i sde dang  dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang  lung bstan pa'i sde dang  tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang  ched du brjod pa'i sde dang  gleng gzhi'i sde dang  rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang  de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang  skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang  shin tu  rgyas pa'i sde dang  rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang  gtan la phab pa bstan pa'i sde'i chos dge ba dang  mi dge ba dang  kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang  kha na ma tho ba med pa rnams nas / /

column3: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gyo ba ni ma yin no // / +de gyo ba  yang rnam pa gsum ste / / +de bzhin gshegs pa yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa dang  bltams pa dang  rab tu byung ba dang  mngon par byang chub pa dang  chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang  mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus su gyo ste 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang sbyar ba'o // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur dga' bar gyur to zhes pa'i bar du ni 'di man chad bcud kyi 'jig rten bstan te / /

column5: 0.019#TD4068E.TXT.r#575172#575172#TD4068E.TXT.r_587# yang na las dge ba dang las mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i 'bras bu bde ba dang  sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa gsum myong bar byed pas na tshor ba zhes  bya'o ; / /

column3: mdo las bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi bar gyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gcig byung zhes pa ni de man chad bshad pa'i rgyu phun sum tshogs pa bstan     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#659258#659269#TD4069E.TXT.r_5160# gang DAG LAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i nyan thos la sogs pa rnams lung ston par mdzad pa ni mdo sde gang las 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i nyan thos  dang  dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu ba la sogs pa rnams lung ston pa ste / /

column3: 'grel pa las 'gro ba pha la po che rnams de lta bu'i ltas ngo mtshar du gyur pa mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa de yang bdag cag la chos 'chad do snyam pa'i spro ba'i sems skye ba'i bshad pa'i rgyu phun sum tshogs pa ste / /

column3: rnam pa gnyis  su rnam pa drug tu gyo bar bstan nas / / +de'i 'og tu chos bstan par mdzad pa ni / /

column3: chos zab mo rang gi rig pa'i don yin pas sngar cho 'phrul bstan te gzod chos 'di ston par mdzad pas de'i phyir chos bshad pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#659337#659347#TD4069E.TXT.r_5175;TD4069E.TXT.r_5176# dge slong dag rigs kyi du de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin gyi / / +de'i rus bu la  mchod pa byos shig ces de las bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag smra mkhas mchog tu lung bstan pa'i bar du de la sogs pa lta bu'o // /

column3: sngar lha'i me tog 'brul ba dang sa rnam par gyo ba  bstan pa yang ngo mtshar du bya ba yin mod kyi 'od kyis snang bar mdzad pa 'di nyid chos zab mo rang gi rig pa bstan pa'i ltas bsam gyis mi khyab par kun gyis mthong bas bshad pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o // /

column6: 5.960#TD4061E.TXT.r#1531474#1531478#TD4061E.TXT.r_2572;TD4061E.TXT.r_2573# lung du bstan pa'i sde ni gang las bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i nyan thos la sogs pa rnams lung ston par mdzad pa dang  nges pa'i don gang yin pa'o // / +tshigs su bcad pa'i sde ni tshig gnyis  dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug tu tshigs su sbyar bas bshad pa gang yin pa'o // /

column3: 'di ni dang po  smin ma bzhin gyi rgyan yin pa bzhin theg pa chen po'i gzhung de yang gtsor yin par bstan pa dang  mtshams zhes bstan pas dbu ma'i don mtshon pa dang  dkar po zhes smos pas kha dog thams cad kyi gzhi yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#659390#659404#TD4069E.TXT.r_5181;TD4069E.TXT.r_5182;TD4069E.TXT.r_5183# gang las bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa mdzad do zhes bya ba ni dper na de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyi 'phred nang du yang dag  'jog las bzhengs nas / /

column3: de bzhin du mdo sde 'di yang theg pa rnam gsum gyi gzhi yin  par bstan pa'o // /

column3: 'od de yang rnam pa bdun te / / +mi chen po'i cha yin pas 'gro ba dad pa skye bar 'gyur ba dang  mun pa sel bas ma rig pa'i sa 'joms pa dang  snang ba des mtshon pas 'jig rten nas 'dren  ba dang nang gi bstan pa ye shes kyi 'od yin par mtshon pa dang  'od kyis reg pa rnams sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa dang  'od kyis reg pa rnams chos nyan par bskul ba dang  yul la chags pa rnams skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir te bdun no // /

column7: 0.018#TD4052E.TXT.r#2850433#2850435#TD4052E.TXT.r_1103;TD4052E.TXT.r_1104# de ni drug car la yang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro // / +mdo sde pa la dpe grub par bya ba'i yang phyir te / /

column11: 0.022#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1457586#1457586#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_6760# yig 'bru'i yan lag  rnams go bar bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni 'di ni log par smras pa yin no zhes bya ba yin te / /

column14: 0.024#TD4000E.TXT.r#2794959#2794960#TD4000E.TXT.r_70# de la bdag la yid ches pa bskyed pa dang  yid brten du  rung bas mdo sde gsungs par bstan pas de la gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir yang dag par sdud par byed pas thams cad du thog mar gleng gzhi smos te / /
