column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693915#693917#TD4083E.TXT.r_1145;TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# nga rgyal gyi grogs byed du mi 'gro na / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694239#694243#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182;TD4083E.TXT.r_1183# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694282#694288#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187;TD4083E.TXT.r_1188# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694337#694339#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694410#694413#TD4083E.TXT.r_1197;TD4083E.TXT.r_1198# byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column13: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column14: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column15: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#694050#694051#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o // / +mdo las / / +de ni snyoms pa'i yid kyis ma snyoms med // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691151#691160#TD4083E.TXT.r_840;TD4083E.TXT.r_841# le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +de blangs pas bdag nyid chags par 'gyur bar  mthong ba dang  sbyin pa 'khrul du dogs pa dang  'gyod par 'gyur bar dogs pa dang  de dbul zhing phongs par 'gyur bar dogs pa dang  sbyin pa'i dngos po de dge 'dun nam mchod rten gyi yin du dogs pa dang  gzhan la mi rigs par 'phrog pa yin du dogs pa dang  rgyu des    de la gnod par 'gyur ba zhig na nyes pa med do // /

column3: ces pa nas / / +sems can gcig bzhin 'gro ba gzhan la'o // / +zhes pa'i bar du ni 'di snyoms par ston pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691161#691170#TD4083E.TXT.r_841# de blangs pas bdag nyid chags par 'gyur bar  mthong ba dang  sbyin pa 'khrul du dogs pa dang  'gyod par 'gyur bar dogs pa dang  de dbul zhing phongs par 'gyur bar dogs pa dang  sbyin pa'i dngos po de dge 'dun nam mchod rten gyi yin du dogs pa dang  gzhan la mi rigs par 'phrog pa yin du dogs pa dang  rgyu des    de la gnod par 'gyur ba zhig na nyes pa med do // /

column3: bdag dang  bdag gi ba dang bral ba dang  byams sdang spangs pa dang  nye ring gi sems med pa dang  chos 'chab pa med pa dang  phrag dog med pas thams cad la 'dra bar chos ston pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691171#691180#TD4083E.TXT.r_841;TD4083E.TXT.r_842# de blangs pas bdag nyid chags par 'gyur bar  mthong ba dang  sbyin pa 'khrul du dogs pa dang  'gyod par 'gyur bar dogs pa dang  de dbul zhing phongs par 'gyur bar dogs pa dang  sbyin pa'i dngos po de dge 'dun nam mchod rten gyi yin du dogs pa dang  gzhan la mi rigs par 'phrog pa yin du dogs pa dang  rgyu des    de la gnod par 'gyur ba zhig na nyes pa med do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691180#691196#TD4083E.TXT.r_841;TD4083E.TXT.r_842;TD4083E.TXT.r_843;TD4083E.TXT.r_844# de blangs pas bdag nyid chags par 'gyur bar  mthong ba dang  sbyin pa 'khrul du dogs pa dang  'gyod par 'gyur bar dogs pa dang  de dbul zhing phongs par 'gyur bar dogs pa dang  sbyin pa'i dngos po de dge 'dun nam mchod rten gyi yin du dogs pa dang  gzhan la mi rigs par 'phrog pa yin du dogs pa dang  rgyu des    de la gnod par 'gyur ba zhig na nyes pa med do // / +chos 'dod pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /

column3: mdo las / / +las gzhan mi byed rab tu chos 'chad de // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691344#691351#TD4083E.TXT.r_859;TD4083E.TXT.r_860# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 1.788#TD4083E.TXT.r#693030#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693082#693083#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061;TD4083E.TXT.r_1062# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692645#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007;TD4083E.TXT.r_1008# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693896#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143;TD4083E.TXT.r_1144# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693975#693975#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694131#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: zhes pa nas / / +sprin gyis char pa mngon par phab pa bzhin // / +zhes  pa'i bar du ni gcig tu phan 'dogs shing chos 'chad pa ste / /

column11: 0.021#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811958#1811958#TD4082E.TXT.r_631;TD4082E.TXT.r_632# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column18: 0.022#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809389#1809389#TD4082E.TXT.r_307;TD4082E.TXT.r_308# sems can  yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column19: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#692285#692285#TD4083E.TXT.r_964# byang chub sems dpa' log pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba rnams dang du len cing mi 'dzem la sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column24: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693685#693685#TD4083E.TXT.r_1121# byang  chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis dam pa yin pa'i rlom sems kyis bdag la chags pa dang  gzhan la khong khro bas brnyas pa dang bcas pa dang  gshe ba dang bcas pas bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column25: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693474#693474#TD4083E.TXT.r_1102# byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyid med kyang sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin yod bzhin du phyi rol gyi bstan bcos te mu stegs can gyi bstan bcos  la brtson par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694238#694243#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182;TD4083E.TXT.r_1183# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694337#694339#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694410#694412#TD4083E.TXT.r_1197;TD4083E.TXT.r_1198# byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#691055#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column14: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#694180#694181#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column15: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694569#694569#TD4083E.TXT.r_1212;TD4083E.TXT.r_1213# skrod par mi byed na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: langs zhes pa ni sems can gyi dbang po smin pa la bzhengs pa ste / / +thugs rje chen pos nam  yang sems can gyi don mdzad pa la skyo ba mi mnga' ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691219#691231#TD4083E.TXT.r_845;TD4083E.TXT.r_846;TD4083E.TXT.r_847;TD4083E.TXT.r_848# le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +nyes pa med pa  ni pham par 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o // /

column3: mdo las / / +'phags pa dang ni ma rabs mtshungs pa'i blo // / +zhes pa nas / / +skyo ba thams cad rab tu rnam spangs nas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691232#691244#TD4083E.TXT.r_847;TD4083E.TXT.r_848;TD4083E.TXT.r_849# gang yang pham par 'gyur ba'i phyogs de las nyes byas kyi ltung ba 'di dbye ste / / +de ser snas kun nas blang ba yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: zhes pa'i bar du ni bzang ngan bkol ba med par chos ston pa ste / / +dge ba'i rtsa ba la gzigs shing chos ston pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691243#691255#TD4083E.TXT.r_849;TD4083E.TXT.r_850;TD4083E.TXT.r_851# de bzhin du 'og ma rnams la yang nyon mongs pa de dang des dbye ba byas pas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba'i phyogs rnams  rjes su dran par bya'o // /

column3: mdo las  ngas ni yang dag chos kyi char pa phab // / +ces pa nas / / +rnam pa mang po'i sa la gnas 'gyur ba // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691254#691264#TD4083E.TXT.r_850;TD4083E.TXT.r_851# pham par 'gyur ba'i sgo nas mi 'dra bar bshad pa yin te / /

column3: zhes pa'i bar du ni sems can rnams su thos pas bde ba rnyed pa ston te / / +dang po'i tshig dgus ni dpe dang don du sbyar / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691265#691276#TD4083E.TXT.r_851;TD4083E.TXT.r_852# rang bzhin shes par mi 'gyur ba dang  gzhan ma yin pa dang  ltung ba gsum pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi chos kyis bsdus par grub po // /

column3: de'i 'og ma tshig phyed dang bzhis ni 'bras bu dang me tog rgyu mi mthun pa'i dpes 'bras bu dang  sbyor ba bstan / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691277#691298#TD4083E.TXT.r_852;TD4083E.TXT.r_853# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694261#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.010#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692273#TD4083E.TXT.r_963;TD4083E.TXT.r_964# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.015#TD4083E.TXT.r#693895#693895#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693082#693082#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#694131#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694448#694448#TD4083E.TXT.r_1202# gzhan dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa smra bar mi byed pa ni yon tan  gyi bsngags pa smra ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: sdar tshig brgyad kyis ni don bstan / / +yang tshig phyed kyis ni dpe bstan / /
tshig dang po la yang gnyis su phye ste / / +sngar tshig gcig gis ni spyir gleng / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691299#691307#TD4083E.TXT.r_853;TD4083E.TXT.r_854;TD4083E.TXT.r_855# byang chub sems dpa' sems can tshul khrims 'chal zhing log par spyod pa rnams la kun nas mnar sems la sogs  bas yal bar 'dor zhing tshul khrims 'chal ba nyid kyi rkyen gyis de rnams la khyad du gsod cing de rnams la phan pa dang bde ba la gnod par mi byed na / /

column3: tshig bdun gyis ni so sor phye ste bstan pa la 'di ni dang po'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691308#691315#TD4083E.TXT.r_854;TD4083E.TXT.r_855;TD4083E.TXT.r_856;TD4083E.TXT.r_857# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur te / / +snyom las la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste / /

column3: sa la gnas 'gyur ba zhes pa ni theg pa chen po'i sa bcu dang rigs kyis dang  brgyang    pa dang ; / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i bar du so sor phye ste bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691316#691325#TD4083E.TXT.r_856;TD4083E.TXT.r_857;TD4083E.TXT.r_858# de rnams nyid la rjes su brtse  bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +de rnams 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan mang po dag gi sems bsrungs na nyes pa med do // /
column5: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#694423#694423#TD4083E.TXT.r_1199;TD4083E.TXT.r_1200# na ste ma nus pa dang  'dul bar 'dod pa dang  bya ba de gnod pa dang ldan pa yin pa dang      // / +dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan mang po dag gi sems srung bar 'dod pa dang  mu stegs can tshar gcad pa'i phyir ni nyes pa med do // /

column3: mdo las / / +lha mi'i nang nas yid du 'ong ba dang / / +zhes pa nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691326#691333#TD4083E.TXT.r_857;TD4083E.TXT.r_858# de rnams 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan mang po dag gi sems bsrungs na nyes pa med do // / +pha rol zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nyan thos la sogs pa gzhan dag dad par bya ba'i phyir bslab pa bcas pa rnams la slob par     // /

column3: de dag rab tu phra zhing phra ba'i sman // / +zhes pa'i bar du ni dpyad na rigs med pa'i dpe ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691334#691349#TD4083E.TXT.r_858;TD4083E.TXT.r_859;TD4083E.TXT.r_860# pha rol zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nyan thos la sogs pa gzhan dag dad par bya ba'i phyir bslab pa bcas pa rnams la slob par     // /
column5: 1.192#TD4083E.TXT.r#693029#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: ji ltar rtsa bar tu phra la char gyis brlan pa bzhin no // /
column4: 0.010#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.010#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.010#TD4083E.TXT.r#693973#693975#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#691448#691449#TD4083E.TXT.r_869;TD4083E.TXT.r_870# gzhan gyi don lhur blang ba la bya ba chung ba ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690874#TD4083E.TXT.r_814# ches rgan pa la gus par mi byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod pa dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#690826#690826#TD4083E.TXT.r_809# sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang du mi len cing 'dod pa chung ba dang  chog shes pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693383#693383#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693711#693711#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694305#694305#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# 'khor rnams kyi don mi byed pa ni chos  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694534#694534#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column14: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694632#694632#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693203#693203#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#691120#691120#TD4083E.TXT.r_837# len par mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi bsod nams kyi grogs su 'gro ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos te / /

column3: 'phags pa nyan  thos rnams ni sman par ma bzhin no // / +'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sman gyi sdong po chen po bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691352#691363#TD4083E.TXT.r_859;TD4083E.TXT.r_860# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +rab tu byung BA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPAS gzhan ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba dang  dad pa rnams phyir zhing dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir  bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba las bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba spangs bar bya ba'i phyir bslab pa'i gzhi bcas pa de rnams la / /
column5: 5.960#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342418#1342426#TD4037E.TXT.r_3618;TD4037E.TXT.r_3619# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NI bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan dag gi sems bsrung ba'i phyir ma dad pa  rnams dad par bya ba dang  dad pa rnams phyir zhing dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir / /
column6: 5.960#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811686#1811686#TD4082E.TXT.r_592# ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba dang  dad pa rnams phyir zhing  'byung bar bya ba'i phyir byed na nyes pa med do // /
column7: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342450#1342451#TD4037E.TXT.r_3623# de dag kyang ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba dang  dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir gzhan gyi yid mi srung bar mi byed de / /
column8: 0.016#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809699#1809700#TD4082E.TXT.r_357# de dag kyang ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba dang  dad pa    rnams phyir zhing 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir gzhan gyi yid mi srung bar mi byed de bslab pa rnams la slob na / /
column9: 0.020#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809668#1809675#TD4082E.TXT.r_354# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NI bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan dag gi sems bsrung ba'i phyir ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba dang  dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir so so thar pa'i  'dul ba las bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de LA NYAN THOS RNAMS DANG mtshungs par slob ste tha dad par mi byed do // /

column3: mdo las / / +de dag chung ste 'jig rten 'di na gang // / +zhes pa nas / / +de ni sman gyi mchog ces bya ba yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691364#691381#TD4083E.TXT.r_860;TD4083E.TXT.r_861;TD4083E.TXT.r_862# rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpas gzhan ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba dang  dad pa rnams phyir zhing dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir  bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba las bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba spangs bar bya ba'i phyir bslab pa'i gzhi bcas pa de rnams la / /

column3: zhes pa'i bar du ni sman gyi sdong po'i dpe rnam pa gnyis bstan pa ste / / +sangs  rgyas su de 'dra ba'i spyod pa can sangs rgyas su nges zhes pa'i don to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691144#691147#TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691373#691389#TD4083E.TXT.r_860;TD4083E.TXT.r_861;TD4083E.TXT.r_862;TD4083E.TXT.r_863;TD4083E.TXT.r_864# rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpas gzhan ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba dang  dad pa rnams phyir zhing dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir  bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba las bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba spangs bar bya ba'i phyir bslab pa'i gzhi bcas pa de rnams la / / +ma dad pa dang ma gus pas mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691471#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692817#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693915#693916#TD4083E.TXT.r_1145;TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# nga rgyal gyi grogs byed du mi 'gro na / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694089#694092#TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167# sems can dag mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyis rig pa ston par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694239#694241#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694282#694285#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694338#694339#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column14: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694411#694412#TD4083E.TXT.r_1197;TD4083E.TXT.r_1198# byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column15: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#694180#694181#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column16: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#690903#690904#TD4083E.TXT.r_816;TD4083E.TXT.r_817# khong  khro ba la sogs pas gus par mi byed cing stan las mi ldang la stan mi stobs na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column17: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column18: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column19: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694050#694050#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column20: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694569#694569#TD4083E.TXT.r_1212;TD4083E.TXT.r_1213# skrod par mi byed na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' sa bdun pa man chad ni sman chung du zhes bya / / +sa brgyad pa yan chad ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691390#691397#TD4083E.TXT.r_863;TD4083E.TXT.r_864# de  la chos gang dang gang la kun du spyod par byed pa de ni nyes par 'gyur te / / +byang chub sems dpas ni gzhan rnams kyi las la ches lhag par bya ba yin pa dang  rab tu byung bar gyur pas ni rang gi bslab pa rnams nges par bsrung dgos pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: sman gyi sdong po chen po zhes bya ste spyod pa mi nyams pa zhes pa'i don to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691398#691405#TD4083E.TXT.r_864;TD4083E.TXT.r_865# byang chub sems dpas ni gzhan rnams kyi las la ches lhag par bya ba yin pa dang  rab tu byung bar gyur pas ni rang gi bslab pa rnams nges par bsrung dgos pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: mdo las / / +bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po gang bzhugs pa // / +zhas pa nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691406#691413#TD4083E.TXT.r_864;TD4083E.TXT.r_865# byang chub sems dpas ni gzhan rnams kyi las la ches lhag par bya ba yin pa dang  rab tu byung bar gyur pas ni rang gi bslab pa rnams nges par bsrung dgos pa'i phyir ro // / +gal te byang chub sems dpas ni nyan  thos kyi bslab pa rnams la yang bslab par bya ba nyid yin pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpas ni don nyung ba dang bya ba nyung ba la goms par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na / /

column3: de lta bu yid dpe dag bstan pa yis // / +zhes pa'i bar du ni rigs can gyis nas theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du 'bras bu che chung thob pa dang  grub pa'i dpe bstan pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691414#691433#TD4083E.TXT.r_865;TD4083E.TXT.r_866;TD4083E.TXT.r_867;TD4083E.TXT.r_868# gal te byang chub sems dpas ni nyan  thos kyi bslab pa rnams la yang bslab par bya ba nyid yin pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpas ni don nyung ba dang bya ba nyung ba la goms par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na / /
column5: 0.021#TD4061E.TXT.r#1519196#1519197#TD4061E.TXT.r_776;TD4061E.TXT.r_777# MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA LA nye bar gtod pa'i phyir nye bar gtod pa'o // / +thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir 'di mthong ba la don  yod pa'o // /
column6: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136706#1136706#TD4047E.TXT.r_2233# rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu brgyad po 'di dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i phyir dang  yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir  bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya bas phan pa ste gzhan gyi don las brtsams pa'o // /
column7: 0.023#TD4065E.TXT.r#428854#428856#TD4065E.TXT.r_298;TD4065E.TXT.r_299;TD4065E.TXT.r_300# sems nges pa med pa bstan pa'i phyir / / +thams cad kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / /
column8: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#887127#887127#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_19314;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_19315# grub pa la sgrub pa yin no zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir / / +sems can rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par smos so // /
column9: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2038805#2038805#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8801# grag go zhes  bya ba'i sgra ni skye ba dbang ba'i phyir dang  sems can gyi don byed par srid pa'i phyir rgyu 'di rgyas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o // /
column10: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#472646#472646#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3031;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3032# 'das pa  med pa'i phyir ro // / +'di yang don bzhin te ston pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir zas zhes brjod do // /
column11: 0.026#TD4017E.TXT.r#2667492#2667492#TD4017E.TXT.r_1837# rtogs par bya ba ni theg pa rnam gnyis pa dag yang dag pa'i ngo bo mi shes shing theg pa rnam gcig gi don la mi gnas pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas mi shes pa shes par bya ba'i phyir 'di bstan pa dang   'jug par bya ba ni mtshan nyid gsum po gang du bstan pa de la 'jug pa dang  thob par bya ba'i thabs bstan to // /
column12: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#932629#932629#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5473;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5474# spros pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to // / +chos kyi dbyings  de sems can la yod par bstan pa'i phyir / /
column13: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1164070#1164070#TD4047E.TXT.r_6303;TD4047E.TXT.r_6304# ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +don gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1167741#1167741#TD4047E.TXT.r_6863# chos la ser sna byed pa gzhom pa'i don dang  ma 'ongs pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i  phyir dang  sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column15: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2921526#2921526#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7457;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7458# gong du bshad pa ltar na 'du byed rnams skad cig ma'i ngang gis rgyun mi 'chad par yul gzhan du 'phos pa ma gtogs pa'i 'gro bar byed pa  zhes bya ba'i rdzas gzhan ni gang yang med do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +tshig de dag gi mju  bsdu ba'i phyir / /
column16: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#804608#804608#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6325# mdo nyid las bshad pa'i dbang po'i don mi srid pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: mdo las / / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs rnams shes par gyis // / +zhes pa nas / / +phyogs bcu kun na ji ltar mdzes pa bzhin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691434#691446#TD4083E.TXT.r_867;TD4083E.TXT.r_868;TD4083E.TXT.r_869# gzhan gyi don lhur len pa'i phyir 'di ni de ltam yin no zhes  bstan pa'i phyir / / +sems can don la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / /

column3: zhes pa'i bar du ni 'bras bu so sor smin cing thob pa khyad par du gyur pa dang dpe don du sbyar te rgyas par bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691445#691457#TD4083E.TXT.r_869;TD4083E.TXT.r_870# gzhan gyi don lhur blang ba la bya ba chung ba ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#692976#692977#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691120#691120#TD4083E.TXT.r_837# len par mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi bsod nams kyi grogs su 'gro ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos te / /
column7: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690873#TD4083E.TXT.r_814# ches rgan pa la gus par mi byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod pa dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: mdo las / / +'di na rtag tu 'jig rten phan pa'i chos // / +zhes pa nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691456#691465#TD4083E.TXT.r_870# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: ngoms par byed ces pa'i bar du ni lha dang mi  rnams la phan pa'i don byas pa'o // / +mdo las 'jig rten thams cad ngoms par byas nas ni zhes pa nas sdong po chen po zhes pa ni de dag bya zhes pa'i bar du ni 'bras bu che chung las theg pa che chung gi rim pa bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691144#691147#TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691210#691213#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: mdo las / / +'od srungs 'di lta bu yi chos bshad pa // / +zhes pa nas / /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang  byang chub kyi spyod pa las nyams pa'ang / / +phyis byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691528#691539#TD4083E.TXT.r_879;TD4083E.TXT.r_880# snying brtser bcas zhes bya ba ni snying rje dang ldan zhing rjes su brtse ba dang ldan pa ste / / +de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi thabs la mkhas pas mi'i srog gcod pa dang  gzhan gyis bdag gir bye ba mkhyen par len pa dang  'dod  PA LA SPYOD PA DANG  brdzun du smra ba dang  mdza' bo dbye ba dang  tshig rtsub pas gshe ba dang  ngag 'khyal ba smra ba dang  de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i las rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa de la bu kun du spyad na nyes pa byas  par mi 'gyur la nyes pa med par 'gyur zhing / /

column3: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma nyams na bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob ces bstan to //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691540#691548#TD4083E.TXT.r_880# de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi thabs la mkhas pas mi'i srog gcod pa dang  gzhan gyis bdag gir bye ba mkhyen par len pa dang  'dod  pa la spyod pa dang  brdzun du smra ba dang  mdza' bo dbye ba dang  tshig rtsub pas gshe ba dang  ngag 'khyal ba smra ba dang  de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i las rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa de la bu kun du spyad na nyes pa byas  par mi 'gyur la nyes pa med par 'gyur zhing / /

column3: 'di man chad lung bstan pa'i le'u ste / / +de ci'i phyir lung  bstan pa zhes gdags pa dang  ming bshad pa dang rnam pa gnyis so // /

column3: de la gtan tshigs ni 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu dbang po rnon po yin pas chos thos pa tsam gyis go ba'i phyir lung bstan pa dang  gzhan dbang po bar ma rnams don dpes mtshon te bstan pas go ba'i phyir lung bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691560#691577#TD4083E.TXT.r_880;TD4083E.TXT.r_881;TD4083E.TXT.r_882# de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi thabs la mkhas pas mi'i srog gcod pa dang  gzhan gyis bdag gir bye ba mkhyen par len pa dang  'dod  pa la spyod pa dang  brdzun du smra ba dang  mdza' bo dbye ba dang  tshig rtsub pas gshe ba dang  ngag 'khyal ba smra ba dang  de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i las rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa de la bu kun du spyad na nyes pa byas  par mi 'gyur la nyes pa med par 'gyur zhing / /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691578#691586#TD4083E.TXT.r_881;TD4083E.TXT.r_882;TD4083E.TXT.r_883# bsod nams mang po yang 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin na / / +bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa rnams lta ci smos / / +de lta bas na rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams ni byis pa rnams rjes su bsrung  ba'i phyir 'khrig pa'i chos kyang rab tu bsten par bya ba yin na gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691867#691871#TD4083E.TXT.r_912;TD4083E.TXT.r_913;TD4083E.TXT.r_911# de lta smra bzhin du nyes par yang mi 'gyur zhing // / +bsod nams mang po 'phel bar yang 'gyur ro // /

column3: yang na nga  rgyal can rnams spag bkod pa'i phyir theg pa thams cad gcig ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691585#691595#TD4083E.TXT.r_883;TD4083E.TXT.r_884# de lta bas na rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams ni byis pa rnams rjes su bsrung  ba'i phyir 'khrig pa'i chos kyang rab tu bsten par bya ba yin na gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos // /

column3: che chung med pa'i phyir lung bstan pa'o // / +de yang lung bstan pa'i chos rnam pa gsum ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691596#691605#TD4083E.TXT.r_883;TD4083E.TXT.r_884;TD4083E.TXT.r_885# de lta bas na rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams ni byis pa rnams rjes su bsrung  ba'i phyir 'khrig pa'i chos kyang rab tu bsten par bya ba yin na gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos // / +gang gi phyir byis pa rnams ni re zhig rang nyid kyi bag la nyal ba ma spangs shing // /

column3: rang bzhin yod pa'i phyir lung bstan pa dang  khyad par yod pa'i phyir 'bras bu yod pas lung bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid can rnams la  che ba'i gzhung 'os pa dang  rgyu che ba rnams la 'bras bu chen por 'os pas lung bstan pa dang gsum mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691606#691613#TD4083E.TXT.r_885;TD4083E.TXT.r_886;TD4083E.TXT.r_887# rgyun du tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pas ji ltar 'dod pa'i yul yang len par  byed de // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691614#691628#TD4083E.TXT.r_886;TD4083E.TXT.r_887# dman pa la ring mo zhes shin tu zhen pa'o // / +las 'di yang shin tu ring mo nas goms pa'i phyir rang gi dang gis 'dod par 'gyur ba dang  shin tu yid la 'dod pa dang  myur du rkyen nye bar gnas pa la yang pha rol la snying brtse bas 'jug kyang nyes pa med do zhes bya'o // /

column3: rang bzhin gyis yod pa yang lung bstan par 'os pa dang  lung bstan par mi 'os pa ni ma rig pa la thog ma yod dam med ces 'dri ba la lung mi bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691627#691645#TD4083E.TXT.r_887;TD4083E.TXT.r_888# las 'di yang shin tu ring mo nas goms pa'i phyir rang gi dang gis 'dod par 'gyur ba dang  shin tu yid la 'dod pa dang  myur du rkyen nye bar gnas pa la yang pha rol la snying brtse bas 'jug kyang nyes pa med do zhes bya'o // /

column3: rgyu khyad par can rnams ni  lung bstan par 'os pa'o // / +rgyu che ba dang  'bras bu che ba yang lung bstan par 'os pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691644#691656#TD4083E.TXT.r_888# rtog  pa las nye bar gnas pa'i sems su byas nas 'khrig pa kun du spyod pa ni ltung bar 'gyur zhing bar ma chod par dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang  'dul bar 'os pa mang po yang bstan pa la mi dad par 'gyur ba dang  'jig rten pa rnams kyang de'i gnas skabs kho na la gnas par  'gyur ba'i phyir rjes su 'jug par gzigs nas bdag nyid chen po yang 'khrig pa la brten pas sbyor bar mi mdzad do // /
column5: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3095909#3095909#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_566# de bzhin nyid ni mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i bar dang  rtogs par gyur na yang de'i 'og tu rnam par gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid yid la byed pa'o // /

column3: rgyu chung ba dang 'bras bu chung ba rnams ni lung bstan par mi 'os pa'o // / +dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa rnams myur du lung bstan pa dang  ma smin pa rnams phyis lung bstan pa dang  'khor ba spong zhing 'bras bu myur du  thob par 'dod pa rnams la myur du lung bstan pa dang  thugs rje che bas 'khor bar sbyor ba rnams bags kyis lung bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691655#691674#TD4083E.TXT.r_888;TD4083E.TXT.r_889# rtog  pa las nye bar gnas pa'i sems su byas nas 'khrig pa kun du spyod pa ni ltung bar 'gyur zhing bar ma chod par dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang  'dul bar 'os pa mang po yang bstan pa la mi dad par 'gyur ba dang  'jig rten pa rnams kyang de'i gnas skabs kho na la gnas par  'gyur ba'i phyir rjes su 'jug par gzigs nas bdag nyid chen po yang 'khrig pa la brten pas sbyor bar mi mdzad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691675#691690#TD4083E.TXT.r_889;TD4083E.TXT.r_890;TD4083E.TXT.r_891;TD4083E.TXT.r_892;TD4083E.TXT.r_893# de bzhin du mi'i srog gcod pa la sogs pa yang de rnams byed pa ma yin te / / +de lta bu'i rtogs pa las nye bar gnas pas 'jug par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i     // /

column3: yang spyir lung bstan pa dang  so sor phyed ste lung bstan pa'o // / +ming dgrol ba ni rgyu ci byed pa 'bras bu de thob ste / /

column5: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#152575#152575#TD4035E.TXT.r_4830;TD4035E.TXT.r_4831# 'jigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gsod pa dang  'ching ba  dang  chad pa dang  nyams pa dang  smad pa la sogs pas 'jigs pa'i phyir ro // / +zang zing cung zad tsam gyi phyir zhes bya ba ni nor dang  'bru dang dbyig la sogs pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de so sor ston pa'i phyir lung ston pa zhes bya'o // / +mdo las  de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs nas zhes pa nas ngan pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur zhes pa'i bar du ni 'phags pa nyan thos bzhi mngon du lung bstan pa la sngar ni tshig brgyad pas bstan / /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342719#1342722#TD4037E.TXT.r_3657# srog chags 'di bsad na bdag sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur mod kyi bdag sems can dmyal / /

column3: 'phags pa 'od srungs chen pos sangs rgyas khri phrag sum brgyal  bsnyen bkur byas / /

column3: 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khri gsum brgya la bsnyen bkur byas / /

column3: 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya la bsnyen bkur byas / /

column3: phyis khrag khrig gnyis la bsnyen bkur byas / / +'phags pa mood gal chen pos sngar sangs rgyas brgyad stong la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691828#691848#TD4083E.TXT.r_908;TD4083E.TXT.r_909;TD4083E.TXT.r_910;TD4083E.TXT.r_911# kun dga' ra ba srung ba gang dag gis dge 'dun nam / / +mchod rten gyi dkor mi rigs par chud  gzon par byed pa dag ni rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa las 'byin par byed par yang rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810276#1810276#TD4082E.TXT.r_416# lag pa dang  rkang pa dang  sna dang rna ba bcad pa las thar bar bya ba dang  mig dbyung ba las bskyab par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi srog gi phyir yang shes bzhin du brdzun gyi tshig gang mi smra ba yang sems can de dag gi don  gyi phyir so sor brtags nas smra bar byed de / /

column3: bsnyen bkur byas / / +phyis khrag khrig gnyis brgya la bsnyen bkur byas te / /
sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa yang sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa lan mang du yod mod kyi spyod pa rgya chen po ldog pa rnams drang ba'i phyir bstan te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691849#691864#TD4083E.TXT.r_910;TD4083E.TXT.r_911;TD4083E.TXT.r_912# byang chub sems dpa' de yang bdag gi srog gi phyir yang shes bzhin gyi brdzun gyi tshig mi smra na yang / / +gzhan rnams kyi srog thar bar bya ba dang  chad pas gcod pa las    bskyab pa'i phyir zang zing med pa'i sems dang  snying brtse ba'i sems kho nas brdzun du smra bar byed la / /
column5: 0.019#TD4036E.TXT.r#24567#24567#TD4036E.TXT.r_3735;TD4036E.TXT.r_3736# 'on kyang dmigs pa de nyid ma btang ba'i sems de zhi gnas kyi rnam pas yang dag par zhi bar byed de / / +'di  lta ste / /
column6: 0.021#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1998968#1998968#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3031;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3032# de ltar bshad dang  gal te srog chags gzhan yin pa dang  'di gsad par bya'o zhes de la sbyor ba byas pa dang  gang la sbyor  ba byas pa de nyid gsod par byed kyi gzhan ma yin na / / +de lta na de las srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no // /
column7: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1141299#1141299#TD4047E.TXT.r_2904;TD4047E.TXT.r_2905# de'i stobs kyis kha na ma thob thams cad nye bar spyod pa las nyes dmigs mthong nas sems srung bar byed  de ; / +btang snyoms su byed pas nyon mongs pa can ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: so sor dbang po rno rtul las snga phyir lung bstan pa yin no // /

column9: 0.018#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1720988#1720988#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3119# rigs kyi bu khyim nas khyim med par dad pas rab tu byung nas chags sems dang 'dres pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pas rtog par byed do zhes mthong zhing smra bar 'gyur ro // /

column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343053#1343056#TD4037E.TXT.r_3693# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gang dag mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa de dag la snying brtse  pa'i sems kho na la brten nas sems can 'di dag sdig pa'i grogs po dang bsten pas yun ring por gnod pa dang  phan pa ma yin par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam ste / /

column16: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#980790#980791#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11580# gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don dang phan pa'i ched du sems can dmyal ba'i gnas su 'jug cing dmyal bar gnas kyang dmyal ba'i sdug  bsngal bar ma dang tha mas gnod par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos kyi dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu drag pos kyang de'i lus dang sems la gnod par mi 'gyur zhing bla NA MED PA'I BAR DU gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: mdo las mu ge byung tshe la la'i zhes pa nas thub pa chen po mthar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar du ni / /

column3: mdo las de nas bcom ldan  'das kyis zhes pa nas byang chub bsgrub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar du ni 'di man chad nyan thos chen po gsum so sor lung bstan pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692212#692221#TD4083E.TXT.r_957;TD4083E.TXT.r_958;TD4083E.TXT.r_959# log pa'i sgras ni log par spyod pa yin pa'i phyir smad pa'i tshig go // / +dman pas kun du 'tsho ba ni log par 'tsho ba ste / /

column3: dang po tshig rkyang pas spro ba dang  de'i 'og tu tshigs su bcad pas bsdu ba'o // /

column5: 0.012#TD4036E.TXT.r#7118#7119#TD4036E.TXT.r_942# rnam pa de dag gis tshul 'chos pa dang  kha gsag dang  gzhogs slong dang thob kyis 'jal ba dang  rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa la brten nas / /
column6: 0.013#TD4060E.TXT.r#683499#683500#TD4060E.TXT.r_400# bde ba nyid dang  nad med pa nyid dang  bdag dang bdag gi nyid du yang dag par rjes su blta'o zhes bya ba dang  tshul 'chos pa dang   kha gsag dang  gzhogs slong dang  thob kyis 'jal ba dang  rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa zhes bya ba dang  zla ba phyed phyed cing tshes bco lnga la rgyal po chen po bzhi dag rang nyid ci mi'i 'jig rten na / /
column7: 0.013#TD4061E.TXT.r#1529508#1529509#TD4061E.TXT.r_2319;TD4061E.TXT.r_2320# de nyid kyi phyir 'dir gtsang bar phyin ci log par ma smos so // / +tshul 'chos pa dang  kha gsag dang   gzhogs slong dang  thob kyis 'jal ba nyid dang  rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /

column9: 0.015#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810472#1810473#TD4082E.TXT.r_437# byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang  kha gsag dang  gzhogs slong dang  thob kyis 'jal ba dang  rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa log pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba  rnams dang du len cing / /

column3: tshig rkyang pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +sngar ni rgyu bstan / / +de'i 'og tu 'bras bu  bstan te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692239#692247#TD4083E.TXT.r_961# de yang tshul 'chos pa dang  kha gsag dang  gzhogs slong dang  thob kyis 'jal ba dang  rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa dang  chang dang mtshon cha dang dug dang  srog chags dang  rgya skyegs dang  'bru mar la sogs pa 'tshong ba dang  ma brtags pa'i til dang nyungs kar 'tshir ba'o // /

column3: 'di ni rgyu'o // / +mdo las de lta bu'i lhag pa'i bya ba byas te lus tham la zhes pa nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692248#692258#TD4083E.TXT.r_961;TD4083E.TXT.r_962# de yang tshul 'chos pa dang  kha gsag dang  gzhogs slong dang  thob kyis 'jal ba dang  rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa dang  chang dang mtshon cha dang dug dang  srog chags dang  rgya skyegs dang  'bru mar la sogs pa 'tshong ba dang  ma brtags pa'i til dang nyungs kar 'tshir ba'o // /

column3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa'i bar du ni 'bras bu bstan pa ste / / +lung bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dgu ste / /

column3: rang bzhin gyis lung bstan pa la sogs pa'o // / +mdo las sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni rin po che 'byung ba  zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes pa nas nyan thos brgya stong mang po 'dul lo zhes pa'i bar du ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa na 'khor phyi nang rnam gnyis dang bzhugs pa bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342151#1342151#TD4037E.TXT.r_3570;TD4037E.TXT.r_3571# sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na / /

column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691196#TD4083E.TXT.r_843;TD4083E.TXT.r_844# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692274#692285#TD4083E.TXT.r_963;TD4083E.TXT.r_964# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' log pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba rnams dang du len cing mi 'dzem la sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692284#692297#TD4083E.TXT.r_964;TD4083E.TXT.r_965;TD4083E.TXT.r_966# byang chub sems dpa' log pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba rnams dang du len cing mi 'dzem la sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692567#692574#TD4083E.TXT.r_999;TD4083E.TXT.r_1000# byang chub    sems dpa' bdag gi tshig mi btsun par 'gyur ba'i gtam ngan pa bden pa'i dngos po sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693036#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053;TD4083E.TXT.r_1054# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693302#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084;TD4083E.TXT.r_1085# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693833#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135;TD4083E.TXT.r_1136# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693975#693976#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151;TD4083E.TXT.r_1152# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 3.576#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811082#1811084#TD4082E.TXT.r_509;TD4082E.TXT.r_510;TD4082E.TXT.r_511# byang chub  sems dpa'i gzhan dag la khro ba'i bsam pa byung zhing 'dzin pa byung ba dang du len na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column16: 0.010#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1341802#1341802#TD4037E.TXT.r_3505;TD4037E.TXT.r_3506# nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column18: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343740#1343741#TD4037E.TXT.r_3789;TD4037E.TXT.r_3790;TD4037E.TXT.r_3791# byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la khro ba'i bsam pa 'byung zhing  'dzin la byung ba dang du len na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column19: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343939#1343940#TD4037E.TXT.r_3825;TD4037E.TXT.r_3826;TD4037E.TXT.r_3827# nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column20: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343983#1343984#TD4037E.TXT.r_3831;TD4037E.TXT.r_3832;TD4037E.TXT.r_3833# byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar byed cing bsam gtan gyi ro myong ba  la yang yon tan du lta na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column21: 0.016#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809010#1809011#TD4082E.TXT.r_250;TD4082E.TXT.r_251;TD4082E.TXT.r_252# de la gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa che ba dang  chog mi shes pa dang  rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa 'byung ba dang du len par    byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column22: 0.016#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810492#1810493#TD4082E.TXT.r_438;TD4082E.TXT.r_439;TD4082E.TXT.r_440# de dag gis mi 'dzem la sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column23: 0.016#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811301#1811302#TD4082E.TXT.r_540;TD4082E.TXT.r_541# byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa byung ba nyams su myong bar byed cing sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang  bcas par 'gyur te nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column24: 0.016#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811349#1811350#TD4082E.TXT.r_546;TD4082E.TXT.r_547;TD4082E.TXT.r_548# bsam gtan gyi ro myang ba la yang yon tan du lta na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang  bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column25: 0.018#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810480#1810481#TD4082E.TXT.r_437;TD4082E.TXT.r_438# byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang  kha gsag dang  gzhogs slong dang  thob kyis 'jal ba dang  rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa log pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba  rnams dang du len cing / / +de dag gis mi 'dzem la sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / /
column26: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#693082#693083#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061;TD4083E.TXT.r_1062# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column27: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692645#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007;TD4083E.TXT.r_1008# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column28: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690875#TD4083E.TXT.r_814;TD4083E.TXT.r_815# ches rgan pa la gus par mi byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod pa dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column29: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692406#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column30: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#694655#694655#TD4083E.TXT.r_1219# sems can skrag par bya bar rigs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas skrag par mi byed pa dang  sems can 'dun par bya ba'i rigs pa rnams 'dun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column31: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344555#1344555#TD4037E.TXT.r_3924;TD4037E.TXT.r_3925;TD4037E.TXT.r_3926# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los mi byed na / / +nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
