column35: 0.021#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811958#1811958#TD4082E.TXT.r_631;TD4082E.TXT.r_632# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column36: 0.021#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812069#1812069#TD4082E.TXT.r_647;TD4082E.TXT.r_648# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi  byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column37: 0.021#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812207#1812207#TD4082E.TXT.r_668;TD4082E.TXT.r_669# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column38: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693714#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124;TD4083E.TXT.r_1125# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column39: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#692940#692940#TD4083E.TXT.r_1041;TD4083E.TXT.r_1042# kun du 'dzin na 'das ma thag pa bzhin du nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la khro ba'i bsam pa byung ba dang du len par byed / /
column40: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693407#693407#TD4083E.TXT.r_1095# bar mi byed par de thams cad du yal bar bor nas nyan thos kyi sde snod nyid la brtson par sbyor zhing goms par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column41: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#691208#691208#TD4083E.TXT.r_844# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column42: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#692952#692952#TD4083E.TXT.r_1043;TD4083E.TXT.r_1044# 'dzin par byed rjes su 'jug par byed na  nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +de spang bar 'dod kyang zil gyis non pas mngon du rgyu ba la ni nyes pa med do // /
column43: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693229#693229#TD4083E.TXT.r_1076;TD4083E.TXT.r_1077# de rnams byung ba nyams su myong bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +de spang bar 'dod kyang nyon mongs pa drag pos zil gyis non te kun du spyod na nyes pa med do // /
column44: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694131#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column45: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694307#694307#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# 'khor rnams kyi don mi byed pa ni chos  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column46: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column47: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column48: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693384#693385#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column49: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column50: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column51: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693896#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143;TD4083E.TXT.r_1144# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column52: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#690826#690828#TD4083E.TXT.r_809;TD4083E.TXT.r_810# sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang du mi len cing 'dod pa chung ba dang  chog shes pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: mdo las de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe na zhes pa nas rab tu rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692298#692306#TD4083E.TXT.r_965;TD4083E.TXT.r_966;TD4083E.TXT.r_967;TD4083E.TXT.r_968# de bsal ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed kyang des slar zil gyis mnan pas kun du spyad pa la ni nyes pa med do // / +'phyar gnas zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la / /

column3: nga las nyon zhes  pa'i bar du ni 'di man chad tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis la gnyis su dbye ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692307#692317#TD4083E.TXT.r_967;TD4083E.TXT.r_968;TD4083E.TXT.r_969# 'phyar ba ni kun du rgod pa'o // / +stsogs pa'i sgras ni kun du rtse ba dang kun du ca co 'don pa dag bsdu'o // /

column3: dang po tshig gcig gis ni bsgo ba bstan / / +de'i 'og ma bcu gcig gis ni dngos su bstan pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692318#692328#TD4083E.TXT.r_969;TD4083E.TXT.r_970# rgod pa ste rnam par ma zhi ba'i sems kyis rab tu rgod pa la sogs pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgod pa ma yin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693565#693569#TD4083E.TXT.r_1110;TD4083E.TXT.r_1111# theg pa chen po dang ldan pa gang la la zhig zab pa'i gnas dag spong ba ni 'das ma thag pa lta bu dang  lta ba ngan pa spong ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693662#693666#TD4083E.TXT.r_1120;TD4083E.TXT.r_1121# bdag la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i rgyu'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694027#694027#TD4083E.TXT.r_1159;TD4083E.TXT.r_1160# gzhan sdug bsngal rnams ji skad bstan pas sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed pa ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694398#694398#TD4083E.TXT.r_1196;TD4083E.TXT.r_1197# gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par mi 'jug pa ni gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par 'jug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'di ni dang po'o // / +mdo las / / +nga yi nyan thos gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692329#692344#TD4083E.TXT.r_969;TD4083E.TXT.r_970;TD4083E.TXT.r_971# rgod pa ste rnam par ma zhi ba'i sems kyis rab tu rgod pa la sogs pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgod pa ma yin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang  chub sems dpa' rgod pas gzhan dag rgod du gzhug par 'dod cing / /
column5: 0.021#TD4025E.TXT.r#2170824#2170825#TD4025E.TXT.r_705# gang gi gnyen por byang  chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa chen po'i chos la mos pa sgom pa theg pa chen po'i chos la sdang ba 'dod chen pa rnams kyi sgrib pa dang  gang gi gnyen por byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa chos rnams la bdag tu lta ba gzhan mu stegs can rnams kyi sgrib pa  dang  gang gi gnyen por byang chub sems dpa' rnams nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa 'khor ba la sdug bsngal bar rab tu shes shing sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa nyan thos kyi theg pa rnams kyi sgrib pa dang  gang gi gnyen por byang chub sems dpa' rnams  snying rje chen po sgom pa sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs shing sems can gyi don la mi ltos pa nyid rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sgrib pa ste / /

column3: zhes pa nas / / +drang srong chen po gser gyi sdong  po 'dra // /
zhes pa'i bar du ni 'dis dngos su bsgo ba ste / / +rgyu dang 'bras bu sbyar te bstan pa dang  ngo mtshar bdun dang  'khor dang tshe'i tshad la sogs pa ston te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692347#692360#TD4083E.TXT.r_971;TD4083E.TXT.r_972;TD4083E.TXT.r_973;TD4083E.TXT.r_974# ches rgod par byed rtse bar byed ca co 'don par byed du gzhug par 'dod cing / / +rnam pa sna tshogs pas smra bar byed 'dod na nyon mongs pa can gyi ltung bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692949#692952#TD4083E.TXT.r_1043;TD4083E.TXT.r_1044# 'dzin par byed rjes su 'jug par byed na  nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693228#693229#TD4083E.TXT.r_1076;TD4083E.TXT.r_1077# de rnams byung ba nyams su myong bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344552#1344555#TD4037E.TXT.r_3923;TD4037E.TXT.r_3924;TD4037E.TXT.r_3925;TD4037E.TXT.r_3926# byang chub sems dpa' nad pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan  pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344667#1344669#TD4037E.TXT.r_3938;TD4037E.TXT.r_3939;TD4037E.TXT.r_3940# kun  nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi byed na    nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344800#1344802#TD4037E.TXT.r_3956;TD4037E.TXT.r_3957;TD4037E.TXT.r_3958# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na / /
column10: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811955#1811958#TD4082E.TXT.r_630;TD4082E.TXT.r_631;TD4082E.TXT.r_632# byang chub sems dpa' nad pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems  dang ldan pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812067#1812069#TD4082E.TXT.r_646;TD4082E.TXT.r_647;TD4082E.TXT.r_648# byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don la tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa dag  mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang  tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi  byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812205#1812207#TD4082E.TXT.r_667;TD4082E.TXT.r_668;TD4082E.TXT.r_669# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang  longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal  ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.017#TD4083E.TXT.r#693097#693098#TD4083E.TXT.r_1062;TD4083E.TXT.r_1063# byang chub sems dpa' kun du chags pas bre mo'i gtam la brten pas dus 'da' bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.017#TD4083E.TXT.r#693685#693685#TD4083E.TXT.r_1121# byang  chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis dam pa yin pa'i rlom sems kyis bdag la chags pa dang  gzhan la khong khro bas brnyas pa dang bcas pa dang  gshe ba dang bcas pas bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column15: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342239#1342239#TD4037E.TXT.r_3591;TD4037E.TXT.r_3592;TD4037E.TXT.r_3593# nyes pa dang bcas  shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column16: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809483#1809483#TD4082E.TXT.r_326;TD4082E.TXT.r_327;TD4082E.TXT.r_328# chos sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column17: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812148#1812149#TD4082E.TXT.r_660;TD4082E.TXT.r_661;TD4082E.TXT.r_662# nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column18: 0.021#TD4039E.TXT.r#1844463#1844463#TD4039E.TXT.r_3568;TD4039E.TXT.r_3569# rnam par thar ba dang mthun pa'i gtam de yang nyan par mi 'dod la ston  pa na yang rna blags par mi byed do // / +de nyan par byed na yang rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i ched du nyan par byed kyi shes par bya ba'i sems kyis ni ma yin no // /
column19: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693407#693407#TD4083E.TXT.r_1095# bar mi byed par de thams cad du yal bar bor nas nyan thos kyi sde snod nyid la brtson par sbyor zhing goms par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column20: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#691208#691208#TD4083E.TXT.r_844# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column21: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343832#1343832#TD4037E.TXT.r_3806;TD4037E.TXT.r_3807# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +brjed pas yol bar byas na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column22: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343896#1343896#TD4037E.TXT.r_3816;TD4037E.TXT.r_3817# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los byas na / /
column23: 0.022#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810552#1810552#TD4082E.TXT.r_443;TD4082E.TXT.r_444# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +brjed pas byas na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column24: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342151#1342151#TD4037E.TXT.r_3570;TD4037E.TXT.r_3571# sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na / /
column25: 0.022#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809389#1809389#TD4082E.TXT.r_307;TD4082E.TXT.r_308# sems can  yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column26: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344326#1344326#TD4037E.TXT.r_3887;TD4037E.TXT.r_3888# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column27: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694655#694655#TD4083E.TXT.r_1219# sems can skrag par bya bar rigs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas skrag par mi byed pa dang  sems can 'dun par bya ba'i rigs pa rnams 'dun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column28: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693475#693475#TD4083E.TXT.r_1102;TD4083E.TXT.r_1103# byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyid med kyang sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin yod bzhin du phyi rol gyi bstan bcos te mu stegs can gyi bstan bcos  la brtson par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +shin tu yid gzhungs pa dang ldob skyen pa dang  yun ring por yang yid mi brjed pa dang  don sems pa dang rtog par byed nus pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la rigs pas nye bar rtogs pa dang ldan pas blo mi 'gyur ba  dang ldan zhing nyin gcig bzhin du ches lhag par sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la brtson par byed pa yin na nyes pa med do // /
column29: 0.023#TD4036E.TXT.r#36791#36791#TD4036E.TXT.r_5535;TD4036E.TXT.r_5536;TD4036E.TXT.r_5537# de yang spro ba skyed par byed / / +sems kyis smon par byed cing / / +de shas cher gnas par 'dod  pa dang  mi brjed par 'dod pa dang  bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa la nye bar gnas pa yin te / /

column3: 'di ni dang po'o // / +mdo las / / +'jig rten rnams la phan zhing thugs brtser 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692359#692369#TD4083E.TXT.r_973;TD4083E.TXT.r_974;TD4083E.TXT.r_975# brjed ngas pas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +de bsal  bar 'dod kyang zil gyis non pas kun du spyod pa ni nyes pa med do // /

column3: zhes pa nas / / +srog chags bye ba khrag khrig sgrol  bzhin du // / +zhes pa'i bar du ni ngo mtshar ba'i mtshan 'di bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692370#692381#TD4083E.TXT.r_975# gzhan dag gis kun nas mnar sems sam mya ngan skyes pa bsal bar 'dod pa dang  rtsed mo la dga' ba'i rang bzhin can rnams bsdu ba dang  'dun par byed pa rnams kyi sems bsrung ba dang  rjes su 'brang ba rnams  mi dga' ba dang  kun nas mnar sems pa dang  rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur du dogs pa rnams bdag nyid la mngon du phyogs pa dang  bsam pa dag pas kun du smra ba la nyes pa med do // /

column3: mdo las / / +de nas byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen mang // / +zhes pa nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692380#692389#TD4083E.TXT.r_975# gzhan dag gis kun nas mnar sems sam mya ngan skyes pa bsal bar 'dod pa dang  rtsed mo la dga' ba'i rang bzhin can rnams bsdu ba dang  'dun par byed pa rnams kyi sems bsrung ba dang  rjes su 'brang ba rnams  mi dga' ba dang  kun nas mnar sems pa dang  rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur du dogs pa rnams bdag nyid la mngon du phyogs pa dang  bsam pa dag pas kun du smra ba la nyes pa med do // /

column3: rdzu 'phrul stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur // / +zhes pa'i bar du ni 'khor rnams ston te // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692388#692398#TD4083E.TXT.r_975;TD4083E.TXT.r_976;TD4083E.TXT.r_977;TD4083E.TXT.r_978# gzhan dag gis kun nas mnar sems sam mya ngan skyes pa bsal bar 'dod pa dang  rtsed mo la dga' ba'i rang bzhin can rnams bsdu ba dang  'dun par byed pa rnams kyi sems bsrung ba dang  rjes su 'brang ba rnams  mi dga' ba dang  kun nas mnar sems pa dang  rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur du dogs pa rnams bdag nyid la mngon du phyogs pa dang  bsam pa dag pas kun du smra ba la nyes pa med do // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang  nyan thos     // / +pa'i 'khor rnams ci rigs par sbyar ro // / +mdo las / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692397#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_976;TD4083E.TXT.r_977;TD4083E.TXT.r_978# 'khor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la // / +'khor ba la sems mngon par dga' ba nyid     // / +ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692654#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007;TD4083E.TXT.r_1008# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693833#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135;TD4083E.TXT.r_1136# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693974#693976#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151;TD4083E.TXT.r_1152# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#694130#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693300#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693081#693083#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061;TD4083E.TXT.r_1062# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691196#TD4083E.TXT.r_843;TD4083E.TXT.r_844# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column12: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#694306#694307#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# 'khor rnams kyi don mi byed pa ni chos  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693896#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143;TD4083E.TXT.r_1144# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692790#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693261#693261#TD4083E.TXT.r_1079# bsam gtan gyi bde ba nyams  su myong bar byed cing de la yon tan du lta ba ni dge ba chos dang sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693713#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#694535#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column20: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#694633#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692729#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column23: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#694261#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column24: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693137#693137#TD4083E.TXT.r_1067# ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon  par bsgrub pa la brtson pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column25: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#694448#694448#TD4083E.TXT.r_1202# gzhan dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa smra bar mi byed pa ni yon tan  gyi bsngags pa smra ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: byang chub mchog der rab tu bshad pa na // / +zhes pa nas / / +de la rtag tu thal mo sbyar bar 'gyur // /

column17: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693035#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053;TD4083E.TXT.r_1054# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: zhes pa'i bar du ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa dang chos nyan pa'i 'khor rnams bstan to // / +mdo las / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692415#692424#TD4083E.TXT.r_979;TD4083E.TXT.r_980;TD4083E.TXT.r_981;TD4083E.TXT.r_982# byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' ni mya ngan las 'das par mngon par dga' bas  gnas par mi bya'i // / +mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis phyogs te gnas par bya'o // /
column5: 5.960#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343325#1343335#TD4037E.TXT.r_3731;TD4037E.TXT.r_3732;TD4037E.TXT.r_3733;TD4037E.TXT.r_3734# byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub sems dpa' ni mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par  dga' bas gnas par mi bya'i / / +mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyas phyogs te gnas par bya'o // /
column6: 0.016#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810634#1810641#TD4082E.TXT.r_455;TD4082E.TXT.r_456;TD4082E.TXT.r_457;TD4082E.TXT.r_458# mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis phyogs te gnas  par bya'o // / +nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kyang 'jigs par mi bya'o // / +de dag las sems kyang shin tu dben par mi bya ste / /

column3: de na bar  gyi bskal ba bcu gcig gnas // / +zhes pa nas / / +rkang gnyis mchog gi'o zhes pa'i bar du ni tshe'i tshad bstan pa'o // /

column3: mdo las de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la bka' stsal pa zhes pa nas gso ba byed par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar du ni 'phags pa k'a ty'a yan  lung bstan pa ste dbye ba dang sa bcad pa gong ma dag 'dra bar sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343349#1343355#TD4037E.TXT.r_3735;TD4037E.TXT.r_3736# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal    pa grangs med pa gsum du 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / / +byang chub yang dag par bsgrub par bya dgos so snyam du de ltar lta zhing de skad smra na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810649#1810654#TD4082E.TXT.r_458# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du 'khor ba na 'khor zhing byang chub yang dag par bsgrub par bya dgos  so snyam du de ltar lta zhing de skad smras na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692437#692448#TD4083E.TXT.r_983# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bskal pa grangs  med pa gsum du 'khor ba na 'khor zhing byang chub yang dag par bsgrub par bya dgos so snyam du de ltar lta zhing de skad sma na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692449#692461#TD4083E.TXT.r_983;TD4083E.TXT.r_984# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bskal pa grangs  med pa gsum du 'khor ba na 'khor zhing byang chub yang dag par bsgrub par bya dgos so snyam du de ltar lta zhing de skad sma na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: mdo las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas yang zhes pa nas lha dang mi'i mkhan po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de zhes pa'i bar du ni 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya na des sngon gyi dus de bzhin  gshegs pa mang po la dngos su bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang  de mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang rin po che'i mchod rten byas pa dang  mchod rten de la mchod pa sna tshogs byas pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810716#1810721#TD4082E.TXT.r_465;TD4082E.TXT.r_466# byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa yin pa des de ltar sems kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la goms par bya ba yang dag par bsgrub dgos te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692462#692474#TD4083E.TXT.r_984;TD4083E.TXT.r_985;TD4083E.TXT.r_986# nyan thos kyang re zhig bdag gcig pu'i DON DU MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA la gcig tu mngon par dga' bar kun tu ston par  byed cing / /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692474#692483#TD4083E.TXT.r_986;TD4083E.TXT.r_987# gang byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir byung ba 'di lta smos kyang ci dgos / /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692484#692506#TD4083E.TXT.r_987;TD4083E.TXT.r_988;TD4083E.TXT.r_989;TD4083E.TXT.r_990;TD4083E.TXT.r_991# 'dis de lta bu'i sems kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la goms par bya ba yang dag par  bsgrub dgos te / /
column8: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343413#1343421#TD4037E.TXT.r_3743;TD4037E.TXT.r_3744# des de ltar sems kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la goms par bya  ba yang dag par bsgrub dgos te / /
column9: 0.027#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810730#1810730#TD4082E.TXT.r_467# de las khyad  par du 'phags pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang ldan pas zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po la spyod pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mang du byas te 'dir lung bstan te / / +'phags pa de nyid sngon dge  'dun gyi gnas khang phyag dar byas pa las tshe rabs thams cad du lus gser gyi kha dog can du gyur te spyod lam mdzes pa 'od dang ldan par gyur pa las 'di sangs rgyas su grub pa lung bstan pa'o // /

column11: 0.026#TD4018E.TXT.r#3058044#3058045#TD4018E.TXT.r_6993# pa'i sems kyi rgyud gang la yang skye ba dang gnas pa dang  'gog pa la sogs pa kun rtog pa de la yang tha dad pa'i byed pa dang byed pa por 'brel bar mi rung bar thams cad mkhyen pas rigs pa bzhin gyis bsgrub par mdzad pa / /

column13: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922624#922624#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4111;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4112# de yang dper na sa dang po'i rigs pas rnam par dpyod pa'i sems pas / / +sa gnyis pa'i rigs pas rnam par dpyod pa'i sems shas che  bas na khyad zhugs pa yin te / /
column14: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694651#694651#TD4083E.TXT.r_1219# sems can skrag par bya bar rigs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas skrag par mi byed pa dang  sems can 'dun par bya ba'i rigs pa rnams 'dun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column15: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368694#2368694#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6860# de la gsum du bsgyur ba ni snga ma'i yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang  yongs su shes par byed pa 'di nyid la gsum du bsgyur ba zhes bya ste / /
column16: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473314#473314#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3116;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3117# 'di ltar thos nas mi brjed par 'dzin par byed do // / +don phyin ci ma log par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1198230#1198230#TD4047E.TXT.r_10944# byed 'dod pa'i sems kyis rab tu 'jug pa nyid la rab tu sbyor bar byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir gang ci yang rung ba'i rnam pas don de bsgrub par bya'o zhes nges par byed pa nyid ni byed 'dod pa nyid do // /
column18: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925180#925180#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4413;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4414# brtson 'grus de lta bu la brten nas byang chub sems  dpa' sems can mtha' yas pa rnams yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +da ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column19: 0.029#TD4046E.TXT.r#2198709#2198709#TD4046E.TXT.r_368# bar byed pa sngon du gtong ba'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i lan du phan 'dogs pa mnyam pa'am lhag pas nye bar gnas pas don byed do // /

column3: zhes pa'i bar du ni lung bstan pa'i 'bras bu ste / / +de yang zhing gi mtshan nyid dang  bsod nams kyi mtshan nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692620#692631#TD4083E.TXT.r_1006;TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# 'chos par mi byed pa ni nyes par snang bar bya ba'i don to // / +rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: mdo  las ; / +'od byed gtso bo bcom ldan 'das 'gyur ba // / +zhes pa nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692632#692647#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007;TD4083E.TXT.r_1008# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#1333197#1333198#TD4037E.TXT.r_2382# rtag tu gus  par byed pa'i sbyor bas rgyun du sems par byed do // /

column3: kun kyang 'byung spangs 'byung ba med pa yin // / +zhes pa'i bar du ni tshig dang po gnyis kyis ni rang bzhin bstan / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692729#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692796#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026;TD4083E.TXT.r_1027# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692983#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047;TD4083E.TXT.r_1046;TD4083E.TXT.r_1048# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692275#TD4083E.TXT.r_963;TD4083E.TXT.r_964# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694536#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column13: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693384#693385#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#694448#694449#TD4083E.TXT.r_1202# gzhan dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa smra bar mi byed pa ni yon tan  gyi bsngags pa smra ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#691030#691030#TD4083E.TXT.r_830;TD4083E.TXT.r_831# gir mi byed pa ni 'das ma thag pa'i lta bu'i yin pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi khyim dang gtsug lag khang ngam / /
column19: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692940#692940#TD4083E.TXT.r_1041;TD4083E.TXT.r_1042# kun du 'dzin na 'das ma thag pa bzhin du nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la khro ba'i bsam pa byung ba dang du len par byed / /
column20: 0.029#TD4066E.TXT.r#2108255#2108255#TD4066E.TXT.r_875# byed par 'gyur ba lta ga la rung snyam pa dang  mi 'dod pa'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ba dang  gzhan la gnod par byed par zhugs pa'i phyir / /

column3: tshig phyi mas 'khor bstan to // / +mdo las de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun thams  cad la bka' stsal pa zhes pa nas gsol ba byed par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar du ni 'phags pa mood gal lung bstan pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692655#692673#TD4083E.TXT.r_1008;TD4083E.TXT.r_1009;TD4083E.TXT.r_1010# byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba bsrung ba'i phyir 'jam pa dang drag pa'i thabs dag gis ston par mi byed  cing yal bar dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: tshul dbye ba ni gong ma dang 'dra'o // / +lung bstan pa yang snga ma'i dus dang phyi ma'i dus so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692674#692683#TD4083E.TXT.r_1010;TD4083E.TXT.r_1011# gal te de ltar don 'di dag bstan pas na 'di rnams yid mi bde ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung nyes par mi 'gyur ro // /

column3: snga ma'i dus la yang sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa ste / / +'di ni sngon du bzhugs pa dang sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692684#692693#TD4083E.TXT.r_1010;TD4083E.TXT.r_1011;TD4083E.TXT.r_1012;TD4083E.TXT.r_1013# gal te de ltar don 'di dag bstan pas na 'di rnams yid mi bde ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung nyes par mi 'gyur ro // / +bstan pa'i don zab pa'i rgyus  yid mi bde ba chen por gyur na yang nyes pa med do // /

column3: mdo las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang zhes pa nas rnam pa mang pos mchod pa byed do zhes pa'i bar du ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692694#692710#TD4083E.TXT.r_1012;TD4083E.TXT.r_1013;TD4083E.TXT.r_1014;TD4083E.TXT.r_1015# gshe la lan du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +gshe bar byed pa la slar gshe ba ni lan du gshe ba'o // /

column3: mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bskur sti byed pa ste / / +sngar mchod rten brtsigs pa dang  de'i 'og tu  mchod pa byas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692709#692720#TD4083E.TXT.r_1014;TD4083E.TXT.r_1015;TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# stsogs pa'i sgra ni slar khro ba dang slar brdeg pa dang slar mchad 'dru ba dang rnam pa drug ste / / +slar gshe ba bzhin du slar khro ba  la sogs pa la yang rig par bya'o // /

column3: mdo las de'i pha rol gyi yang pha rol tu zhes pa nas gsol bar byed do zhes pa'i bar du ni phyi ma'i rgyu bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692274#TD4083E.TXT.r_963;TD4083E.TXT.r_964# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692721#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693035#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053;TD4083E.TXT.r_1054# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693081#693090#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061;TD4083E.TXT.r_1062# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693975#693976#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151;TD4083E.TXT.r_1152# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 1.788#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691196#TD4083E.TXT.r_843;TD4083E.TXT.r_844# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column11: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column17: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693896#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143;TD4083E.TXT.r_1144# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: mdo las de'i 'og tu lus tha ma la zhes pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das te zhes pa'i bar du ni dngos su 'bras bu bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692734#692752#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016;TD4083E.TXT.r_1017;TD4083E.TXT.r_1018;TD4083E.TXT.r_1019;TD4083E.TXT.r_1020;TD4083E.TXT.r_1021# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' la     // / +gzhan dag gshe ba dang  khro ba dang  brdegs pa dang  mtshang 'dru bar byed pa dag la khro bas zil gyis non pas slar brnyas par 'dod pas slar gshe bar byed / /
column5: 0.014#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2068139#2068143#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13037;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13038;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13039# rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i mi phyir btang ba zhes bya ba ni rab tu 'byung ba ni rab tu 'byung ba'o // / +de 'dod pa ni rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'o // / +rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i mi de slar btang ba ni rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i mi  phyir btang ba'o // /
column6: 0.014#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2869505#2869506#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_192# gzhan gyis gnod pa byas kyang zhe sdang mi ldang zhing slar gnod par ma byas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ni gyog phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te / /

column8: 0.025#TD4068E.TXT.r#575393#575393#TD4068E.TXT.r_616# yang na dngos po gang dang    phrad pa'i tshe ni 'bral bar mi 'dod la bral ba'i tshe ni slar phrad par 'dod pa skye ba de ni bde ba'i tshor ba'o // /

column10: 0.028#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1726896#1726897#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3790;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3791# de bzhin du rgyas par khyi'i tshang du bskyur ba dang  de dag kyang de bzhin du srung ba dang phyug pos slar blangs pa'i bar du dang  chung mas smras pa / /
column11: 0.029#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1781333#1781333#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_10207# ming chen dge bsnyen gang srog gcod pa spong zhing srog gcod pa las slar ldog pa dang  ma byin par len pa spong zhing ma byin par len pa las slar ldog pa dang  'dod pas log par gyem ba spong zhing 'dod pas log par  gyem pa las slar ldog par byed na ming chen 'di tsam gyis na phal cher bslab pa'i dge bsnyen du 'gyur ro // /

column3: mdo las de'i sangs  rgyas kyi zhing yid mngon par dga' ba zhes bya bar 'gyur zhes pa nas me tog sil ma gtor ba zhes pa'i bar du ni bskal pa'i ming dang  rgyu'i ming dang  zhing gi mtshan nyid kyi rgyan bstan pa'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692770#692780#TD4083E.TXT.r_1024;TD4083E.TXT.r_1025# gzhan dag khros shing 'khrugs pa rnams kyang yal bar 'jog cing bzod pa gsol bar mi byed la / /

column10: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#694131#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694536#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column14: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693895#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693975#693975#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column22: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column23: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693384#693385#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column24: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#691030#691030#TD4083E.TXT.r_830;TD4083E.TXT.r_831# gir mi byed pa ni 'das ma thag pa'i lta bu'i yin pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi khyim dang gtsug lag khang ngam / /
column25: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343562#1343563#TD4037E.TXT.r_3760;TD4037E.TXT.r_3761# byang chub sems dpas gzhan  dag la nyes par byas sam / / +nyes pa byas su dogs kyang rung ste / /

column3: sngar ni rgyu bstan phyis ni     // / +'bras bu bstan to // / +rgyu bstan pa la yang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs pa dang  'jig rten nas 'das pa la mchod pa byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344552#1344555#TD4037E.TXT.r_3923;TD4037E.TXT.r_3924;TD4037E.TXT.r_3925;TD4037E.TXT.r_3926# byang chub sems dpa' nad pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan  pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344667#1344668#TD4037E.TXT.r_3938;TD4037E.TXT.r_3939;TD4037E.TXT.r_3940# kun  nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi byed na    nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344800#1344802#TD4037E.TXT.r_3956;TD4037E.TXT.r_3957;TD4037E.TXT.r_3958# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na / /
column7: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811955#1811958#TD4082E.TXT.r_630;TD4082E.TXT.r_631;TD4082E.TXT.r_632# byang chub sems dpa' nad pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems  dang ldan pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812067#1812069#TD4082E.TXT.r_646;TD4082E.TXT.r_647;TD4082E.TXT.r_648# byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don la tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa dag  mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang  tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi  byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812205#1812207#TD4082E.TXT.r_667;TD4082E.TXT.r_668;TD4082E.TXT.r_669# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang  longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal  ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691144#691147#TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691380#691381#TD4083E.TXT.r_861;TD4083E.TXT.r_862# ma dad pa dang ma gus pas mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692807#692821#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030;TD4083E.TXT.r_1031# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692949#692952#TD4083E.TXT.r_1043;TD4083E.TXT.r_1042;TD4083E.TXT.r_1044# 'dzin par byed rjes su 'jug par byed na  nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column15: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693915#693917#TD4083E.TXT.r_1145;TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# nga rgyal gyi grogs byed du mi 'gro na / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column16: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column17: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694089#694092#TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167# sems can dag mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyis rig pa ston par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column18: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694239#694241#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column19: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694282#694285#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column20: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694337#694344#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192;TD4083E.TXT.r_1193# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column21: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694410#694412#TD4083E.TXT.r_1197;TD4083E.TXT.r_1198# byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column22: 5.960#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691059#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column23: 0.019#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812148#1812151#TD4082E.TXT.r_660;TD4082E.TXT.r_661;TD4082E.TXT.r_662# nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column24: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#690903#690904#TD4083E.TXT.r_816;TD4083E.TXT.r_817# khong  khro ba la sogs pas gus par mi byed cing stan las mi ldang la stan mi stobs na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column25: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column26: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694050#694051#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column27: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343571#1343571#TD4037E.TXT.r_3762# kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  nga rgyal gyis non pas mthun par shad kyis byang bar mi byed de / /
column28: 0.025#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810894#1810894#TD4082E.TXT.r_487# kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  nga rgyal gyis non pas mthun par shad kyis byang bar mi byed cing de yal bar 'dor na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / /
column29: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693407#693407#TD4083E.TXT.r_1095# bar mi byed par de thams cad du yal bar bor nas nyan thos kyi sde snod nyid la brtson par sbyor zhing goms par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column30: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#693685#693685#TD4083E.TXT.r_1121# byang  chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis dam pa yin pa'i rlom sems kyis bdag la chags pa dang  gzhan la khong khro bas brnyas pa dang bcas pa dang  gshe ba dang bcas pas bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column31: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342239#1342239#TD4037E.TXT.r_3591;TD4037E.TXT.r_3592;TD4037E.TXT.r_3593# nyes pa dang bcas  shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column32: 0.029#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809483#1809483#TD4082E.TXT.r_326;TD4082E.TXT.r_327;TD4082E.TXT.r_328# chos sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column33: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694181#694181#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: mya ngan las 'das zhes pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu mchod pa byed pa'o // / +de nas 'di ltar tha mar lus kyi tshe zhes pa nas 'di  man chad bshad pa'i tshul gong ma dag dang 'dra bar dbye'o //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692822#692831#TD4083E.TXT.r_1030;TD4083E.TXT.r_1031# le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can MA YIN PA'O // / +thabs des 'dul bar bya bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mu stegs can yin pa dang  rang bzhin gyis 'thab krol can  yin pa dang  rung ba ma yin pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa kun du spyod pas shad kyis sbyong bar byed du 'jug par 'dod pa dang  shad kyis sbyang bar byas na shas cher 'khrugs te shed skye bar 'gyur ba dang  pha rol bzod pa'i dang tshul can yin zhing kun nas mnar sems med pa'i ngang  tshul can yin du re la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692831#692841#TD4083E.TXT.r_1031# thabs des 'dul bar bya bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mu stegs can yin pa dang  rang bzhin gyis 'thab krol can  yin pa dang  rung ba ma yin pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa kun du spyod pas shad kyis sbyong bar byed du 'jug par 'dod pa dang  shad kyis sbyang bar byas na shas cher 'khrugs te shed skye bar 'gyur ba dang  pha rol bzod pa'i dang tshul can yin zhing kun nas mnar sems med pa'i ngang  tshul can yin du re la / /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692909#692917#TD4083E.TXT.r_1037;TD4083E.TXT.r_1038# mi bzod pa'i    ngang tshul can yin zhing nyon mongs pa can MA YIN PA'O // / +thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mu stegs can yin pa dang  rang bzhin gyis 'thab krol can yin pa dang  chos bzhin ma yin pa dang  dus ma yin par shad kyis sbyong bar byed na nyes pa med do // /

column3: 'di man chad sngon byung ba'i le'u 'chad de / / +sngon de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad cing theg pa chen po'i don spyod pa de bstan na rjes su 'jug pa bskyed pa'i phyir rgyu de bstan cing mos pa skye bar bya ba'i phyir  le'u 'di bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810986#1810989#TD4082E.TXT.r_498;TD4082E.TXT.r_499# gzhan la bdag gis nyes pa byas pa las brtsams te shad kyis byang bar byed pa  shin tu ngo tsha bar byed pa zhig yin na nyes pa med do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692842#692849#TD4083E.TXT.r_1031# thabs des 'dul bar bya bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mu stegs can yin pa dang  rang bzhin gyis 'thab krol can  yin pa dang  rung ba ma yin pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa kun du spyod pas shad kyis sbyong bar byed du 'jug par 'dod pa dang  shad kyis sbyang bar byas na shas cher 'khrugs te shed skye bar 'gyur ba dang  pha rol bzod pa'i dang tshul can yin zhing kun nas mnar sems med pa'i ngang  tshul can yin du re la / /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692850#692857#TD4083E.TXT.r_1031;TD4083E.TXT.r_1032# thabs des 'dul bar bya bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mu stegs can yin pa dang  rang bzhin gyis 'thab krol can  yin pa dang  rung ba ma yin pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa kun du spyod pas shad kyis sbyong bar byed du 'jug par 'dod pa dang  shad kyis sbyang bar byas na shas cher 'khrugs te shed skye bar 'gyur ba dang  pha rol bzod pa'i dang tshul can yin zhing kun nas mnar sems med pa'i ngang  tshul can yin du re la / /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692857#692867#TD4083E.TXT.r_1031;TD4083E.TXT.r_1032;TD4083E.TXT.r_1033# thabs des 'dul bar bya bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mu stegs can yin pa dang  rang bzhin gyis 'thab krol can  yin pa dang  rung ba ma yin pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa kun du spyod pas shad kyis sbyong bar byed du 'jug par 'dod pa dang  shad kyis sbyang bar byas na shas cher 'khrugs te shed skye bar 'gyur ba dang  pha rol bzod pa'i dang tshul can yin zhing kun nas mnar sems med pa'i ngang  tshul can yin du re la / / +gzhan shad kyis sbyong bar byed pas shin tu ngo tsha bar byed pa zhig na nyes pa med do // /

column3: 'di ci las btags pa dang  de'i ming dang  de dris pa'i lan rnam pa gsum zhig ston te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692866#692876#TD4083E.TXT.r_1032;TD4083E.TXT.r_1033;TD4083E.TXT.r_1034# gzhan shad kyis sbyong bar byed pas shin tu ngo tsha bar byed pa zhig na nyes pa med do // / +pha rol shad kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /

column3: 'di'i nang nas sngar dbang po rnon po dang bar ma chos thos pas rtogs pa skyes te lung bstan / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692877#692889#TD4083E.TXT.r_1034;TD4083E.TXT.r_1035# 'ga' zhig la yid du mi 'ong ba'i rgyus gzhan dag gis sbyong bar byed pa spong ba ni nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.028#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810998#1810998#TD4082E.TXT.r_500# byang chub sems dpa' rtsod pa byung ba 'ga' zhig las byung bar gyur nas gzhan dag la chos bzhin du mthun par shad kyis byang bar byed kyang / /

column3: dbang po tham rnams chos thos kyang da dung rtogs pa ma skyes pa rnams sngon theg pa chen po'i  spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams ji ltar spyod pa'i dpe bstan na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692888#692909#TD4083E.TXT.r_1035;TD4083E.TXT.r_1036;TD4083E.TXT.r_1037;TD4083E.TXT.r_1038# byang chub sems dpa' rtsod pa byung ba 'ga' zhig las gzhan dag la 'khrugs pas de rnams dus su chos bzhin du shad kyis sbyong bar byed kyang kun nas mnar sems sam / /

column3: rtogs pa skye bar 'gyur bas sprul pa'i grong khyer gyi dpe bstan pa dang  'grel pa las sems can nga rgyal can bdun yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692823#692829#TD4083E.TXT.r_1030;TD4083E.TXT.r_1031# le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +thabs des 'dul bar bya bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mu stegs can yin pa dang  rang bzhin gyis 'thab krol can  yin pa dang  rung ba ma yin pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa kun du spyod pas shad kyis sbyong bar byed du 'jug par 'dod pa dang  shad kyis sbyang bar byas na shas cher 'khrugs te shed skye bar 'gyur ba dang  pha rol bzod pa'i dang tshul can yin zhing kun nas mnar sems med pa'i ngang  tshul can yin du re la / /

column3: nga rgyal gyi nyon mongs pa de spang ba'i phyir 'di gsungs te / / +nga rgyal de bdun las kyang bzhi pa lta bu bsam  gtan spyod cing 'jig rten gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa tsam du sems pa de'i gnyen por sprul pa'i grong khyer gyi dpe bstan / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692918#692927#TD4083E.TXT.r_1038;TD4083E.TXT.r_1039;TD4083E.TXT.r_1040# thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mu stegs can yin pa dang  rang bzhin gyis 'thab krol can yin pa dang  chos bzhin ma yin pa dang  dus ma yin par shad kyis sbyong bar byed na nyes pa med do // /

column6: 0.010#TD4036E.TXT.r#55089#55091#TD4036E.TXT.r_8202;TD4036E.TXT.r_8203# legs pa kho nar rab tu shes par byed cing byung ngo cog dang du mi len par spong bar byed / /
column7: 0.010#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2778663#2778664#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10802;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10803;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10804# the tshom gyi bar gyi sgrib pa byung ngo cog dang du mi len par spong bar byed / / +sel bar byed / /
column8: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#17710#17710#TD4036E.TXT.r_2561;TD4036E.TXT.r_2562# las kyi rnam par smin pa'i rjes su 'jug par byed la / / +gzhan dag la 'khrug par mi byed cing / /
column9: 0.016#TD4009E.TXT.r#332261#332261#TD4009E.TXT.r_1646;TD4009E.TXT.r_1647# de bzhin du smon par byed smon pa med par mi byed / / +mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med par mi byed / /
column10: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2342306#2342306#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3644;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3645# shes bya'i dngos po dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa dag gis lta bar byed cing / / +rnam par 'byed par byed / /
column11: 0.016#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2772760#2772760#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10011;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10012;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10013# rang bzhin gyi    mtshan ma khyi'us khyi'u dbyung ba'i tshul gyis mngon par 'byin par byed / / +mngon par sel bar byed / / +mngon par spong bar byed de / /
column12: 0.016#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2779283#2779283#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10879;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10880;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10881# chen po  bstan pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing snying por sems par byed / / +bstan par sems par byed / / +rgyas par sems par byed de / /
column13: 0.016#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2788202#2788204#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12087;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12088# 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnas lta bu'i chos yid du mi 'ong ba sngon nyams su myong ba dag la tshul bzhin ma yin par yid la byed cing 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par byed dang du len par byed de / /
column14: 0.016#TD4039E.TXT.r#1867861#1867861#TD4039E.TXT.r_6106;TD4039E.TXT.r_6107# don med par yang longs spyod rnams chud  gzon par mi byed do // / +gnas ma yin par yang sko bar mi byed do // /
column15: 0.016#TD4079E.TXT.r#765611#765611#TD4079E.TXT.r_1536;TD4079E.TXT.r_1537;TD4079E.TXT.r_1538# de bzhin nyid kyi skye gnas CAN GYI TING NGE 'DZIN YANG dag pa'i sbyor bas kun tu bsten pas rjes su 'gro bar byed // / +bsgom pas rjes su 'gro bar byed // / +lan mang du byed pas rjes su 'gro bar    byed / /
column16: 0.016#TD4091E.TXT.r#704784#704787#TD4091E.TXT.r_1894;TD4091E.TXT.r_1895;TD4091E.TXT.r_1896;TD4091E.TXT.r_1897# de la skye bas ni chos de skyed par byed do // / +gnas pas ni gnas par byed do // / +rga bas ni rnyings par byed do // /
column17: 0.017#TD4036E.TXT.r#62145#62145#TD4036E.TXT.r_9126;TD4036E.TXT.r_9127;TD4036E.TXT.r_9128# de la brjed ngas pas nyon mongs pa can gyi chos kun du 'byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni dge ba'i chos la goms  par byas pa'i stobs kyis dang du mi len cing spong bar byed / / +sel bar byed / / +byang bar byed do // /
column18: 0.017#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2774171#2774171#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10219;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10220# de dag dge slong gang rmad grags mi che ba 'dod pa chung ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa de la ni brnyas par byed / / +khyad du gsod par byed gnod par byed do // /
column19: 0.017#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1501721#1501722#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11782;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11783;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11784# ji ltar nye bar rgyu bar byed ce na / / +de la rjes su chags par yang byed / / +khong khro bar yang byed / /

column22: 0.018#TD4039E.TXT.r#1864619#1864619#TD4039E.TXT.r_5726# reg pa dag dang  mi sdug pa'i lag pa dang   dbyug pa dang  bong ba'i 'dus te reg pa dag gi kun du spyod pa byas kyang de ni rgyu dang bcas pa'i tshor ba la sogs pa gzugs can ma yin pa'i 'du shes byed de dag la yang mi rtag par yang dag par mthong bas rjes su chags par yang mi byed khong khro bar yang mi byed de / /
column23: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#686432#686435#TD4083E.TXT.r_274;TD4083E.TXT.r_275;TD4083E.TXT.r_276;TD4083E.TXT.r_277# dga'  ba'i shas chung ba la yang bdag nyid mthong bar mi ston to // / +gzhan dag la mi bsten par yang mi byed / / +ha cang bsten par yang mi byed / /
column24: 0.018#TD4061E.TXT.r#1538024#1538027#TD4061E.TXT.r_3445;TD4061E.TXT.r_3446;TD4061E.TXT.r_3447;TD4061E.TXT.r_3448# mdo  gzhan las gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i don dang  tshig dang yi ge zab mo dag rtogs par khong du chud par byed / / +dgongs pa rtogs par byed / /
column25: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#894075#894075#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_678;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_679# lce'i dbang pos myangs par gyur na ro phun sum tshogs pa las lce'i dbang po sim par byed cing dga' bar byed la / / +mngon du phyogs pa'i sems skye bar byed do // /
column26: 0.019#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3103504#3103504#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1704;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1705# ji nas  kyang sgo gnyi ga nas bsod nams skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar gzhan dag kyang byed du 'jug par byed do // / +de la drug pas ni bshad pas kyang sbyin pa sbyin par byed la mthus kyang sbyin pa sbyin par byed / /
column27: 0.019#TD4047E.TXT.r#1141147#1141147#TD4047E.TXT.r_2880;TD4047E.TXT.r_2881# thams cad  la sems mnyam pa'i phyir gzhan la phun tshogs pa'i khyad par thob par 'dod pas bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas de dag la slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud kyang mi byed do // / +gzhan dag la yang yang dag par ston par byed do // /
column28: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343721#1343722#TD4037E.TXT.r_3787;TD4037E.TXT.r_3788# snga ma bzhin du thams cad rig par bya'o // / +chos bzhin ma yin pa dang  mthun pa ma yin par shad kyis spyod par byed na nyes pa med do // /

column30: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1339055#1339055#TD4037E.TXT.r_3175;TD4037E.TXT.r_3176# gzhan dag la kun nas mnar sems dang  khong khro ba dang  'khon pa'i sems byung ba dang du len par mi byed do // / +snyom las dang le lo skyes pa dang du len par mi byed do // /
column31: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#691029#691029#TD4083E.TXT.r_830# gir mi byed pa ni 'das ma thag pa'i lta bu'i yin pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column33: 0.025#TD4069E.TXT.r#630948#630948#TD4069E.TXT.r_1160;TD4069E.TXT.r_1161# 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa byung ba dang du len par byed / / +mi spong bar byed / /
column34: 0.026#TD4040E.TXT.r#2194460#2194461#TD4040E.TXT.r_814# dge slong ltung ba byung na rang gis 'gyod pa'i kun nas dkris pas gleng bar byed sel bar byed cing gzhan dag  gis gleng gi dogs pas chos bzhin du phyir byed de des na rtsod pa de nyid nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro // /
column35: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2320119#2320119#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1085;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1086# mdo sde dag la gus par byas te / / +gzhan dag la ston par yang byed yi ger 'dri bar yang byed yi ger bris nas 'chang bar yang byed / /
column36: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1380366#1380366#TD4037E.TXT.r_8496;TD4037E.TXT.r_8497# bsgom pa'i rnam pas sbyor bar byed dam / / +gzhan dag la rgyas par ston par byed dam / /

column3: ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing 'bras bu chung dus chog par sems pa de la theg pa chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chen po la thabs  kyis gzud pa'i phyir sngon gyi gtam gyi grong khyer gyi dpe bstan na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692349#692354#TD4083E.TXT.r_971;TD4083E.TXT.r_972;TD4083E.TXT.r_973# ches rgod par byed rtse bar byed ca co 'don par byed du gzhug par 'dod cing / / +rnam pa sna tshogs pas smra bar byed 'dod na nyon mongs pa can gyi ltung bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692953#692960#TD4083E.TXT.r_1043;TD4083E.TXT.r_1044;TD4083E.TXT.r_1045# 'dzin par byed rjes su 'jug par byed na  nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +de spang bar 'dod kyang zil gyis non pas mngon du rgyu ba la ni nyes pa med do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692961#692970#TD4083E.TXT.r_1044;TD4083E.TXT.r_1045;TD4083E.TXT.r_1046;TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# de spang bar 'dod kyang zil gyis non pas mngon du rgyu ba la ni nyes pa med do // / +bsnyen bkur 'dod phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693228#693236#TD4083E.TXT.r_1076;TD4083E.TXT.r_1077# de rnams byung ba nyams su myong bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 5.960#TD4083E.TXT.r#693683#693685#TD4083E.TXT.r_1121# byang  chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis dam pa yin pa'i rlom sems kyis bdag la chags pa dang  gzhan la khong khro bas brnyas pa dang bcas pa dang  gshe ba dang bcas pas bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342239#1342239#TD4037E.TXT.r_3591;TD4037E.TXT.r_3592;TD4037E.TXT.r_3593# nyes pa dang bcas  shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column10: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344552#1344555#TD4037E.TXT.r_3923;TD4037E.TXT.r_3924;TD4037E.TXT.r_3925;TD4037E.TXT.r_3926# byang chub sems dpa' nad pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan  pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344667#1344669#TD4037E.TXT.r_3938;TD4037E.TXT.r_3939;TD4037E.TXT.r_3940# kun  nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi byed na    nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344800#1344802#TD4037E.TXT.r_3956;TD4037E.TXT.r_3957;TD4037E.TXT.r_3958# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na / /
column13: 0.016#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809483#1809483#TD4082E.TXT.r_326;TD4082E.TXT.r_327;TD4082E.TXT.r_328# chos sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column14: 0.016#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812148#1812148#TD4082E.TXT.r_660;TD4082E.TXT.r_661# nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column15: 0.017#TD4083E.TXT.r#693270#693273#TD4083E.TXT.r_1080;TD4083E.TXT.r_1081# byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i ro myong bar byed cing // / +de la yon tan du lta bar  byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column16: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693407#693407#TD4083E.TXT.r_1095# bar mi byed par de thams cad du yal bar bor nas nyan thos kyi sde snod nyid la brtson par sbyor zhing goms par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column17: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#691208#691208#TD4083E.TXT.r_844# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column18: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342151#1342151#TD4037E.TXT.r_3570;TD4037E.TXT.r_3571# sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na / /
column19: 0.022#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809389#1809389#TD4082E.TXT.r_307;TD4082E.TXT.r_308# sems can  yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column20: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694655#694655#TD4083E.TXT.r_1219# sems can skrag par bya bar rigs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas skrag par mi byed pa dang  sems can 'dun par bya ba'i rigs pa rnams 'dun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column21: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693474#693475#TD4083E.TXT.r_1102;TD4083E.TXT.r_1103# byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyid med kyang sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin yod bzhin du phyi rol gyi bstan bcos te mu stegs can gyi bstan bcos  la brtson par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: slob pa la gnas pa'i ma rabs rnams sprul pa'i grong khyer bsti ba'i gnas tsam du bstan nas kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chen po rin po che'i 'byung gnas nyid du gzud pa'i phyir dpe 'di bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692983#692992#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047;TD4083E.TXT.r_1048# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' rim gro dang  bsnyen bkur la yongs su zhen pas zang zing dang bcas pa'i sems kyis 'khor sdud par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes  par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.010#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690874#TD4083E.TXT.r_814# ches rgan pa la gus par mi byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod pa dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692406#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: bla na med pa  bcu bstan pa'i nang nas gnyis pa ste / / +sngon gyi spyod pa bla na med pa ston pa dang sbyar na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes kyi zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba byang chub kyi spyod pa dga' ba spyod pa'i tshe bskal pa mang po zhig tu spyad nas gzod mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang sbyar na    theg pa pa'i byang chub tu nye bas thob pa nyid bsti ba'i gnas yin par bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692993#693003#TD4083E.TXT.r_1048;TD4083E.TXT.r_1049# byang chub sems dpa' rim gro dang  bsnyen bkur la yongs su zhen pas zang zing dang bcas pa'i sems kyis 'khor sdud par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes  par 'gyur ro // /

column7: 1.192#TD4083E.TXT.r#691343#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1190883#1190883#TD4047E.TXT.r_9979;TD4047E.TXT.r_9980# de nyid bstan pa'i phyir le lo la sogs pa la  brten te zhes bya ba la sogs pa / / +lus kyi le lo dang  sems kyi snyom las bdag por byas nas zhes pa'i tha tshig go // /

column3: yang bla na med pa bcu'i gsum pa las lhag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi mthus bskyed pa dang sbyar ni tshong dpon gyi dpes dka' ba sna tshogs spyad nas don grub pa bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa yang de  dang 'dra bar sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692406#692407#TD4083E.TXT.r_978;TD4083E.TXT.r_979# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column26: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692351#692352#TD4083E.TXT.r_972# rnam pa sna tshogs pas smra bar byed 'dod na nyon mongs pa can gyi ltung bar 'gyur ro // /
