column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694035#694050#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694045#694060#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161;TD4083E.TXT.r_1162;TD4083E.TXT.r_1163# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694239#694249#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182;TD4083E.TXT.r_1183;TD4083E.TXT.r_1184# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694281#694285#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694336#694341#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192;TD4083E.TXT.r_1193# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694410#694412#TD4083E.TXT.r_1197;TD4083E.TXT.r_1198# byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column15: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691210#691213#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column16: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691470#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column17: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694089#694091#TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167# sems can dag mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyis rig pa ston par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column18: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693158#693160#TD4083E.TXT.r_1069;TD4083E.TXT.r_1070# khong khro ba dang nga rgyal gyis non pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thad du gdams ngag tshol du mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa  can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column19: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#691305#691305#TD4083E.TXT.r_853;TD4083E.TXT.r_854;TD4083E.TXT.r_855# byang chub sems dpa' sems can tshul khrims 'chal zhing log par spyod pa rnams la kun nas mnar sems la sogs  bas yal bar 'dor zhing tshul khrims 'chal ba nyid kyi rkyen gyis de rnams la khyad du gsod cing de rnams la phan pa dang bde ba la gnod par mi byed na / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur te / / +snyom las la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste / /
column20: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694473#694473#TD4083E.TXT.r_1203;TD4083E.TXT.r_1204# byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis yang dag pa'i tshul khrims dang  thos pa dang  gtong ba la sogs pa yang dag pa'i yon tan rjod par mi byed cing yang dag pa'i bsngags pa  mi brjod pa dang  legs par smras ba la legs so zhes bya ba ma byin na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin no // /
column21: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#693270#693272#TD4083E.TXT.r_1080;TD4083E.TXT.r_1081# byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i ro myong bar byed cing // / +de la yon tan du lta bar  byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'os 'os su sbyar ro // / +mdo las / / +tshad med rgyal ba ngo mtshar 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694061#694071#TD4083E.TXT.r_1162;TD4083E.TXT.r_1163;TD4083E.TXT.r_1164# nyes pa med pa ni  'das ma thag pa bzhin no // / +bag med ces bya ba la sogs pa la / / +bag med pa rnams la ji skad bstan pa'i rigs pa mi ston pa ni rigs pa ston pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes pa byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: zhes pa nas / / +'jig rten rig pa ji ltar dgyes bzhin spyod // / +zhes pa'i bar du ni gzhal med khang dbul ba dang  bstod de phyag 'tshal ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694070#694083#TD4083E.TXT.r_1164;TD4083E.TXT.r_1165;TD4083E.TXT.r_1166# bag med pa rnams la ji skad bstan pa'i rigs pa mi ston pa ni rigs pa ston pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes pa byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344640#1344643#TD4037E.TXT.r_3936;TD4037E.TXT.r_3937# nad gyog la ji lta ba bzhin du sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i grogs bya ba yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don la tshul ma yin par zhugs pa dag mthong na / /

column3: mdo las de nas  dge slong rnams tshangs pa chen po de dag ces pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba lags zhes pa'i bar du ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691209#691213#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694238#694241#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694281#694285#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#694180#694182#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column9: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#691055#691063#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833;TD4083E.TXT.r_834# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694569#694569#TD4083E.TXT.r_1212;TD4083E.TXT.r_1213# skrod par mi byed na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: mdo las dge slong dag de nas tshangs pa chen po zhes pa nas / / +de nas dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das des tshangs ba de rnams  la cang mi gsung bar de na bzhugs so zhes pa'i bar du ni chos bshad par gnang ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694099#694119#TD4083E.TXT.r_1168;TD4083E.TXT.r_1169;TD4083E.TXT.r_1170;TD4083E.TXT.r_1171;TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# bdag nyid mi shes pa dang gzhan dag la bcol na nyes pa med do // /

column3: de nas yang dge slong rnams zhes pa nas phan tshun dong zhing smra'o zhes pa'i bar du ni tshangs pa rnams la bskul ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694115#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1171;TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# de'i phyir de la phan gdags pas slar phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid ni lan du phan 'dogs pa nyid do // / +gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 1.192#TD4083E.TXT.r#694535#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column6: 0.017#TD4083E.TXT.r#693384#693385#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694633#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#693082#693082#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: de nas dge slong rnams zhes pa nas gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur zhes pa'i bar du  ni lha rnams kyis gsol ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694131#694141#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172;TD4083E.TXT.r_1173;TD4083E.TXT.r_1174# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#692406#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693975#693977#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151;TD4083E.TXT.r_1152# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693082#693082#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column16: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694633#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: de nas dge slong rnams tshangs pa bye ba khrag khrig ces pa nas gshegs su gsol zhes pa'i bar du ni chos bshad par gsol ba dang  mchod par gsol ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694142#694157#TD4083E.TXT.r_1173;TD4083E.TXT.r_1174# byang chub sems dpa' de rang nyid nus pa dang ldan nam mi ldan yang rung // / +kun nas mnar sems dang ldan pa dang  snying brtse ba dang zhes dang bral bas yon tan len par mi byed pa dang  dmu rgod kyi rang bzhin can dang   dge ba'i bshes gnyen gzhan gyis yongs su zin pa dang  gzhan gyis phan btags pa byas pa'ang rung // /

column3: de nas dge slong rnams tshangs pa chen po de dag gis zhes pa nas phyag kyang 'tshal zhes pa'i bar    du ni bstod de phyag 'tshal ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694158#694182#TD4083E.TXT.r_1174;TD4083E.TXT.r_1175;TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# kun nas mnar sems dang ldan pa dang  snying brtse ba dang zhes dang bral bas yon tan len par mi byed pa dang  dmu rgod kyi rang bzhin can dang   dge ba'i bshes gnyen gzhan gyis yongs su zin pa dang  gzhan gyis phan btags pa byas pa'ang rung // / +sems can phan 'dogs pa de mthong na byas pa mi gzo ste / /

column3: mdo las / / +ngo mtshar gyur pa brgya la 'jig rten du // / +zhes pa nas rtag tu mnyam par gyur zhes pa'i bar du ni 'jig rten du gshegs pa dkon pa bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692815#692818#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column6: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#690977#690978#TD4083E.TXT.r_826;TD4083E.TXT.r_827# byang chub sems dpa' pha rol po  dag 'dri ba dang  kun du smra ba dang  yang dag par dga' bar byed pa la nga rgyal la sogs pas yang dag par lan mi 'debs pa dang  kun du mi smra ba dang  yang dag par dga' bar mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon  mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#691210#691213#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#694282#694285#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693159#693160#TD4083E.TXT.r_1069;TD4083E.TXT.r_1070# khong khro ba dang nga rgyal gyis non pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thad du gdams ngag tshol du mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa  can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: mdo las bskal pa khrag khrig brgyad cu zhes pa nas / / +bsod nams kyis ni 'jig rten zhes pa'i bar  du ni spyan du gyur pa dang skyabs su gyur ba bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694189#694198#TD4083E.TXT.r_1178;TD4083E.TXT.r_1179# lan du phan gdags pa'i phyir 'bad kyang ma nus pa dang  de nyid lan du phan gdags par mi 'dod pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa la ni nyes pa med do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694381#694387#TD4083E.TXT.r_1194;TD4083E.TXT.r_1195;TD4083E.TXT.r_1196# gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa'i bya ba dag rang nyid kyis byas zin pa dang  mu stegs can yin pa  las chos rkur 'ongs la de yang 'dul ba'i skal ba med pa zhig yin na nyes pa med do // / +gzhan gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /

column3: mdo las de nas dge slong rnams zhes pa nas dul zhing zhi la rab tu bde bar 'gyur zhes ba'i bar du ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa dang  zhi zhing dul bas 'phags pa'i lam bsgrub pa bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693203#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694199#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1178;TD4083E.TXT.r_1179;TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# lan du phan gdags pa'i phyir 'bad kyang ma nus pa dang  de nyid lan du phan gdags par mi 'dod pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa la ni nyes pa med do // / +gzhan gyi zhes bya ba  la sogs pa la / /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694306#694313#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190;TD4083E.TXT.r_1191# 'khor rnams kyi don mi byed pa ni chos  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.014#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693895#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#694633#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693974#693975#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column14: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693082#693082#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694448#694448#TD4083E.TXT.r_1202# gzhan dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa smra bar mi byed pa ni yon tan  gyi bsngags pa smra ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693261#693261#TD4083E.TXT.r_1079# bsam gtan gyi bde ba nyams  su myong bar byed cing de la yon tan du lta ba ni dge ba chos dang sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: mdo las de nas dge slong rnams bcom  ldan 'das de zhes pa nas mi gsung bar bzhugs so zhes pa'i bar du ni gnang ba bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694220#694240#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: mdo las de nas yang dge slong rnams zhes pa nas yang na 'dir ni sangs rgyas mngon par byung zhes ba'i bar du ni gong ma dang 'dra bar sbyar ro // /

column11: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694569#694569#TD4083E.TXT.r_1212;TD4083E.TXT.r_1213# skrod par mi byed na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: bde ba'i 'du shes ni gnyen pos gnas pa ste / / +sdug bsngal skad cig tsam zhi ba la bde bar sems pa la bde ba de nyid kyang stor zhes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694294#694307#TD4083E.TXT.r_1188;TD4083E.TXT.r_1189;TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# nyes pa med pa ni pham par 'gyur ba bzhin no // / +'khor rnams kyi ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694534#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694632#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.014#TD4083E.TXT.r#693203#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#693711#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693383#693384#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690826#690826#TD4083E.TXT.r_809# sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang du mi len cing 'dod pa chung ba dang  chog shes pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690874#TD4083E.TXT.r_814# ches rgan pa la gus par mi byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod pa dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693973#693977#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151;TD4083E.TXT.r_1152# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691120#691120#TD4083E.TXT.r_837# len par mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi bsod nams kyi grogs su 'gro ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos te / /
column15: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: mdo las de nas dge slong rnams tshangs pa chen po de dag  gis zhes pa nas bskal pa bye ba stong du bsgrubs pa'o zhes pa'i bar du ni bstod de bshad par gsol ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694314#694322#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column8: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693082#693082#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344885#1344887#TD4037E.TXT.r_3972# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor bsdus la kun nas mnar sems kyi  sems dang ldan pas dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  phongs pa de dag gi phyir bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa rnams las gos dang  zas dang mal cha dang  stan dang na ba'i gsos sman dang  yo byad rnams chos bzhin du yongs  su tshol bar mi byed na / /
column10: 0.023#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812298#1812299#TD4082E.TXT.r_682# byang chub sems dpas 'khor bsdus la kun  nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang phongs pa de dag gi phyir bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams las gos dang zas dang  mal cha dang stan dad na ba'i gsos sman dang  yo byad rnams chos bzhin du  yongs su tshol bar mi byed na / /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693975#693975#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693137#693137#TD4083E.TXT.r_1067# ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon  par bsgrub pa la brtson pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: mdo las de nas dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes kyi zil gyis gnon zhes pa nas rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba zhes pa'i bar du ni de ltar chos  bshad par gnang nas bshad do zhes pa dang  gzhan gyis mi nus zhes pa dang  bshad pa'i dus dang  bshad pas phan pa thob pa dang bzhir dbye ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691210#691213#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694089#694092#TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167# sems can dag mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyis rig pa ston par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694239#694243#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182;TD4083E.TXT.r_1183# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694281#694285#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694323#694339#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694342#694355#TD4083E.TXT.r_1192;TD4083E.TXT.r_1193# le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +na ste mi nus pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa nyid dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims  srung ba dang  gzhan gang yang rung ba la bcol ba dang  'khor yang bsod nams chen po dang ldan par shes pa dang  rang nyid gos la sogs pa tshol ba'i nus pa bstan pa dag / /
column12: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: 'di ni dang po'o // / +chos kyi 'khor lo gsum du bzlas te zhes pa ni bdag gi don dang  gzhan gyi don la 'di ni gzhan gyi dang sbyar ro //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694356#694368#TD4083E.TXT.r_1193;TD4083E.TXT.r_1194# na ste mi nus pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa nyid dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims  srung ba dang  gzhan gang yang rung ba la bcol ba dang  'khor yang bsod nams chen po dang ldan par shes pa dang  rang nyid gos la sogs pa tshol ba'i nus pa bstan pa dag / /

column3: sdug bsngal zhes pa ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ste / / +mtshan nyid de bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694367#694377#TD4083E.TXT.r_1193;TD4083E.TXT.r_1194# na ste mi nus pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa nyid dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims  srung ba dang  gzhan gang yang rung ba la bcol ba dang  'khor yang bsod nams chen po dang ldan par shes pa dang  rang nyid gos la sogs pa tshol ba'i nus pa bstan pa dag / / +gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa'i bya ba dag rang nyid kyis byas zin pa dang  mu stegs can yin pa  las chos rkur 'ongs la de yang 'dul ba'i skal ba med pa zhig yin na nyes pa med do // /

column3: 'khor lo'i don ni gong du bstan pa yin / / +'khor lo de bskor bas zag pa med pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir bstan to // /
column4: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694198#694198#TD4083E.TXT.r_1178;TD4083E.TXT.r_1179# lan du phan gdags pa'i phyir 'bad kyang ma nus pa dang  de nyid lan du phan gdags par mi 'dod pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa la ni nyes pa med do // / +gzhan gyi zhes bya ba  la sogs pa la / /

column3: lan gsum  bzlas pa yang de gcig cing yang mtshan nyid bcu gsum dang ldan par ston pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694388#694396#TD4083E.TXT.r_1196# gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par mi 'jug pa ni gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par 'jug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: dge spyong dang  tshangs pa gzhan gyis bskor mi nus kyi bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa nyag gcig gis zhes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694025#694027#TD4083E.TXT.r_1159;TD4083E.TXT.r_1160# gzhan sdug bsngal rnams ji skad bstan pas sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed pa ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694395#694412#TD4083E.TXT.r_1196;TD4083E.TXT.r_1197;TD4083E.TXT.r_1198# gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par mi 'jug pa ni gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par 'jug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692326#692326#TD4083E.TXT.r_969;TD4083E.TXT.r_970# rgod pa ste rnam par ma zhi ba'i sems kyis rab tu rgod pa la sogs pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgod pa ma yin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang  chub sems dpa' rgod pas gzhan dag rgod du gzhug par 'dod cing / /
column7: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693567#693567#TD4083E.TXT.r_1110;TD4083E.TXT.r_1111# theg pa chen po dang ldan pa gang la la zhig zab pa'i gnas dag spong ba ni 'das ma thag pa lta bu dang  lta ba ngan pa spong ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang    chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las de kho na'i don nam // /
column8: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693664#693664#TD4083E.TXT.r_1120;TD4083E.TXT.r_1121# bdag la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i rgyu'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang  chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis dam pa yin pa'i rlom sems kyis bdag la chags pa dang  gzhan la khong khro bas brnyas pa dang bcas pa dang  gshe ba dang bcas pas bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: mdo las 'di lta ste 'di ni sdug bsngal lo zhes pa nas 'gro ba bsgrub pa'i  bden pa'o zhes pa'i bar du ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang bden pa bzhi la brten te bskor ba dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis la brten te bskor ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691144#691149#TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840;TD4083E.TXT.r_841# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691210#691213#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691380#691381#TD4083E.TXT.r_861;TD4083E.TXT.r_862# ma dad pa dang ma gus pas mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693915#693917#TD4083E.TXT.r_1145;TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# nga rgyal gyi grogs byed du mi 'gro na / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694282#694285#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694408#694420#TD4083E.TXT.r_1197;TD4083E.TXT.r_1198;TD4083E.TXT.r_1199;TD4083E.TXT.r_1200# byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694421#694431#TD4083E.TXT.r_1199;TD4083E.TXT.r_1200;TD4083E.TXT.r_1201# na ste ma nus pa dang  'dul bar 'dod pa dang  bya ba de gnod pa dang ldan pa yin pa dang      // / +dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan mang po dag gi sems srung bar 'dod pa dang  mu stegs can tshar gcad pa'i phyir ni nyes pa med do // /
column13: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694569#694573#TD4083E.TXT.r_1212;TD4083E.TXT.r_1213;TD4083E.TXT.r_1214# skrod par mi byed na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column14: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691055#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column15: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column16: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694049#694050#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column17: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#691318#691318#TD4083E.TXT.r_856;TD4083E.TXT.r_857# de rnams nyid la rjes su brtse  bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +de rnams 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan mang po dag gi sems bsrungs na nyes pa med do // /

column3: sdug bsngal ba ni 'jig rten rnam gnyis kyi chos zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad do // / +kun 'byung ni sdug bsngal  skye zhing 'byung ba'i rgyu 'byin pa las dang nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin can no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691279#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694430#694448#TD4083E.TXT.r_1200;TD4083E.TXT.r_1201;TD4083E.TXT.r_1202# dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan mang po dag gi sems srung bar 'dod pa dang  mu stegs can tshar gcad pa'i phyir ni nyes pa med do // /
column6: 0.015#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693895#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693081#693082#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693300#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692790#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column14: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693975#693975#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#693261#693261#TD4083E.TXT.r_1079# bsam gtan gyi bde ba nyams  su myong bar byed cing de la yon tan du lta ba ni dge ba chos dang sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: 'gog pa ni yang dag pa dang brtags te 'gog pa dang  mi gyo ba dang  'dus ma byas 'gog pa'i bden pa ste / /

column3: yang dag pa'i lam gyis sdug bsngal mi skye bar gyur pa'o // / +lam ni zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga  ste ; /

column3: lam gyi 'khor rnams thams cad ni lam gyi bden pa'o // / +bden pa zhes pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyis chud pa'i chos pas 'phags pa'i bden  pa'o ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694476#694490#TD4083E.TXT.r_1203;TD4083E.TXT.r_1204;TD4083E.TXT.r_1205;TD4083E.TXT.r_1206# byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis yang dag pa'i tshul khrims dang  thos pa dang  gtong ba la sogs pa yang dag pa'i yon tan rjod par mi byed cing yang dag pa'i bsngags pa  mi brjod pa dang  legs par smras ba la legs so zhes bya ba ma byin na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin no // / +pha rol po rang bzhin gyis 'dod pa chung ngu yin par dpag ste / /

column3: mdo las rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes ba nas 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar du ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs las bzlog pa bstan pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694491#694507#TD4083E.TXT.r_1206;TD4083E.TXT.r_1207# yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i rgyu des 'di kun  nas nyon mongs par 'gyur du dogs pa dang  gtam rdzogs sdong su sdong ba dang  de'i yon tan rnams yon tan ltar bcos pa yin te yang dag pa ma yin pa dang  legs par smra ba yang legs par smra ba ltar bcos pa yin te / /

column3: nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i tshul ci rigs par sbyar ro // / +ma rig pa zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa mi shes pa'i rang  bzhin can ; /

column7: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column8: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690826#690826#TD4083E.TXT.r_809# sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang du mi len cing 'dod pa chung ba dang  chog shes pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690874#TD4083E.TXT.r_814# ches rgan pa la gus par mi byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod pa dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693137#693137#TD4083E.TXT.r_1067# ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon  par bsgrub pa la brtson pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691120#691120#TD4083E.TXT.r_837# len par mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi bsod nams kyi grogs su 'gro ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos te / /
column19: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694130#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: ming dang gzugs zhes pa ni de'i 'og ma'i rkyen gsum spangs pa    thams cad ni ming dang gzugs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694537#694546#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209;TD4083E.TXT.r_1210# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // / +byang chub sems dpa' sems can smra dbab par rigs pa dang  chad pas gcad par rigs pa dang  bskrad par rigs pa rnams nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis smra 'bebs par mi byed dam / /

column3: skye mched drug ni rnam par smin pa'i dbang po drug can no // / +reg pa ni rnam par smin pa'i reg pa myong ba nyid reg pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694545#694555#TD4083E.TXT.r_1210;TD4083E.TXT.r_1211# byang chub sems dpa' sems can smra dbab par rigs pa dang  chad pas gcad par rigs pa dang  bskrad par rigs pa rnams nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis smra 'bebs par mi byed dam / /

column3: tshor ba ni rnam pa gsum myong ba'o // / +sred pa ni phyi nang gi yul la che chung rnam pa gsum du zhen pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694556#694563#TD4083E.TXT.r_1210;TD4083E.TXT.r_1211;TD4083E.TXT.r_1212# byang chub sems dpa' sems can smra dbab par rigs pa dang  chad pas gcad par rigs pa dang  bskrad par rigs pa rnams nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis smra 'bebs par mi byed dam / / +chang pas gcod pas phyir 'chos par mi byed dam / /

column3: len pa ni nyon mongs pa'i  bdag nyid can gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i chos kyi nyon mongs pa'i phung po len pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694178#694181#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#690977#690978#TD4083E.TXT.r_826;TD4083E.TXT.r_827# byang chub sems dpa' pha rol po  dag 'dri ba dang  kun du smra ba dang  yang dag par dga' bar byed pa la nga rgyal la sogs pas yang dag par lan mi 'debs pa dang  kun du mi smra ba dang  yang dag par dga' bar mi BYED PA NI NYON MONGS PA can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon  mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693159#693159#TD4083E.TXT.r_1069;TD4083E.TXT.r_1070# khong khro ba dang nga rgyal gyis non pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thad du gdams ngag tshol du mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa  can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA can ma yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694240#694241#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs PAS NI NYON MONGS PA can ma yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692817#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs PAS NI NYON MONGS PA can ma yin pa'o // /
column10: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693916#693916#TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs PAS NI NYON MONGS PA can ma yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693991#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs PAS NI NYON MONGS PA can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: srid pa ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'khor ba len cing khams gsum du 'byung zhes pa'i don to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694574#694581#TD4083E.TXT.r_1213;TD4083E.TXT.r_1214;TD4083E.TXT.r_1215# le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +bcos su mi rung ba'i rang bzhin can zhig ste / /

column3: skye ba ni rgyus 'phags nas 'bras bu len pa'o // / +rgas pa ni 'bras bu'i mthar gyur pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694582#694591#TD4083E.TXT.r_1215# gtam byar mi rung la bka' blo mi bde zhing mnar sems kyi shas che ba yal bar bor ba dang  dus la gzhes pa dang  gzhi de las 'thab    pa dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par 'gyur ba mthong ba dang  dge 'dun bye bar dogs pas yal bar bor ba dang  sems can de dag rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha shes pa dang  khrel yod pa dang ldan pas myur ba nyid du rang nyid phyir 'chos pa zhig yin na ni nyes  pa med do // /

column3: slos  ba'i mya ngan zhes pa ni 'chi khar yid kyis gdung ba'o // / +smre sngags 'don zhes pa ni tshig tu 'don pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694590#694601#TD4083E.TXT.r_1215# gtam byar mi rung la bka' blo mi bde zhing mnar sems kyi shas che ba yal bar bor ba dang  dus la gzhes pa dang  gzhi de las 'thab    pa dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par 'gyur ba mthong ba dang  dge 'dun bye bar dogs pas yal bar bor ba dang  sems can de dag rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha shes pa dang  khrel yod pa dang ldan pas myur ba nyid du rang nyid phyir 'chos pa zhig yin na ni nyes  pa med do // /
column5: 0.007#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812639#1812643#TD4082E.TXT.r_727;TD4082E.TXT.r_728# dus la sdod na nyes pa med do // / +gzhi de las 'thab pa dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par 'gyur bar mi 'thad na nyes pa med do // /
column6: 0.022#TD4087E.TXT.r#1566678#1566678#TD4087E.TXT.r_1241# 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang 'thab pa dang  mtshang  'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par byed kyi / /
column7: 0.022#TD4087E.TXT.r#1567011#1567011#TD4087E.TXT.r_1283# 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang 'thab pa dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par byed cing / /
column8: 0.024#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2744127#2744127#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6132;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6133# gzhan    dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston na yang tshig kyal pa yin par brjod par bya'o / / +'thab mo dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  rtsod pa dang  'gyed pa la brten te tshig rjod par byed dam / /
column9: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#1317242#1317242#TD4037E.TXT.r_148# bdag dang gzhan dag la gnod pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  phan par mi 'gyur ba gang dag yin  pa'i 'thab mo dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod pa rnams dang  pha rol la rnam par 'che ba'i las gzhan dag la ni ma yin no // /

column3: yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa ni nang gi gdung ba ste / / +zhib tu chos mngon pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa las 'byung ba bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694602#694613#TD4083E.TXT.r_1215# gtam byar mi rung la bka' blo mi bde zhing mnar sems kyi shas che ba yal bar bor ba dang  dus la gzhes pa dang  gzhi de las 'thab    pa dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par 'gyur ba mthong ba dang  dge 'dun bye bar dogs pas yal bar bor ba dang  sems can de dag rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha shes pa dang  khrel yod pa dang ldan pas myur ba nyid du rang nyid phyir 'chos pa zhig yin na ni nyes  pa med do // /

column3: mdo las de ltar dge  slong rnams zhes pa nas bsam gtan byed par gyur to zhes pa'i bar du ni so so nas bde ba thob pa bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694614#694627#TD4083E.TXT.r_1215;TD4083E.TXT.r_1216;TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# gtam byar mi rung la bka' blo mi bde zhing mnar sems kyi shas che ba yal bar bor ba dang  dus la gzhes pa dang  gzhi de las 'thab    pa dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par 'gyur ba mthong ba dang  dge 'dun bye bar dogs pas yal bar bor ba dang  sems can de dag rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha shes pa dang  khrel yod pa dang ldan pas myur ba nyid du rang nyid phyir 'chos pa zhig yin na ni nyes  pa med do // / +rdzu 'phrul zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /

column3: len pa zhes pa ni chags pas te / / +chos rnams la chags pa med pa nyid rnam par grol ba'o // / +mdo las de nas yang mthar gyis zhes pa nas rnam par grol lo zhes pa'i bar du  ni de'i 'og ma rnams kyang de bzhin du rnam par grol ba thob po zhes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694305#694307#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# 'khor rnams kyi don mi byed pa ni chos  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694628#694650#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217;TD4083E.TXT.r_1218;TD4083E.TXT.r_1219# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.014#TD4083E.TXT.r#693203#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693383#693384#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693711#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690826#690826#TD4083E.TXT.r_809# sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang du mi len cing 'dod pa chung ba dang  chog shes pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690874#TD4083E.TXT.r_814# ches rgan pa la gus par mi byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod pa dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column21: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: mdo las de'i 'og tu dge slong pha rnams zhes pa nas grangs bsgrang ba las 'das par gyur pa'o zhes pa'i bar du ni nyan thos pa rnams kyi 'khor bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694646#694662#TD4083E.TXT.r_1218;TD4083E.TXT.r_1219;TD4083E.TXT.r_1220# byang chub sems dpa'  rdzu 'phrul rnam pa mang po'i nus mthu dang ldan la / / +sems can skrag par bya bar rigs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas skrag par mi byed pa dang  sems can 'dun par bya ba'i rigs pa rnams 'dun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344552#1344555#TD4037E.TXT.r_3923;TD4037E.TXT.r_3924;TD4037E.TXT.r_3925;TD4037E.TXT.r_3926# byang chub sems dpa' nad pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan  pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344669#1344669#TD4037E.TXT.r_3939;TD4037E.TXT.r_3940# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi byed na    nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column10: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812067#1812069#TD4082E.TXT.r_646;TD4082E.TXT.r_647;TD4082E.TXT.r_648# byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don la tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa dag  mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang  tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi  byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812205#1812207#TD4082E.TXT.r_667;TD4082E.TXT.r_668;TD4082E.TXT.r_669# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang  longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal  ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#691140#691142#TD4083E.TXT.r_839# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692567#692569#TD4083E.TXT.r_999# byang chub    sems dpa' bdag gi tshig mi btsun par 'gyur ba'i gtam ngan pa bden pa'i dngos po sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693475#693475#TD4083E.TXT.r_1102;TD4083E.TXT.r_1103# byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyid med kyang sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin yod bzhin du phyi rol gyi bstan bcos te mu stegs can gyi bstan bcos  la brtson par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +shin tu yid gzhungs pa dang ldob skyen pa dang  yun ring por yang yid mi brjed pa dang  don sems pa dang rtog par byed nus pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la rigs pas nye bar rtogs pa dang ldan pas blo mi 'gyur ba  dang ldan zhing nyin gcig bzhin du ches lhag par sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la brtson par byed pa yin na nyes pa med do // /
column15: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342151#1342151#TD4037E.TXT.r_3570;TD4037E.TXT.r_3571# sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na / /

column17: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692285#692285#TD4083E.TXT.r_964# byang chub sems dpa' log pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba rnams dang du len cing mi 'dzem la sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column18: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#691208#691208#TD4083E.TXT.r_844# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column19: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692351#692352#TD4083E.TXT.r_972# rnam pa sna tshogs pas smra bar byed 'dod na nyon mongs pa can gyi ltung bar 'gyur ro // /

column24: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693611#693611#TD4083E.TXT.r_1116# sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur pa ma yin no zhes zer zhing spong bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column25: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692617#692617#TD4083E.TXT.r_1006;TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# 'chos par mi byed pa ni nyes par snang bar bya ba'i don to // / +rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694843#694859#TD4083E.TXT.r_1239;TD4083E.TXT.r_1240;TD4083E.TXT.r_1241# de ltar na rang gi 'dul ba'i bslab pa la 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa gsum gyis bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur te / /

bden pa dngos  bstan pa dang  mos pa rnyed pa rnams spro bar byas pa dang  nyams kyis dogs pa rnams gzengs bstod de dga' bar byas pa dang  'bad pa rnams bstod cing byed du gzhug pa zhes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694860#694867#TD4083E.TXT.r_1241;TD4083E.TXT.r_1242# de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dag bral bar mi byed cing / /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694868#694877#TD4083E.TXT.r_1242;TD4083E.TXT.r_1243# lus dang ngag dang yid kyi kun du spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang  nyes par rgyun du mi byed pa dang  sdig pa 'chags pa'o // /
column6: 0.026#TD4010E.TXT.r#2262962#2262962#TD4010E.TXT.r_4182# ces bya ba ni sems kyi rgyud ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas bsgos pa'i phyir lus dang  ngag dang yid kyi kun du spyod pa yongs su dag pa yin no // /

column3: mdo las de nas dge slong rnams zhes pa nas brgya stong mang po la chos ston to zhes pa'i bar du  ni dge sbyong drug cu po de dag la bstod pa dang lung bstan pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1345703#1345708#TD4037E.TXT.r_4081;TD4037E.TXT.r_4082;TD4037E.TXT.r_4083;TD4037E.TXT.r_4084# byang chub sems dpa' chen po don du gnyer ba yin gyi / / +don du mi gnyer ba ma yin / / +dge sbyong gi tshul dang mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba yin gyi / /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694878#694895#TD4083E.TXT.r_1243;TD4083E.TXT.r_1244# bsam pa phun sum  tshogs pa ni gang yang 'di ni chos kyi bsam pas rab tu byung ba yin gyi 'tsho ba'i bsam pas ma yin byang chub chen po don du gnyer ba yin gyi don du gnyer ba ma yin / /

column3: bstod pa yang ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang  dbang po rno ba dang  rig pa dang ldan pa dang  'phags pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang  dka' ba spyod pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'dzin pa dang  sems can rnams    la chos ston pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694896#694910#TD4083E.TXT.r_1244;TD4083E.TXT.r_1245# dge sbyong gi tshul dang mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba yin gyi don du mi gnyer ba ma yin pa dang  de de ltar don du gnyer  bas le los gnas pa ma yin / /
column5: 1.192#TD4037E.TXT.r#1345719#1345722#TD4037E.TXT.r_4085# brtson 'grus mi zhan pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  yang 'byung ba pa dang  rims nad dang bcas pa dang  rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba dang  phyi ma la skye ba dang  rga shir 'gyur ba'i sdig  pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa ste / /
column6: 0.013#TD4045E.TXT.r#397325#397325#TD4045E.TXT.r_322# kun nas  nyon mongs pa dang  yang 'byung ba pa dang  rims nad dang bcas pa dang  rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba dang  phyi ma la skye ba dang rga shir 'gyur ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams dang  ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni de la tshe 'di la kun nas nyon mongs pa phyi ma phyi ma grub pa'i phyir  kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams so // /

column3: mdo las 'di lta ste dge slong rnams zhes pa nas sangs rgyas so zhes pa'i bar du ni sangs rgyas de dag ni nyon mongs pas mi bsgul ba dang  yon tan 'phags pa dang  seng ge bzhin sgra mi 'jigs pa sgrogs pa dang  bdud kyi dpung 'joms pa la btags so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1345746#1345750#TD4037E.TXT.r_4089;TD4037E.TXT.r_4090# byang chub sems dpas sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bsod nams byas shing dge ba byas te / /

column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694923#694932#TD4083E.TXT.r_1246;TD4083E.TXT.r_1247# sngon    gyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bsod nams byas shing dge ba byas te / /

column3: mdo  las lho phyogs na zhes pa nas / / +sangs rgyas so zhes pa'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag nyon mongs pa 'joms pa dang  yon tan gyi mtshan nyid la gnas pa dang  bdag dang gzhan gyi don mdzad pa las btags pa las zhes par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1345751#1345758#TD4037E.TXT.r_4089;TD4037E.TXT.r_4090# byang chub sems dpas sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bsod nams byas shing dge ba byas te / / +des da ltar bdag nyid kyang  gos dang  zas dang  mal cha dang  stan dang  na ba'i gsos sman dang  yo byad rnams kyis phongs par mi 'gyur la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694933#694946#TD4083E.TXT.r_1246;TD4083E.TXT.r_1247;TD4083E.TXT.r_1248;TD4083E.TXT.r_1249# sngon    gyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bsod nams byas shing dge ba byas te / / +des da ltar bdag nyid gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnams kyis phongs par mi 'gyur la / /

column3: mi mjed ces pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams de  sdug bsngal sna tshogs spyod pa la ji mi snyam pa'i phyir mi mjed pa dang  sh'akya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694956#694967#TD4083E.TXT.r_1249;TD4083E.TXT.r_1250;TD4083E.TXT.r_1251;TD4083E.TXT.r_1252# phun sum tshogs pa gsum po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ro // / +rdzogs sangs rgyas sras mchog rnams kyi sdom pa nyi shu pa // /

column3: mdo las dge slong rnams zhes pa nas ye shes de la mos par dka'o zhes pa'i bar du ni mdo sde 'di la 'jug par dka' ba'i phyir sngar drang pa'i don bstan / /

column3: phyis nges pa'i don  bstan cing mos pa skyes pa'o // / +mdo las de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa nas dge slong rnams nga byang chub sems dpar gyur to zhes pa'i bar du ni bsdus pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694994#695003#TD4083E.TXT.r_1255;TD4083E.TXT.r_1256# rnam 'phrul nyon mongs sna tshogs las brgal byang chub mchog bzung nas // /

column3: mdo las nga mya ngan las 'das nas zhes pa nas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar du ni 'phags pa nyan thos pa rnams  mthar bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bzhugs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#695004#695023#TD4083E.TXT.r_1256;TD4083E.TXT.r_1257;TD4083E.TXT.r_1258;TD4083E.TXT.r_1259# gcad par dka' ba gnyis  su kun spyod gnyis 'dzin gcad mkhas shing // /

column3: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bla na med pa'i gnas su bsgyur ba bzhugs na ni de ltar yang rung na sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i khams su nyan thos la sogs pa'i rigs su sems bskyed pa rnams byang  chub sems dpa' spyod pa rgya chen po ma thos pa'i rnams thal byung nyan thos pa'i rigs su ltung zhing lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par mi 'jug gam zhes pa'i dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir 'di smras pa ste / /

column9: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#541981#541982#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12039# 'di ltar yon tan 'byung gnas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du  rab tu shes pa'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa'i chos dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos dang  rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes la zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa snga ma'i rnal 'byor bsgom  pa'i sgo bzlas nas / /

column13: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#541474#541474#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11973# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na mtshan nyid med pa'i chos khong du chud pa'i    phyir gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rab tu spong bar gsungs pa yin te / /
