column15: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#823565#823565#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9506# slob pa dang mi slob pa'i bye brag dang  gang zag gi bye brag dang  gnyen po'i bye brag gis  'phags pa'i chos rnams mang ba'i phyir dang  'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi ma rnyed pa'o zhes khyad par med par brjod pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i chos gang dag gi zhes dris dang  de'i phyir / /
column16: 0.024#TD4069E.TXT.r#650449#650451#TD4069E.TXT.r_3910;TD4069E.TXT.r_3911# chos ni bstan pa'i chos so // / +'di la bstan pa'i chos de yod pas de dang ldan pa'i phyir / /
column17: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#953514#953515#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8123;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8124# de ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams sgyu ma lta bur bstan nas  gnyen po'i chos rnams kyang sgyu ma lta bur bstan pa'i phyir / /
column18: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#979042#979042#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11376# ye shes gang gis so so'i spang bar bya ba'i chos ni 'di yin bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ni    'di yin / /
column19: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#577800#577800#TD4068E.TXT.r_925;TD4068E.TXT.r_926# bden pa bzhi po de dag gi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid ma 'dres kyang 'dres pa 'dra bar  gnas pa la 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'di ni spyi'i mtshan nyid do zhes phyin ci ma log par shes par 'gyur ba'am / / +yang dag pa'i chos la yang yang dag ba nyid do zhes shes / /
column20: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#190078#190078#TD4035E.TXT.r_11244# chos spyod pa kho nas skom par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column21: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#541610#541610#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11986# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na 'di ltar kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i chos su rtogs pa'i phyir yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid mtshan nyid med pa'i chos khong du chud cing de la 'jug par 'gyur     // /
column22: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1370594#1370594#TD4037E.TXT.r_7270;TD4037E.TXT.r_7271# gnas pa bdun pa 'di la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bskyed pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +gnas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pas bsdus pa  dang ; /
column23: 0.028#TD4066E.TXT.r#2108083#2108083#TD4066E.TXT.r_849# rgyu dang bcas pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba'i bdag nyid dang  thob par byed pa dang  gsal bar byed pa'i phyir dang ba'i mtshan nyid ni chos la dad pa'o // /
column24: 0.028#TD4061E.TXT.r#1530708#1530708#TD4061E.TXT.r_2474;TD4061E.TXT.r_2475# chom rkun dang  mthu stobs dang  brid pa la sogs pas pha rol gyi nor don du gnyer ba gang yin pa'o // / +log pas byas pa'i chos ni log pa'i chos te / /
column25: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981540#981540#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11677# chos rnams kun rdzob tu yod par zad kyi don dam par ni thams cad nas thams cad du med do zhes  lta ba dang  chad par gyur pas skur ba btab pa'i phyir skrag par 'gyur pa'i gnas so zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column26: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1595166#1595166#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_47;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_48# nges pa'i tshig tu  rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos te / / +de lta bas na 'di ni don dam pa'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa 'am / /

column3: phyis ni nges pa'i don gyi dpe ston te / / +de drang ba'i don la yang dpe rnam pa bzhi ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1595176#1595182#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_49;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_50;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_51# chos kyi mtshan nyid la mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir chos mngon pa'o // / +chos mngon pa bshad zin to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#695361#695370#TD4091E.TXT.r_47;TD4091E.TXT.r_48;TD4091E.TXT.r_49# de bas na 'di ni don dam pa'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa'am chos kyi mtshan nyid la mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir chos mngon pa'o // /

column3: mya ngan dgon  pa las bsgral ba'i dpe dang  'khor rnams sems nur ba'i dpe dang  tshong dpon thabs mang po ston pa'i dpe dang  gling du lta ba ston pa'i dpe dang  'di ni dang po'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#695369#695378#TD4091E.TXT.r_48;TD4091E.TXT.r_49;TD4091E.TXT.r_50;TD4091E.TXT.r_51# chos mngon pa ni bshad zin to // / +bstan bcos 'di ni ji ltar na  chos mngon pa'i mdzod yin zhe na / /

column7: 0.020#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1595191#1595191#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_52;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_53# 'dir de don du yang dag chud phyir ram / / +'di yi gnas de yin pas chos mngon mdzod ces bya ba smos te / /

column3: dpag tshad lnga brgya zhes pa ni 'gro ba rnam lngar 'khor ba'o // / +rin po che'i gling zhes pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i gling ngo // /

column5: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#695390#695402#TD4091E.TXT.r_52;TD4091E.TXT.r_53# bstan bcos chos mngon pa zhes bya ba de'i don gtso bo ji lta ba rnams 'dir chud pas de ltar na bstan bcos 'di ni de'i mdzod lta bu yin no // /

column3: mdo las de dag las mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan ma gcig po zhes pa nas de dag sgrol lo zhes pa'i bar du / /

column3: mtshan ma zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das te / / +de'i yon tan yang lnga'o // / +gsal ba zhes pa ni dbang po rno ba'o // /

column3: mkhas pa zhes pa ni dge ngan 'byed pa'o // / +rig  pa zhes pa ni don dam pa dang kun rdzob rig pa'o // /

column3: theg pa chen po'i  sgrub pa bskal pa drug cu'i bar du dka' ba spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' spyod pas dub pa dang  'phags pa'i spyod pas skrag cing 'bras bu chung du la gzhol bar sems pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1595279#1595281#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_67;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_68# gang gi phyir chos rnams rab tu rnam par 'byed pa med par nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i thabs med la // / +nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kyang 'jig rten 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po 'dir  'khyam par byed pa de'i phyir chos rnams rab tu rnam par 'byed par 'dod pa de'i don du ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos mngon pa gsungs so lo // /

column3: bstan pa'i dpe ste / / +de la yang sems su gzhug pa dang  grong khyer bstan pa dang  der 'jog pa dang  grong khyer de'i yon tan bstan pa dang bzhi ste / /

column3: 'di ni dang po'i gnyis pa dang sbyar ro // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa las kyang ji ltar lha'i rnga ched du bsams pa  med pa 'bad pa med par sgra 'byung ba bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rjes sems can rnams la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum gzigs pa yang lhun gyis grub pa'i dbang gis dgongs zhes pa'i don to // /

column6: 0.017#TD4067E.TXT.r#1095838#1095838#TD4067E.TXT.r_1602;TD4067E.TXT.r_1603# de ni gzugs kyi go 'byed pa tsam du blta bar bya'o // / +so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa gang zhe na / /
column7: 0.023#TD4059E.TXT.r#414358#414359#TD4059E.TXT.r_300;TD4059E.TXT.r_301# 'dus ma byas gang zhe na / / +nam mkha' dang  so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa dang  so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang  de bzhin nyid do // /
column8: 0.023#TD4067E.TXT.r#1095805#1095806#TD4067E.TXT.r_1595;TD4067E.TXT.r_1596# 'dus ma byas gang zhe na / / +nam mkha' dang  so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa dang  so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang  de bzhin nyid do zhes bya ba ste / /
column9: 0.024#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1403597#1403598#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_443# gnyis gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni so sor brtags pas 'gog pa dang so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa dang 'dri ba ste nam mkha' ni 'jig rten na grags pa'i phyir ma yin no // /
column10: 0.029#TD4059E.TXT.r#414373#414373#TD4059E.TXT.r_304# so sor  brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa gang zhe na / /

column3: mdo las de nas dge slong rnams zhes pa nas bsil bar 'du shes so zhes pa'i bar du ni dub pa rnams bsti ba'i dpe bstan pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#695572#695585#TD4091E.TXT.r_87;TD4091E.TXT.r_88;TD4091E.TXT.r_89# de ltar na nam mkha' la sogs pa 'dus ma byas gsum po de dag  dang  lam gyi bden ba ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams te / /
column5: 0.026#TD4095E.TXT.r#63490#63490#TD4095E.TXT.r_83;TD4095E.TXT.r_84# de ltar na nam mkha' la sogs pa 'dus ma byas gsum po de dag dang  lam gyi bden pa ni thag pa med pa'i chos rnams te / / +de dag la zag pa rgyas par 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de la  yang rnam pa gnyis so // / +sngar slob pa rnams sems bsdu zhing brtson pa bskyed pa dang  phyis mi slob pa rnams rnam par grol ba'i lam la gzud cing lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba'i 'chi 'pho las ma bral ba'i phyir grong khyer du zhugs pa'i bsam pa  bskyed pa dang  mi slob pa'i sa thob pa 'gog pa dang  lam gyi mthar phyin pa dag kyang rgal ba dang bsil ba'i 'du shes bskyed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#695586#695594#TD4091E.TXT.r_88;TD4091E.TXT.r_89;TD4091E.TXT.r_90;TD4091E.TXT.r_91# de dag la zag pa kun du rgyas par 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro // / +de ltar 'dus ma byas rnam pa gsum bstan pa gang yin pa / /
column5: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#695595#695607#TD4091E.TXT.r_90;TD4091E.TXT.r_91;TD4091E.TXT.r_92;TD4091E.TXT.r_93# de la nam mkha' mi sgrib ba // / +nam mkha' ni sgrib ba med pa'i rang bzhin te gang du gzugs 'gror rung ba'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#695607#695621#TD4091E.TXT.r_92;TD4091E.TXT.r_93;TD4091E.TXT.r_94;TD4091E.TXT.r_95# so sor  brtags pa'i 'gog pa gang bral la // / +gang ZAG PA DANG BCAS PA'I chos rnams dang bral ba de ni so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa ste / /
column7: 0.011#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1595456#1595459#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_101;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_102# de dag la zag pa rgyas par 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro / / +'dus ma byas rnam pa gsum po bstan pa gang yin pa de la nam mkha' mi sgrib pa / /
column8: 0.011#TD4095E.TXT.r#63495#63498#TD4095E.TXT.r_84;TD4095E.TXT.r_85;TD4095E.TXT.r_86;TD4095E.TXT.r_87# de dag la zag pa rgyas par 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro // / +'dus ma byas pa bstan pa / / +rnam pa gsum po gang yin pa // /
column9: 0.023#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1595471#1595473#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_103;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_104;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_105# nam mkha' ni sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin te gang na gzugs kyi go yod pa'o // / +so sor brtags PAS 'GOG PA DANG BRAL ba'o // / +gang ZAG PA DANG BCAS PA'I chos rnams dang bral ba  de ni so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'o // /

column3: mdo las mtshan mas ngal sos par shes nas zhes pa nas khyed 'dod ngo zhes pa'i bar du ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#695620#695630#TD4091E.TXT.r_94;TD4091E.TXT.r_95;TD4091E.TXT.r_96# sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yang dang yang du brtags pa ni so sor brtags pa ste shes rab kyi khyad par ro // / +des thob par bya ba'i  'gog pa ni so sor brtags pa'i 'gos pa'o // /
column5: 0.014#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1595485#1595485#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_106;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_107# sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la so sor rtog pa ni so sor brtags pa ste shes rab kyi bye brag go // / +des thob par bya ba'i 'gog pa ni so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'o // /
column6: 0.023#TD4095E.TXT.r#63532#63532#TD4095E.TXT.r_95;TD4095E.TXT.r_96# des thob par bya ba'i 'gog pa ni so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'o // / +de yang 'di zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi so so sor te / /

column3: dpe rnam pa gnyis la 'di ni nges pa'i don bstan  te ; / +sngar ni sprul pa bstan / /
column4: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#695631#695638#TD4091E.TXT.r_96;TD4091E.TXT.r_98;TD4091E.TXT.r_99;TD4091E.TXT.r_100# ci zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams thams cad la so sor brtags pas 'gog pa gcig kho na 'am zhen smras pa / /

column3: phyis ni yang dag pa bstan te / / +sprul pa'i grong khyer zhes pa ni theg pa rnam pa gnyis kyi gnas te bsti ba'i gnas de bsti ba'i gnas dang 'dra bar bstan pa yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#695639#695653#TD4091E.TXT.r_98;TD4091E.TXT.r_99;TD4091E.TXT.r_100;TD4091E.TXT.r_101;TD4091E.TXT.r_102;TD4091E.TXT.r_103;TD4091E.TXT.r_104# 'o na ci zhig yin / / +so so re re yin / / +kun du sbyor ba'i rdzas rnams ji snyed pa bral ba'i rdzas rnams kyang de snyed do // /
column5: 0.020#TD4095E.TXT.r#63541#63542#TD4095E.TXT.r_96;TD4095E.TXT.r_97;TD4095E.TXT.r_98# de yang 'di zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi so so sor te / / +ldan pa'i rdzas rnams ji snyed pa // / +bral ba'i rdzas kyang de snyed do // /

column3: theg pa chen po rin po che'i 'byung gnas de nas nye zhes par dpe smras pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1595579#1595583#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_125# chos ma 'ongs pa rnams skye ba la gtan du bgegs su gyur pa bral ba las gzhan pa'i 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni  so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa ste / /

column3: mdo las    de bzhin du dge slong rnams zhes pa nas spang bar bya'o zhes pa'i bar du ni don phyi ma deng sbyar ba ste / /

column3: sngar ni drang ba dang sbyar phyis ni nges pa dang sbyar te / / +'khor ba dang sdug bsngal las rgal ba dang spangs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#695676#695692#TD4091E.TXT.r_106;TD4091E.TXT.r_107# dper na gzugs gcig la skyes bu'i mig lhag par zhen pa na gang dag gzugs gzhan rnams dang  sgra dang  dri dang  ro dang  reg bya rnams 'das pas de la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga rnams la yang skye bar mi nus te / /
column5: 0.008#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1595611#1595615#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_129;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_130;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_131# dper na mig dang yid gzugs gcig la yengs pa'i gzugs gzhan pa rnams dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya gang yin  pa dag ni 'das par 'gyur la / / +de dag la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag ni yang skye bar yang mi nus te / /
column6: 0.015#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1404461#1404464#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_542;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_543# 'das pa'i dus su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +de dag la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po  dag ni yang skye bar mi nus te zhes bya ba ni gang dag la dmigs pa'i bye brag sngon po'i bye brag la sogs pa bshad ma thag pa de dag yod pa ni de dag la ni dmigs pa ste gang dag ce na / /
column7: 0.025#TD4036E.TXT.r#8982#8982#TD4036E.TXT.r_1245# bzhi gang kho na las sems kyi rjes su sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam  par rtog pa zag par 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang  sgra dang  dri dang  ro dang  reg bya de dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing / /

column9: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3098659#3098659#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1037;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1038# gzugs 'di ni gzugs 'dzin pa'o // / +gzugs 'di ni sgra dang  dri dang  ro dang  reg bya dang  chos 'dzin pa'o zhes bya bar yongs su rtog pa gang yin pa dang   tshor ba dang  'du shes dang  'du byed 'di dag dang  rnam par shes pa 'di ni gzugs 'dzin pa'o // /

column3: mdo las de nas sems can 'di dag ces pa nas mi rung gi zhes pa'i bar du ni  'dis ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dka' ba la sems zhum pa bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1595610#1595615#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_129;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_130;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_131# dper na mig dang yid gzugs gcig la yengs pa'i gzugs gzhan pa rnams dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya gang yin  pa dag ni 'das par 'gyur la / / +de dag la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag ni yang skye bar yang mi nus te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1595616#1595626#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_130;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_131;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_132# de dag la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag ni yang skye bar yang mi nus te / / +de dag 'das pa'i yul la dmigs pa'i mthu med pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#695693#695701#TD4091E.TXT.r_107;TD4091E.TXT.r_108# de dag 'das pa'i yul la dmigs pa'i mthu  med do // /

column8: 0.026#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1404507#1404508#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_546;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_547# de dag 'das pa'i yul la dmigs pa'i mthu med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po de dag rang gi dmigs pa yin yang 'das pa'i yul la 'dzin par mi nus te / / +rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag ni da ltar gyi la dmigs pa'i tshogs  so // /

column3: mdo las de bzhin gshegs pas zhes pa nas sa gnyis bstan to zhes pa'i bar du ni dpe dang don du sbyar ba ste / /

column3: sa gnyis zhes pa ni dbang po gnyis kyis bslab par bya ba dang  ye shes gnyis pas  chud par bya ba'i sa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#695711#695719#TD4091E.TXT.r_110;TD4091E.TXT.r_111;TD4091E.TXT.r_112# lam ma gtogs pa'i 'dus byas rnams zag bcas zhes gang smras ba la / /

column3: mdo las dge slong rnams gang gi dus na zhes pa nas thabs mkhas pa'o zhes pa'i bar du ni dpe 'og mas nges pa'i don dang sbyar ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#29553#29557#TD4036E.TXT.r_4524;TD4036E.TXT.r_4525;TD4036E.TXT.r_4526# smras pa phung po lnga ste / / +gzugs kyi phung po dang  tshor ba'i phung po dang  'du shes kyi phung po dang  'du byed kyi phung po dang  rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o // /

column6: 0.0#TD4059E.TXT.r#413027#413030#TD4059E.TXT.r_5;TD4059E.TXT.r_6# 'jam dpal  gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo // / +phung po lnga ni gzugs kyi phung po dang  tshor ba'i phung po dang  'du shes kyi phung po dang  'du byed kyi phung po dang  rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#695720#695733#TD4091E.TXT.r_111;TD4091E.TXT.r_112;TD4091E.TXT.r_113;TD4091E.TXT.r_114;TD4091E.TXT.r_115# 'dus byas de dag gang zhe na // / +'dus byas pa'i chos de yang // /

column10: 0.014#TD4018E.TXT.r#3036820#3036822#TD4018E.TXT.r_4257;TD4018E.TXT.r_4258# de la sdug bsngal ni  'khor ba'i phung po rnams te / / +gzugs kyi phung po dang  tshor ba'i phung po dang  'du shes kyi phung po dang  'du byed kyi phung po dang  rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o // /
column11: 0.017#TD4067E.TXT.r#1087250#1087250#TD4067E.TXT.r_46# de la phung po lnga ni gzugs kyi phung po dang  tshor ba'i phung po dang  'du shes  kyi phung po dang  'du byed kyi phung po dang  rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o // /
column12: 0.027#TD4068E.TXT.r#605908#605908#TD4068E.TXT.r_4053# phung po'i skabs su tshor ba'i phung po dang  'du shes kyi phung po dang  'du byed kyi phung po gsum phung po re rer  bshad pa'i phung po de dang  gzugs kyi phung po'i phyogs gcig rnam par rig byed ma yin pas bsnan te de dang bzhi'i steng du nam mkha' la sogs pa'i 'dus ma byas bzhi dang brgyad la skye mched kyi skabs su ni chos kyi skye mched ces bya la / /
column13: 0.027#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1750195#1750195#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6583;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6584# gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi ste / / +tshor ba'i phung po dang  'du shes kyi phung po dang  'du byed kyi phung po dang  rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o // /

column3: bya ba ma byas zhes pa ni skye ba'i lhag ma lus pa'o // / +gang skye ba'i lhag ma lus pa ni tshangs par spyod pa ma spyad pas mthar  ma phyin pa dang sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1595716#1595721#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_151;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_152# gzugs kyi phung po dang  tshor ba'i phung po dang  'du shes kyi phung po dang  'du byed kyi phung po dang  rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya ba de  dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams so // / +rkyen rnams 'dus shing phrad nas byas pa dag na 'dus byas rnams te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#695734#695748#TD4091E.TXT.r_114;TD4091E.TXT.r_115;TD4091E.TXT.r_116;TD4091E.TXT.r_117# gzugs kyi phung po dang  tshor ba'i phung po dang  'du shes kyi phung po dang  'du byed kyi phung po dang  rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o // / +de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams te rkyen rnams kyis 'dus shing phrad nas byas pa ni 'dus byas rnams so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#63624#63629#TD4095E.TXT.r_112;TD4095E.TXT.r_113# gzugs kyi phung po dang  tshor ba'i phung po dang  'du shes kyi phung po dang  'du byed kyi phung po dang  rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya ba de dag ni 'dus byas  kyi chos rnams so // / +rkyen rnams 'dus shing phrad nas byas pa dag gi phyir 'dus byas rnams so // /

column3: ltos shig rtogs shig pa ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung gi ye shes la 'jug pa'o // /

column3: dbang po'i rim pa bzhin du lung ston pas dbang po rnon  po rnams lung bstan pa'i 'og tu lung ston pa 'di 'byung ba dang  lhag pa'i nga rgyal can bsam gtan spyod pa med pa dag sems gyeng ba bsdus pa'i don theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yod par mi shes pa'i dper lus la rin po che thogs pa'i dpe bstan te / /

column3: ting nge 'dzin dang theg pa chen po  la gzhug pa'i phyir le'u 'di ston pa dang  bla na med pa bcu las shes par bya ba bla na med pa bstan pa'i phyir theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yod pa bstan pa'i phyir le'u 'di bstan pa dang  lung ston pa rnam pa drug la mnyam pa las dgongs te lung ston pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir le'u 'di  bshad pa'o // /

column7: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1408626#1408629#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_977;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_978# mdor na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni slob dpon gyis slob ma bde blag tu khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir tshig mdor bsdus pas rnam par rig  byed ma yin pa'i gzugs de ston par byed pa yin no // / +rnam par rig byed dang ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i gzugs dge ba dang mi dge ba ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba 'di ni ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o // /

column12: 0.021#TD4069E.TXT.r#660999#660999#TD4069E.TXT.r_5399# de bzhin du zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni de bzhin du skye mched bcu gnyis po mig gi skye mched dang  gzugs kyi skye mched dang  yid kyi skye mched dang  chos kyi skye mched ces bya ba'i  bar 'di rnams las bcu char dang  bcu gcig pa chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs kyang gzugs yin bzhin du mig gi skye mched dang  gzugs kyi skye mched ces gcig pu zhig gzugs kyi skye mched du gsungs pa yang mtshan nyid 'dra ba la dgongs  pa med par bye brag tu bshad pa ni rigs pa ma yin no // /

column9: 0.028#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1704351#1704352#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_876# gzugs dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang  mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba dang     sdug bsngal ba dang  bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de dag kyang mngon par shes shing yongs su shes so // /

column9: 0.028#TD4068E.TXT.r#571582#571582#TD4068E.TXT.r_88# gzugs kyi phung po ni thogs pa dang bcas pa dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i rten du gyur pa dang  mig nas  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa drug gi dmigs par gyur pa'i phyir thams cad pas rags shing sbom pas na dang por gzugs kyi phung po bshad do // /

column10: 2.384#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#493043#493045#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5783# sems can zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga dang  skye mched  bcu gnyis dang  khams bco brgyad dang  khams drug dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la sogs pa chos mang po bskyed pa'i phyir sems can zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column11: 2.384#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2366729#2366731#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6590# de la  thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po lnga dang  skye mched bcu gnyis dang  khams bco brgyad de / /
column12: 2.384#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2375057#2375059#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7661;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7662# chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste / / +phung po lnga dang  skye mched bcu gnyis dang  khams bco brgyad de  gzugs can dang  gzugs can ma yin pa dang  bstan du yod pa dang  bstan du med pa dang  thogs pa dang bcas pa dang  thogs pa med pa dang  zag pa dang bcas pa dang  zag pa med pa dang  'dus byas dang  'dus ma byas gang yin pa'o // /
column13: 2.384#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2375354#2375356#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7703;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7704# stong pa nyid rnam pa bdun yod par bstan te / / +phung po lnga dang  skye mched bcu gnyis dang  khams bco brgyad dang  bden pa bzhi dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis dang  'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la sogs pa'i chos  thams cad rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid do zhes ming bkod par zad kyi rnam par bshad pa ni med do // /
column14: 2.384#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2375789#2375791#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7756;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7757# chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / / +phung po lnga dang  khams bco brgyad dang  skye mched bcu gnyis te / /
column15: 2.384#TD4067E.TXT.r#1096446#1096448#TD4067E.TXT.r_1692# de ltar phung po lnga po  dag skye mched bcu gnyis dang  khams bco brgyad du bstan pa yin no // /

column17: 0.017#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#780503#780504#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_2259# de dag kyang khams rnam par gzhag par mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar ro zhes bstan pa nyid de / /
column18: 0.018#TD4019E.TXT.r#2411613#2411613#TD4019E.TXT.r_540# rnam pa gcig tu na yang dag par rdzogs pa ni phung po lnga dang skye mched bcu    gnyis dang khams bcva brgyad ces pa ste / /

column20: 0.018#TD4079E.TXT.r#757096#757096#TD4079E.TXT.r_71# de dag ni khams bcva brgyad dang  skye mched bcu gnyis dang  phung po lnga zhes bya ste ji snyed yod par gyur pa'i thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab bo // /
column21: 0.018#TD4079E.TXT.r#757288#757288#TD4079E.TXT.r_99# phung po lnga dang  skye mched bcu gnyis dang  khams bcva brgyad po 'di dag nyid kho na tsam ste / /
column22: 0.019#TD4068E.TXT.r#605703#605703#TD4068E.TXT.r_4034# gong du phung po lngar bshad pa'i chos de nyid skye mched bcu gnyis su bshad pa dang  skye mched bcu gnyis su bshad pa'i chos de nyid khams bco brgyad du bshad pa'i don bsdus pa'i phyir / /
column23: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516897#516897#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8705# khams bco brgyad po mig gi  khams dang  gzugs kyi khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du gang yin pa de ni khams sna tshogs yin no zhes gsungs so // /
column24: 0.022#TD4068E.TXT.r#609106#609106#TD4068E.TXT.r_4377# mig gi khams nas yid kyi khams kyi bar du dbang po drug gi khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du rnam par shes pa drug gi khams bcu gnyis la nang gi zhes bya'o // /

column27: 0.027#TD4067E.TXT.r#1096401#1096403#TD4067E.TXT.r_1687# sems kyi khams bdun ni  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  yid kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so // /
column28: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#608036#608036#TD4068E.TXT.r_4269# dbang po drug gi khams dang  gzugs dang  sgra dang  reg dang  chos te yul bzhi'i khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams te bcu bzhi ni gzugs kyi khams dang yang  ldan te / /

column3: 'khor dga' zhing phan pa bskyed pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos sgrogs pa la mkhas pa dang  tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la phan btags pa dang  spobs pa khyad par can du gyur pa'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520392#520393#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9191# yang de nyid las gzhan pa'i phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa  nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyis so so la de bzhin nyid dang  don dam pa dang  chos bdag med pa nyid yongs su tshol bar    mi byed kyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa kun du khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2340042#2340044#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3412# mdo sde dang bstan bcos las ni mtshan nyid dang  dbang po'i dbang du mdzad nas tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs su bshad pas kha cig las ni ltos pa la sogs pa'i rigs pa bzhi  nas de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang  skye mched dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  bden pa la sogs pa'i bar la rnal 'byor zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / /
column6: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109016#3109018#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2436;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2437# rab 'byor gzhan yang dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa ni phung po gcig gi de bzhin nyid don dam  pa chos bdag med pa rab tu rtogs nas / / +yang de las gzhan pa'i phung po rnams dang  khams rnams dang  skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang  zas rnams dang  bden pa rnams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag pa'i  spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so so dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa so so la de bzhin nyid don dam pa chos bdag med pa yongs su tshol bar mi byed kyi / /
column7: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109072#3109073#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2441# rab 'byor gzhan yang ji ltar phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi    rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag phan tshun mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang  ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa phan tshun mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin pa de bzhin du / /
column8: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1598984#1598988#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_757# phung po dang  skye mched dang  khams dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  bden pa dang  zas dang  bsam gtan dang  tshad med pa dang  gzugs med pa dang  rnam  par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched dang  byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa dang  mngon par shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa la sogs pa'i gtam rgyud re re ni chos kyi  phung po'o zhes zer ro // /
column9: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#697571#697579#TD4091E.TXT.r_469;TD4091E.TXT.r_471;TD4091E.TXT.r_470;TD4091E.TXT.r_472# de ni stong phrag drug go // / +phung sogs bshad pa re re'o // /
column10: 0.016#TD4010E.TXT.r#2282753#2282755#TD4010E.TXT.r_6705# de yang dran pa dang  blo gros dang rtogs pa dang  bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa'i  phyir sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i tshig gis phung po dang  khams dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ston pa la mkhas pas chos gos dang  lhung bzed dang  na ba'i gsos sman dang  yo byad rnams mang du rnyed pa dang ldan pas grags pa dang ldan pa'i 'od kyis  phyogs thams cad du khyab pa'i 'od 'di la yod pas dge slong de'i ming snyan pa'i 'od ces bya'o // /
column11: 0.020#TD4050E.TXT.r#1097877#1097877#TD4050E.TXT.r_96# chos ni phung po dang  skye mched dang  khams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bsam gtan  dang ; /
column12: 0.021#TD4098E.TXT.r#1395803#1395804#TD4098E.TXT.r_940# phung po dang skye mched dang  khams dang  bden pa dang   dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sogs pa'i zhes bya bar dgongs so // /
column13: 0.022#TD4061E.TXT.r#1543334#1543334#TD4061E.TXT.r_4166# thog ma med pa can gyi 'khor ba nas  bstan bcos gzhan thams cad las ma thos pa phung po dang  skye mched dang  khams dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  'phags pa'i bden pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs  dang ; /
column14: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521326#521326#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9331# rab 'byor ji ltar phung po de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa dang  ji ltar skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de bzhin du zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni  gsum pa skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ston to // /
column15: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#769421#769421#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_428;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_429;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_430# phung po bstan pa'am / / +khams dang skye mched dam / / +rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bstan pas so /// /
column16: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#898220#898220#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1140# sangs rgyas zhes bya ba phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba dang  bden pa la sogs pa'i chos yod par thugs su chud pas sangs rgyas zhes bya ste / /
column17: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#944316#944316#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6977;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6978# don gang la zhes bya ba ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched de / / +rten cing 'brel te  'byung ba dang  bden pa dang sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi don gang la zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.028#TD4029E.TXT.r#2133503#2133503#TD4029E.TXT.r_1737;TD4029E.TXT.r_1738# zhes bya ba ni gang zhig don gang la the tshom za ba de bstsal ba'i phyir te / / +phung  po dang khams dang skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  bden pa dang  sa dang  pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid dag la the tshom za ba rnams la the tshom spang ba'i phyir de dang 'tsham par bshad pa smos pa'i tshul du mdo sde bshad pa de'i phyir the tshom gyi gnyen  por mdo sde bshad do // /
column19: 0.029#TD4018E.TXT.r#3080053#3080053#TD4018E.TXT.r_9913# spyir sgro btags nas mos pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams la phung po dang  khams  dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sogs pa bstan pa brjed pas gzud do // /

column3: de yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye'o // / +le'u 'di ci las btags pa'i gtan tshigs dang   le'u 'di'i ming bshad pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#697580#697592#TD4091E.TXT.r_472# phung po dang  khams dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  bden pa dang  zas dang  bsam gtan  dang  tshad med pa dang  gzugs med pa dang  rnam par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched dang  byang chub kyi phyogs dang  mngon par shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa rnams kyi bshad pa  re re ni chos kyi phung po'o zhes zer ro // /

column4: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#697655#697663#TD4091E.TXT.r_482# phung pho dang  khams dang  skye mched gzhan gsungs pa de dag kyang bstan bcos 'dir ji skad bshad pa bzhin de dag gi rang gi mtshan nyid legs par spyad nas phung po la sogs pa la ji skad du bshad pa 'di dag nyid du bsdu bar bya ste / /

column3: mdo las 'di nyid sems shing rnam par sems zhes pa nas 'jig rten du byung ste zhes pa'i bar du ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos su lung bstan pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392637#2392639#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9693# bstan bcos rnal 'byor  spyod pa'i sa las kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni gzugs med pa'i khams nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na ni rgyu mtshan med pa'i dmigs pa rnam par rig pas tshad med pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392665#2392667#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9695# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched de mtha' med pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2128149#2128150#TD4029E.TXT.r_1052# zad par gyi skye mched ni zad par sa dang  chu dang  me dang  rlung dang  sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag go // /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920058#920061#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3765;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3766# bzang po'i rnam par thar pa lus kyi mngon sum du byas nas gnas te rnam par thar ba gsum pa'o // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang   rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang  cung zad med min skye mched dang  'gog ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang brgyad de / /
column8: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920172#920173#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3785# thams cad skye mched bcu ni sa dang  chu dang  me dang  rlung ste 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang  sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar  po ste kha dog bzhi dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched gnyis kyis bsnan te bcu'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2901490#2901492#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4719# gzugs med pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang rnam  shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang gsum gyi sems can gyi rnam par shes pa ni 'du shes kyi phung po la rten to // /
column10: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#17561#17563#TD4036E.TXT.r_2548# bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched  dang ; /
column11: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#24155#24157#TD4036E.TXT.r_3649# gang zag lus kyis mngon du byed pa rnam par thar pa brgyad po gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba dang  nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs    rnams la lta ba dang  sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  'du  shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa dag lus kyi mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing / /
column12: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#24787#24789#TD4036E.TXT.r_3774# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched  dang ; /
column13: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2702190#2702191#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_126# gzugs med pa'i khams na nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na ni rgyu tshad med pa'i dmigs pa can no // /
column14: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2760271#2760273#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8433;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8434# de ma thob pas bsam gtan dang po dang ldan pa'i sems ni mi skye ba de lta bu dang  'di ltar 'di na la las bsam gtan dang po dang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes     // /

column17: 0.024#TD4091E.TXT.r#753313#753314#TD4091E.TXT.r_10559;TD4091E.TXT.r_10560# 'du shes dman pa'i phyir 'du shes med / / +'du shes med min skye mched ces bya ba ste / /
column18: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2076116#2076117#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14191# rgyu ba mi gsal ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched yin te 'du shes med pa lta bur de gnas so // /
column19: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2076138#2076138#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14193;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14194# 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  'du shes med pa dang  'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la ji lta ba bzhin du 'du shes med pa yang ma yin te / / +de nyid kyi phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ces bya'o // /
column20: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#786586#786587#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3293# 'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column21: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#826276#826277#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9932;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9933# shing ljon pa dang 'dra bar srid pa'i mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir / / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni srid pa'i rtse mo zhes bya'o // /
column22: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2351435#2351436#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4690;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4691# 'du shes med pa'i mtshan ma yang med pa'i phyir / / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched  ces bya'o // /
column23: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2351471#2351472#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4694;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4695# sa 'di'i 'du shes mi gsal zhing rtul  ba dang  zhen cing gsal ba med pa dang nges pa med pa'i phyir / / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ces bya'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column24: 0.025#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2707941#2707942#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_778;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_779# kha cig  gi tshe ni nyin zhag gnyis dang  gsum dang bcu'i bar du snang ba'i phyir ro // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po brgyad khri thub pas yun ring po yin no // /
column25: 0.025#TD4039E.TXT.r#1868660#1868660#TD4039E.TXT.r_6232# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni 'du shes cha phra ba'i phyir srid pa'i nang na zhi ba 'di dag ni mchog yin no snyam pas mos pa ni  mtshan ma med pa yid la byed pas snyoms par 'jug ste / /
column26: 0.025#TD4049E.TXT.r#2308414#2308414#TD4049E.TXT.r_3548# 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la sgrib pa las rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa la brten te / /
column27: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1041248#1041248#TD4054E.TXT.r_8014;TD4054E.TXT.r_8015# 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir / / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa la brten te zhi ba'i rnam thar la gnas pa las yang dag par 'das nas thar pa dang mthun par gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i  gang sems dang sems byung gi chos rnams 'gog pa'o // /
column28: 0.025#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1481784#1481784#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_9547# 'du shes gzhan pa 'byung ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ces bya'o // /
column29: 0.025#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2635957#2635958#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_12496# de bas na de skad du yongs su 'dri bas brgal bas ni 'du shes rnams chung ba'i phyir    'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ces bya'o zhes bya ba 'di gdon mi za bar brjod dgos pas de nyid bshad do // /
column30: 0.025#TD4053E.TXT.r#2975464#2975465#TD4053E.TXT.r_1502;TD4053E.TXT.r_1503# 'dod pa'i khams ni bco brgyad po dag gis bsdus so // / +'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi skye mched ni dri dang ro'i skye mched ma gtogs pa skye mched bcu po dag gis bsdus pa'o // /
column31: 0.025#TD4036E.TXT.r#22998#22999#TD4036E.TXT.r_3508;TD4036E.TXT.r_3509# gang zag phyir mi 'od ba bsam    gtan dang por skyes pa ni de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar des na shi 'phos nas gong nas gong du 'og min gyi bar gyi lhar 'gro ba'am // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar gyi skye ba'i gnas mngon par sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa ste / /
column32: 0.025#TD4044E.TXT.r#389874#389874#TD4044E.TXT.r_1484# 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched rnam par dag pa'i lhar skyes pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni ye shes rnam par dag pa'o // /
column33: 0.025#TD4052E.TXT.r#2862357#2862357#TD4052E.TXT.r_2397# 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched na ni 'du shes zhan pa'i  phyir rang gi sa pa'i 'phags pa'i lam med da / /
column34: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393037#2393037#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9739# tshor ba btang snyoms dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rnam par rig pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched pa'i bar gyi rnam par  shes pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column35: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#30275#30275#TD4036E.TXT.r_4643# 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi sa 'og ma rnams kyi rags pa nyid dang  sa gong ma rnams kyi zhi ba nyid gang yin pa'o // /
column36: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3100694#3100694#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1380# tshangs ris kyi dngos po dang  'og min gyi bar gyi dngos po dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi dngos po dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi dngos po dang  dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i dngos po dang  chos kyis rjes  su 'brang ba'i dngos po dang  nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dngos po dang  mthong ba'i lam gyi dngos po dang  bsgom pa'i lam gyi dngos po dang  rgyud du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i dngos po dang  dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar gyi dngos po dang  rang byang  chub kyi dngos po dang  yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi dngos po dang  'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i dngos po dang  pha rol tu phyin pa'i dngos po dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i dngos po dang  lam gyi yan lag gi bar gyi dngos po dang  bsam gtan dang   tshad med pa dang  gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dngos po dang  'du shes bsgom pa'i dngos po dang  rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i dngos po dang  rnam par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched bsgom pa'i dngos po dang   stobs dang  mi 'jigs pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  bsrungs pa med pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  thugs rje chen po dang  bag chags yang dag par bcom pa dang  mtshan dang  dpe bya dang  rnam pa thams cad dang  mchog mkhyen pa dang   sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad kyi dngos po ste / /
column37: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1768748#1768748#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8797# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi srid pa'i mtha' ni  'di tsam ste / /
column38: 0.026#TD4039E.TXT.r#1841458#1841458#TD4039E.TXT.r_3221# de bas na de ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa man chad las khyad par du thob tu zin kyang chos 'dul ba 'di las shin tu ring ste / /

column3: khrag khrig brgya stong gi bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar du ni gong du smos pa'i brgyad po dang ci rigs par sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1599182#1599184#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_779# 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba ni yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis bsdus so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#697752#697764#TD4091E.TXT.r_492;TD4091E.TXT.r_493;TD4091E.TXT.r_494# skye mched gnyis las 'du  shes med pa'i sems can gyi ni dri dang ro'i skye mched med pa'i phyir skye mched bcu rnams kyis so // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba ni yid dang chos kyi skye mched gnyis kyis so // /
column6: 1.192#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1613532#1613532#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_3244# sh'a ri'i bu 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams yin no zhes gsungs she  na ; /
column7: 0.016#TD4067E.TXT.r#1094210#1094213#TD4067E.TXT.r_1300# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang  rnam shes  mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba 'di ni gzugs med pa'i khams te / /
column8: 0.016#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1785561#1785561#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_10749# gang zhig bsgrubs nas rnam par shes pa 'du shes med 'du shes med  min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do // /
column9: 0.016#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1623481#1623483#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4812# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha'  yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched do // /
column10: 0.017#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#786570#786571#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3290# skye mched gnyis las zhes bya ba ni 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi  skye mched gnyis las te / /
column11: 0.017#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2707220#2707220#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_706# 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched du mngon par 'grub pa ni bla na med pa'i skye ba zhes bya'o // /

column14: 0.018#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1417021#1417022#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1934;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1935# 'di lta ste / / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams lta bu ste 'di ni skye mched gnyis pa'o zhes gsungs pa yin te skye mched 'di gnyis las 'du shes med pa'i sems can ni skye mched bcus bsdus te / /
column15: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349809#2349810#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4497# bsam gtan dang po nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched pa'i bar du re re la yang zhi gnas rnam pa re re yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin rnam pa brgyad ston te / /
column16: 0.019#TD4044E.TXT.r#389873#389874#TD4044E.TXT.r_1483;TD4044E.TXT.r_1484# gzugs kyi 'du shes dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nam mkha'i 'du shes dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam pa'i 'du shes dang  ci  yang med pa'i skye mched kyi ci yang med do zhes bya ba'i 'du shes so // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched rnam par dag pa'i lhar skyes pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni ye shes rnam par dag pa'o // /
column17: 0.019#TD4052E.TXT.r#2862356#2862357#TD4052E.TXT.r_2397# 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched na ni 'du shes zhan pa'i  phyir rang gi sa pa'i 'phags pa'i lam med da / /
column18: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#148802#148802#TD4035E.TXT.r_4177# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha    dang  gzugs na spyod pa'i lha dang  gzugs med pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra ste / /
column19: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#148942#148942#TD4035E.TXT.r_4206# yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa dang  'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dang  gzugs na spyod pa'i lha dang  gzugs med pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i  bar zhes byar mi rung ngo // /
column20: 0.020#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#830326#830327#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10566# 'dir 'di lta ste 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams yin no zhes ma gsungs te / /

column3: yul gyi ming dang  phan 'dogs pa dang  rjes su bsngags pa dang  sku tshe'i tshad dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'i rgyu sgrub pa ste / /

column3: 'di ni tshig dang po dang sbyar ro // / +mdo las de nas 'khor de na zhes pa nas ci'i rkyen du 'gyur zhes pa'i bar  du ni 'khor gyi the tshom mo // /

column3: mdo las / / +de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes pa nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de zhes pa'i bar du ni sngon gyi rgyu bstan pa dang  de'i 'og tu 'phral gyi spyod pa bstan pa dang  bsdu ste lung ston pa la 'di ni dang po'o // /

column3: mdo las de na rigs kyi bu 'di ni zhes pa nas byang chub     // / +tu lung bstan pa thos zhes pa'i bar du ni spyod pa phyi ma bstan pa dang  mdor bsdus te lung bstan pa'o // /

column3: mdo las / / +bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi zhes pa nas / / +sngon gyi smon lam dran no zhes pa'i bar du ni dga' bos mngon du rtogs pa bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#697870#697883#TD4091E.TXT.r_517;TD4091E.TXT.r_518;TD4091E.TXT.r_519;TD4091E.TXT.r_520;TD4091E.TXT.r_521# gang gi phyir khams drug po de dag ni / / +skye ba'i rten yin par 'dod de / /

column7: 0.016#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1417848#1417850#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_2028# de dag ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i sems nas 'chi ba'i sems kyi bar du skye ba'i zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni de dag ni skye ba bskyed par byed pa dang  gso bar byed pa dang  'phel  bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir gzhir gyur pa ste / /

column3: mdo las de nas tshe dang ldan  pa dga' bos zhes pa nas / / +dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa ni byang chub kyi phyir zhes pa'i bar du ni dga' bos rang gi yon tan bsgrags pas gzhan de 'dra ba byed du gzhug pa'o // /

column3: mdo las de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes pa nas 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar du ni 'dis gnyis pa lung bstan  pa'o ; / /

column3: 'di man chad bzhir dbye ste / / +rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su gyur pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyi sras su yang ston pa dang  rgyud ma pa 'chad pa dang rnam  pa bzhi ste / /

column4: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1599660#1599660#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_872# gzugs sgra ma gtogs dbang po lnga rnams dang  dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khams rnams dang brgyad po de dag ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i ngo bor lung bstan du med pa'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa dag go // /

column4: 0.0#TD4039E.TXT.r#1847035#1847041#TD4039E.TXT.r_3850;TD4039E.TXT.r_3851# de la snyoms par 'jug pa la brten pa'i bye brag ni 'di lta ste / / +rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang  bcas pa dang  rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dang  rtog pa yang med dpyod PA YANG MED PA DANG  dga' ba dang ldan pa dang  bde ba dang ldan pa dang  btang snyoms dang ldan pa dang  nyams par 'gyur ba dang  gnas pa dang  khyad par du 'gro ba dang  nges    par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ste / /

column14: 0.019#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1633110#1633115#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6277# rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa dang  rtog pa med la  dpyod pa tsam dang  rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa'i sa dang  dge ba'i sa dang  mi dge ba'i sa dang  lung du ma bstan pa'i sa dang  yang gsum ste / /

column7: 1.192#TD4068E.TXT.r#607679#607680#TD4068E.TXT.r_4230# de bas na yid kyi khams dang chos kyi khams dang   yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gsum la tha ma gsum zhes bya'o // /

column9: 0.015#TD4068E.TXT.r#608193#608194#TD4068E.TXT.r_4281# tha ma gsum ste zhes bya ba la yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gsum ni gzugs med pa'i  khams dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column25: 0.023#TD4067E.TXT.r#1096210#1096211#TD4067E.TXT.r_1667# rnam par shes pa'i khams drug po 'di dag ni  mig la sogs pa dag la brten te gzugs la sogs pa dmigs pa rnam par rig pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'di skad du mig dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid ces bya ba'i khams rnams ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams drug gi rten yin la / /
column26: 0.023#TD4079E.TXT.r#757004#757004#TD4079E.TXT.r_59# mig dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid de dbang po'i khams drug ni mig gi khams nas yid kyi khams kyi bar dag yin no // /

column7: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#609309#609309#TD4068E.TXT.r_4410# don du na mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du sems kyi khams drug dang  yid kyi khams kyis bsnan te sems kyi khams bdun dang  chos kyi khams kyi phyogs  gcig sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin rnams ni dmigs pa dang bcas par bshad do // /

column3: 'di'i drug po la 'dzin pa dang  klog pa dang  'don pa dang  mos pa dang  'dri ba dang  mchod pa'o // /
mchod pa ni  phyi nang gi mchod pa'o // / +chos spyod pa de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra bar dad pa dang  gus pa'i las bskyed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1600405#1600412#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1002;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1003;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1004;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1005;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1006# lhag ma gzugs can gyi khams bcu po dag dang  chos kyi khams kyi phyogs  ldan pa ma yin pa ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya bar grub bo // /

column3: mdo las sman gyi rgyal po rigs kyi bu dang  rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhes pa nas / /

column3: 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes pa'i bar du 'di ni thugs  rje dang smon lam gyi dbang gis der skyes pa dang rgyu dam pas 'jig rten du 'byung ba'o // /

column6: 0.012#TD4068E.TXT.r#609862#609863#TD4068E.TXT.r_4471# dbang po lnga dang lhan cig 'grogs pa'i gzugs dang  dri dang  ro dang  reg bya rnams zin par bshad pa'i lhag ma ni sems kyi khams bdun dang  chos kyi khams dang  sgra'i khams te dgu yang ma zin pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: mdo las / / +de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa nas / / +phyag 'tshal zhing btud pa lta ci smos zhes pa'i bar du ni sngar gang zag gi yon tan bstod cing mchod par 'os pa dang  yon tan che bas thugs rje dang smon lam gyis    'dir skye zhing phan pa chen po byed pa'o // /

column7: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#66231#66238#TD4095E.TXT.r_603;TD4095E.TXT.r_604;TD4095E.TXT.r_605# dgu  po gzhan ni rnam pa gnyis // / +zin pa dag kyang yin ma zin pa dag kyang yin te / / +de la mig dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus da ltar byung ba rnams ni zin pa yin no // /

column3: mdo las sman gyi rgyal po zhes pa nas skye par rig par bya'o zhes pa'i bar du ni yon tan chen bo dang ldan pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#698471#698485#TD4091E.TXT.r_640;TD4091E.TXT.r_641;TD4091E.TXT.r_642;TD4091E.TXT.r_643;TD4091E.TXT.r_644# gzugs dang  sgra dang  dri dang  ro dang  reg bya'i khams da ltar byung ba dbang bo dang tha  mi dad pa rnams ni zin pa'o // / +gzhan dag ni ma zin pa ste / / +'di lta ste / / +rtsa ba ma gtogs pa'i skra dang  ba spu dang  so dag gi dang  phyis dang gcin dang mchil ma dang  snabs dang khrag la sogs pa dag gi dang  sa dang rdo ba la sogs pa dag gi'o // /
column5: 0.028#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1600471#1600471#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1017# 'di lta ste rtsa ba ma gtogs pa'i skra dang  ba spu dang  sen mo dang  so dag la yod pa dang  phyis dang  gcin dang  mchil ma  dang ; /

column3: thugs rjes 'dir skye bar bstan pa dang  chos 'di ston pa yang 'phags pa yin par bstan pa dang  theg pa rnam gnyis las dgar  pa'i phyir / /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes smos pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi zhing yangs par mi skye ba yang thugs rjes sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir / /

column3: lha dang  khams bla ma gnyis su mi skye bar 'dir skye ba ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#698513#698520#TD4091E.TXT.r_652;TD4091E.TXT.r_653# 'byung gyur dbang po lnga'i khams dang  yul bzhi po de dag ni 'byung ba las gyur pa nyid do // /

column3: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos  la mos pa'i rtags ni chos thos pa tsam gyis sgra dang ba spu ldang ba dang gdung bas mchi ma 'byung ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtags so // /

sman gyi rgyal po zhes pa nas / / +de bzhin gshegs pa phrag pa la thogs pa yin no zhes pa'i bar du ni  dam pa'i chos 'di 'don pa yon tan thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i phyir sdong pos brgyan pa las byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan rnam pa bcus brgyan pa'am / /

column5: 0.009#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2717711#2717715#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2058;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2059;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2060# smras pa  gsum ste / / +rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dang  rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang  rgyas pa las byung ba'o // /
column6: 0.016#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1422156#1422156#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_2568# 'dir yang thogs pa med pa brgyad ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dang  rnam par smin pa las skyes pa KHO NA YIN NO ZHES BYA BAR nges par bzung ngo // /
column7: 0.016#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1601120#1601121#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1145;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1146;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1147# thogs pa med pa rnams la rgyas pa med pa'i  phyir ro ; / / +gzhan rnam gsum / / +gzhan ni lhag ma bzhi po gzugs dang  sgra dang  dri dang  ro dang  reg bya'i khams dag ste / /
column8: 0.025#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1421596#1421596#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_2507# rgyu mthun pa ni rgyu dang 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang rgyas pa las byung ba dag kyang rgyu mthun pa las byung  ba ni yin mod kyi de dag rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang rgyas pa las byung ba nyid kho nas bsdus pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'o zhes bya bar mi bzung ba'i phyir ni gang dag rang gi rgyu dang 'dra ba yang yin la rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang rgyas pa las byung ba yang ma yin pa de dag rgyu mthun    pa las byung ba yin par 'dod do // /
column9: 0.026#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2717887#2717887#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2082# sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni rgyu mthun pa  las byung ba dang  rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang  rgyas pa gnyis PAS RGYAS PA LAS BYUNG ba yin no // /
column10: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#837112#837112#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11655;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11656# mtshan nyid rnams kyang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa rnams kyi ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag go // / +lhag ma rnams kyi ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dag go // /

column3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o // / +mdo las de gang du 'gro ba der zhes pa nas yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro  zhes pa'i bar du ni dam pa'i chos 'di shin tu zab pa'i phyir 'phags pa dga' bo la ma gtad kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#698728#698738#TD4091E.TXT.r_707;TD4091E.TXT.r_708;TD4091E.TXT.r_709;TD4091E.TXT.r_710# rdzas dang lhan cig / / +'dus ma byas ni bstan pa'i phyir rdzas  so ; / /

column6: 0.007#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1601155#1601159#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1154;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1155# tha ma gsum skad cig ma ste / / +yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni 'don pa'i rim pas tha ma dag yin te / /

column18: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#876243#876243#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_17677# ji ltar de bya ba'am bya bar nus par bya bar 'gyur ba yin pa de bzhin du de myong bar bya ba'am myong bar nus pa'i phyir  myong bar 'gyur ba'o // /
column19: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#62305#62305#TD4036E.TXT.r_9144;TD4036E.TXT.r_9145# de la lam 'bring po bsgom pa ni gang gis nyon mongs pa  'bring po spong bar byed pa'o // / +de la lam chen po bsgom pa ni gang gis thams cad kyi tha mar spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chung ngu spong bar byed pa'o // /

column21: 0.026#TD4054E.TXT.r#1047833#1047833#TD4054E.TXT.r_8970# de la yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po ni  gzugs la sogs pa'o // /

column24: 0.027#TD4018E.TXT.r#3026587#3026590#TD4018E.TXT.r_3031;TD4018E.TXT.r_3032;TD4018E.TXT.r_3033# blo gros chen po snang ba'i rnam par shes pa dang dngos po so sor rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa de nyid ni zhes bya ba yul gyi rnam  par chud pa'i rnam par shes pa dag go // / +snang ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i bar du'o // /
column25: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#33671#33675#TD4036E.TXT.r_5148;TD4036E.TXT.r_5149;TD4036E.TXT.r_5150# de la bying ba'i mtshan ma ni dmigs pa'i mtshan ma dang  gzhi'i mtshan ma gang gis sems bying ba nyid du 'gyur ba'o // / +de la rgod pa'i mtshan ma ni dmigs pa'i mtshan ma dang  gzhi'i mtshan ma    gang gis sems rgod par 'gyur ba'o // /
column26: 0.027#TD4070E.TXT.r#2806794#2806794#TD4070E.TXT.r_646# gzugs la sogs pa'i yul ltar so sor snang bas mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa drug po gang yin pa de ni yul la rnam par rig ba  zhes bya'o // /
column27: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#9126#9126#TD4036E.TXT.r_1269# ji ltar na  mig gi rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams kyi bar la mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa zhes bya / /
column28: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2748776#2748776#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6707;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6708# des na mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams sam / / +rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams la thams  cad kyi thams cad du nyams su myong ba med pa las kun tu rmongs pa lta bu'o // /
column29: 0.027#TD4032E.TXT.r#1943637#1943638#TD4032E.TXT.r_3736;TD4032E.TXT.r_3737# rnam par brtags pa'i  gzugs ni ma yin no // / +de la mig la sogs par spros pas bsgos pa'i las kyis 'phags pas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa 'gyur ba'i khyad par rnyed pa ni nang gi skye mched do // /
column30: 0.028#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2767817#2767817#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9414# 'jig rten pa'i dang ba'i gzugs dang  dang bas gzung ba'i gzugs thams cad dang 'jig rten pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos nyon mongs pa can thams cad dang  'jig rten pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos lung du ma bstan pa  thams cad dang  'jig rten pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos dge ba dang spang bar bya ba dang spangs pa thams cad dang  'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul 'jig rten pa'i gzugs bstan du med la thogs pa med pa thams cad do // /
column31: 0.028#TD4091E.TXT.r#699019#699019#TD4091E.TXT.r_761;TD4091E.TXT.r_762# yid ni mi skye ba'i chos can nyid de de'i brten pa dang bcas pa'o // / +yang  gzugs rnams ni mig gis mthong ba'am lta ba'am lta bar 'gyur ba de dag ni brten pa dang bcas pa'o // /

column33: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1465243#1465243#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7627;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7628# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i thos pa las byung ba rnams zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' thos pa las nges par byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni thos pa las byung ba'o // / +bsams pa las byung ba  rnams ni bsams pa las byung ba rnams kyi yin te zhes bya ba ni bsams pa las byung ba rnams kho na'i yin gyi / /
column34: 0.029#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2634427#2634427#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_12316# gal te yang gzugs med par skye ba'i gzugs na dang ba'i phyir sa 'og ma pa'i dbang pos mi 'dzin pas gzugs med pa rnams zhes bya ba'o zhe na / /
column35: 0.029#TD4050E.TXT.r#1107705#1107705#TD4050E.TXT.r_1473# dri ma med pas rnam par byang ba zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid de nyid nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i dri ma dang bral bar gyur pa'i phyir gang rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin  nyid kyis rab tu phye ba'i sangs rgyas nyid do // /
column36: 0.029#TD4029E.TXT.r#2160790#2160790#TD4029E.TXT.r_5294# 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad mas yongs su rtog pa'o zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pas gzugs la sogs pa dang  bu ba sa med dang  byas pa nyid la sogs    pas sgra mi rtag par yongs su rtog pa gang yin pa 'di ni 'thad pa kho na yin no // /
